42002015	And when the angels had gone away from them into heaven , the keepers of the sheep said to one another , Let us go now to Beth-lehem , and see this thing which has come about , which the Lord has made clear to us .
42002016	And they came quickly , and saw Mary and Joseph , and the child in the place where the cattle had their food .
42002017	And when they saw it , they gave them an account of the things which had been said to them about the child .
42002018	And all those to whose ears it came were full of wonder at the things said by the keepers of the sheep .
42002019	But Mary kept all these words in her heart , and gave much thought to them .
42002020	Then the keepers of the sheep went back , giving glory and praise to God for all the things which had come to their ears and which they had seen , as it had been said to them .
42002021	And when , after eight days , the time came for his circumcision , he was named Jesus , the name which the angel had given to him before his birth .
42002022	And when the necessary days for making them clean by the law of Moses had come to an end , they took him to Jerusalem to give him to the Lord
42002023	( As it says in the law of the Lord , Every mother's first male child is to be holy to the Lord ) ,
42002024	And to make an offering , as it is ordered in the law of the Lord , of two doves or other young birds .
42002025	And there was then in Jerusalem a man whose name was Simeon ; and he was an upright man , fearing God and waiting for the comfort of Israel : and the Holy Spirit was on him .
42002026	And he had knowledge , through the Holy Spirit , that he would not see death till he had seen the Lord's Christ .
42002027	And full of the Spirit he came into the Temple ; and when the father and mother came in with the child Jesus , to do with him what was ordered by the law ,
42002028	Then he took him in his arms and gave praise to God and said ,
42002029	Now you are letting your servant go in peace , O Lord , as you have said ;
42002030	For my eyes have seen your salvation ,
42002031	Which you have made ready before the face of all nations ;
42002032	A light of revelation to the Gentiles , and the glory of your people Israel .
42002033	And his father and mother were full of wonder at the things which were said about him .
42002034	And Simeon gave them his blessing and said to Mary , his mother , See , this child will be the cause of the downfall and the lifting up of great numbers of people in Israel , and he will be a sign against which hard words will be said ;
42002035	( And a sword will go through your heart ; ) so that the secret thoughts of men may come to light .
42002036	And there was one , Anna , a woman prophet , the daughter of Phanuel , of the family of Asher ( she was very old , and after seven years of married life
42002037	She had been a widow for eighty-four years ) ; she was in the Temple at all times , worshipping with prayers and going without food , night and day .
42002038	And coming up at that time , she gave praise to God , talking of him to all those who were waiting for the freeing of Jerusalem .
42002039	And when they had done all the things which were ordered by the law of the Lord , they went back to Galilee , to Nazareth , the town where they were living .
42002040	And the child became tall and strong and full of wisdom , and the grace of God was on him .
42002041	And every year his father and mother went to Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover .
42002042	And when he was twelve years old , they went up , as their way was , to the feast ;
42002043	And when the days of the feast came to an end and they were going back , the boy Jesus was still in Jerusalem , but they had no knowledge of it :
42002044	And in the belief that he was with some of their number , they went a day's journey ; and after looking for him among their relations and friends ,
42002045	And seeing that he was not there , they went back to Jerusalem , to make search for him .
42002046	And after three days they came across him in the Temple , seated among the wise men , giving ear to their words and putting questions to them .
42002047	And all to whose ears it came were full of wonder at his knowledge and the answers which he gave .
42002048	And when they saw him they were surprised , and his mother said to him , Son , why have you done this to us ? see , your father and I have been looking for you with sorrow .
42002049	And he said to them , Why were you looking for me ? was it not clear to you that my right place was in my Father's house ?
42002050	And his words seemed strange to them .
42002051	And he went down with them and came to Nazareth ; and did as he was ordered : and his mother kept all these words in her heart .
42002052	And Jesus was increasing in wisdom and in years , and in grace before God and men .
42003001	Now in the fifteenth year of the rule of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being ruler of Judaea , and Herod being king of Galilee , his brother Philip king of the country of Ituraea and Trachonitis , and Lysanias king of Abilene ,
42003002	When Annas and Caiaphas were high priests , the word of the Lord came to John , the son of Zacharias , in the waste land .
42003003	And he came into all the country round about Jordan , preaching baptism as a sign of forgiveness of sin for those whose hearts were changed .
42003004	As it says in the book of the words of Isaiah the prophet , The voice of one crying in the waste land , Make ready the way of the Lord , make his roads straight .
42003005	Every valley will be lifted up , and all the mountains and hills made low , and the twisted will be made straight , and the rough ways smooth ;
42003006	And all flesh will see the salvation of God .
42003007	So he said to the people who went out to him for baptism : You offspring of snakes , at whose word are you going in flight from the wrath to come ?
42003008	Make clear by your acts that your hearts have been changed ; and do not say to yourselves , We have Abraham for our father : for I say to you that God is able from these stones to make children of Abraham .
42003009	And even now the axe is put to the root of the trees ; and every tree which does not have good fruit will be cut down and put into the fire .
42003010	And the people put questions to him , saying , What have we to do ?
42003011	And he made answer and said to them , He who has two coats , let him give to him who has not even one ; and he who has food , let him do the same .
42003012	Then tax-farmers came to him for baptism and said to him , Master , what have we to do ?
42003013	And he said to them , Do not make an attempt to get more money than the right amount .
42003014	And men of the army put questions to him , saying , And what have we to do ? And he said to them , Do no violent acts to any man , and do not take anything without right , and let your payment be enough for you .
42003015	And while the people were waiting , and all men were questioning in their hearts about John , if he was the Christ or not ,
42003016	John made answer , saying to them all , Truly , I give you baptism with water , but one is coming who is greater than I , whose shoes I am not good enough to undo : he will give you baptism with the Holy Spirit , and with fire :
42003017	In whose hand is the instrument with which he will make clean his grain ; he will put the good grain in his store , but the waste will be burned in the fire which will never be put out .
42003018	And so comforting them with these and other words , he gave the good news to the people ;
42003019	But Herod the king , because John had made a protest on account of Herodias , his brother's wife , and other evil things which Herod had done ,
42003020	Did this most evil thing of all , and had John shut up in prison .
42003021	Now it came about that when all the people had been given baptism , Jesus , having had baptism with them , was in prayer , when , the heaven being open ,
42003022	The Holy Spirit came down in the form of a dove , and a voice came from heaven , saying , You are my dearly loved Son , with whom I am well pleased .
42003023	And Jesus at this time was about thirty years old , being the son ( as it seemed ) of Joseph , the son of Heli ,
42003024	The son of Matthat , the son of Levi , the son of Melchi , the son of Jannai , the son of Joseph ,
42003025	The son of Mattathias , the son of Amos , the son of Nahum , the son of Esli , the son of Naggai ,
42003026	The son of Maath , the son of Mattathias , the son of Semein , the son of Josech , the son of Joda ,
42003027	The son of Joanan , the son of Rhesa , the son of Zerubbabel , the son of Shealtiel , the son of Neri ,
42003028	The son of Melchi , the son of Addi , the son of Cosam , the son of Elmadam , the son of Er ,
42003029	The son of Jesus , the son of Eliezer , the son of Jorim , the son of Matthat , the son of Levi ,
42003030	The son of Symeon , the son of Judas , the son of Joseph , the son of Jonam , the son of Eliakim ,
42003031	The son of Melea , the son of Menna , the son of Mattatha , the son of Nathan , the son of David ,
42003032	The son of Jesse , the son of Obed , the son of Boaz , the son of Salmon , the son of Nahshon ,
42003033	The son of Amminadab , the son of Arni , the son of Hezron , the son of Perez , the son of Judah ,
42003034	The son of Jacob , the son of Isaac , the son of Abraham , the son of Terah , the son of Nahor ,
42003035	The son of Serug , the son of Reu , the son of Peleg , the son of Eber , the son of Shelah ,
42003036	The son of Cainan , the son of Arphaxad , the son of Shem , the son of Noah , the son of Lamech ,
42003037	The son of Methuselah , the son of Enoch , the son of Jared , the son of Mahalaleel , the son of Cainan ,
42003038	The son of Enos , the son of Seth , the son of Adam , the son of God .
42004001	And Jesus , full of the Holy Spirit , came back from the Jordan , and was guided by the Spirit in the waste land
42004002	For forty days , being tested by the Evil One . And he had no food in those days ; and when they came to an end , he was in need of food .
42004003	And the Evil One said to him , If you are the Son of God , give orders to this stone to become bread .
42004004	And Jesus made answer to him , It has been said in the Writings , Bread is not man's only need .
42004005	And he took him up and let him see all the kingdoms of the earth in a minute of time .
42004006	And the Evil One said , I will give you authority over all these , and the glory of them , for it has been given to me , and I give it to anyone at my pleasure .
42004007	If then you will give worship to me , it will all be yours .
42004008	And Jesus in answer said to him , It has been said in the Writings , Give worship to the Lord your God , and be his servant only .
42004009	And he took him to Jerusalem and put him on the highest point of the Temple and said to him , If you are the Son of God , let yourself go down from here ; for it is said in the Writings ,
42004010	He will give his angels orders to take care of you :
42004011	And , In their hands they will keep you up , so that your foot may not be crushed against a stone .
42004012	And Jesus made answer and said to him , It is said in the Writings , You may not put the Lord your God to the test .
42004013	And when all these tests were ended the Evil One went away from him for a time .
42004014	And Jesus came back to Galilee in the power of the Spirit , and the news of him went through all the country round about .
42004015	And he was teaching in their Synagogues and all men gave him praise .
42004016	And he came to Nazareth , where he had been as a child , and he went , as his way was , into the Synagogue on the Sabbath , and got up to give a reading .
42004017	And the book of the prophet Isaiah was given to him and , opening the book , he came on the place where it is said ,
42004018	The Spirit of the Lord is on me , because I am marked out by him to give good news to the poor ; he has sent me to make well those who are broken-hearted ; to say that the prisoners will be let go , and the blind will see , and to make the wounded free from their chains ,
42004019	To give knowledge that the year of the Lord's good pleasure is come .
42004020	And shutting the book he gave it back to the servant and took his seat : and the eyes of all in the Synagogue were fixed on him .
42004021	Then he said to them , Today this word has come true in your hearing .
42004022	And they were all giving witness , with wonder , to the words of grace which came from his mouth : and they said , Is not this the son of Joseph ?
42004023	And he said to them , Without doubt you will say to me , Let the medical man make himself well : the things which to our knowledge were done at Capernaum , do them here in your country .
42004024	And he said to them , Truly I say to you , No prophet is honoured in his country .
42004025	Truly I say to you , There were a number of widows in Israel in the days of Elijah , when the heaven was shut up for three years and six months and there was no food in the land ;
42004026	But Elijah was not sent to one of them , but only to Zarephath , in the land of Sidon , to a woman who was a widow .
42004027	And there were a number of lepers in Israel in the time of Elisha the prophet , and not one of them was made clean , but only Naaman the Syrian .
42004028	And all who were in the Synagogue were very angry when these things were said to them .
42004029	And they got up and took him out of the town to the edge of the mountain on which their town was , so that they might send him down to his death .
42004030	But he came through them and went on his way .
42004031	And he came down to Capernaum , a town of Galilee ; and he was giving them teaching on the Sabbath .
42004032	And they were surprised at his teaching , for his word was with authority .
42004033	And there was a man in the Synagogue who had an unclean spirit ; and he gave a loud cry and said ,
42004034	Let us be ! what have we to do with you , Jesus of Nazareth ? have you come to put an end to us ? I have knowledge who you are , the Holy One of God .
42004035	And Jesus said to him , Be quiet , and come out of him . And when the evil spirit had put him down on the earth in the middle of them , he came out of him , having done him no damage .
42004036	And wonder came on them all and they said to one another , What are these words ? for with authority and power he gives orders to the evil spirits and they come out .
42004037	And there was much talk about him in all the places round about .
42004038	And he got up and went out of the Synagogue and went into the house of Simon . And Simon's wife's mother was very ill with a burning heat ; and in answer to their prayers for her
42004039	He went near her , and with a sharp word he gave orders to the disease and it went away from her ; and straight away she got up and took care of their needs .
42004040	And at sundown all those who had anyone ill with any sort of disease , took them to him , and he put his hands on every one of them and made them well .
42004041	And evil spirits came out of a number of them , crying out and saying , You are the Son of God . But he gave them sharp orders not to say a word , because they had knowledge that he was the Christ .
42004042	And when it was day , he came out and went to a waste place ; and great numbers of people came looking for him , and they came to him and would have kept him from going away .
42004043	But he said to them , I have to give the good news of the kingdom of God in other towns , because that is why I was sent .
42004044	And he was teaching in the Synagogues of Galilee .
42005001	Now it came about that while the people came pushing to be near him , and to have knowledge of the word of God , he was by a wide stretch of water named Gennesaret ;
42005002	And he saw two boats by the edge of the water , but the fishermen had gone out of them and were washing their nets .
42005003	And he got into one of the boats , the property of Simon , and made a request to him to go a little way out from the land . And being seated he gave the people teaching from the boat .
42005004	And when his talk was ended , he said to Simon , Go out into deep water , and let down your nets for fish .
42005005	And Simon , answering , said , Master , we were working all night and we took nothing : but at your word I will let down the nets .
42005006	And when they had done this , they got such a great number of fish that it seemed as if their nets would be broken ;
42005007	And they made signs to their friends in the other boat to come to their help . And they came , and the two boats were so full that they were going down .
42005008	But Simon , when he saw it , went down at the knees of Jesus and said , Go away from me , O Lord , for I am a sinner .
42005009	For he was full of wonder and so were all those who were with him , at the number of fish which they had taken ;
42005010	And so were James and John , the sons of Zebedee , who were working with Simon . And Jesus said to Simon , Have no fear ; from this time forward you will be a fisher of men .
42005011	And when they had got their boats to the land , they gave up everything and went after him .
42005012	And it came about that while he was in one of the towns , there was a leper there : and when he saw Jesus he went down on his face in prayer to him , saying , Lord , if it is your pleasure , you have power to make me clean .
42005013	And he put out his hand to him and said , It is my pleasure ; be clean . And straight away his disease went from him .
42005014	And he gave him orders : Say nothing to any man , but let the priest see you and give an offering so that you may be made clean , as the law of Moses says , and for a witness to them .
42005015	But news of him went out all the more , in every direction , and great numbers of people came together to give hearing to his words and to be made well from their diseases .
42005016	But he went away by himself to a waste place for prayer .
42005017	And it came about that on one of these days he was teaching ; and some Pharisees and teachers of the law were seated there , who had come from every town of Galilee and Judaea and from Jerusalem ; and the power of the Lord was with him , to make those who were ill free from their diseases .
42005018	And some men had with them , on a bed , a man who was ill , without power of moving ; and they made attempts to get him in and put him before Jesus .
42005019	And because of the mass of people , there was no way to get him in ; so they went up on the top of the house and let him down through the roof , on his bed , into the middle in front of Jesus .
42005020	And seeing their faith he said , Man , you have forgiveness for your sins .
42005021	And the scribes and Pharisees were having an argument , saying , Who is this , who has no respect for God ? who is able to give forgiveness for sins , but God only ?
42005022	But Jesus , who had knowledge of their thoughts , said to them , Why are you reasoning in your hearts ?
42005023	Which is the simpler : to say , You have forgiveness for your sins ; or to say , Get up and go ?
42005024	But so that you may see that on earth the Son of man has authority for the forgiveness of sins , ( he said to the man who was ill , ) I say to you , Get up , and take up your bed , and go into your house .
42005025	And straight away he got up before them , and took up his bed and went away to his house giving praise to God .
42005026	And wonder overcame them all , and they gave glory to God ; and they were full of fear , saying , We have seen strange things today .
42005027	And after these things he went out , and saw Levi , a tax-farmer , seated at the place where taxes were taken , and said to him , Come after me .
42005028	And giving up his business , he got up and went after him .
42005029	And Levi made a great feast for him in his house : and a great number of tax-farmers and others were seated at table with them .
42005030	And the Pharisees and their scribes made protests against his disciples , saying , Why do you take food and drink with tax-farmers and sinners ?
42005031	And Jesus , answering , said to them , Those who are well have no need of a medical man , but those who are ill .
42005032	I have come , not to get the upright , but sinners , so that they may be turned from their sins .
42005033	And they said to him , The disciples of John frequently go without food , and make prayers , and so do the disciples of the Pharisees ; but your disciples take food and drink .
42005034	And Jesus said , Are you able to make the friends of the newly-married man go without food when he is with them ?
42005035	But the days will come when he will be taken away from them , and then they will go without food .
42005036	And he said to them , in a story , No man takes a bit of cloth from a new coat and puts it on to an old coat , for so the new coat would be damaged and the bit from the new would not go well with the old .
42005037	And no man puts new wine into old wine-skins , for fear that the skins will be burst by the new wine , and the wine be let out , and the skins come to destruction .
42005038	But new wine has to be put into new wine-skins .
42005039	And no man , having had old wine , has any desire for new , for he says , The old is better .
42006001	Now it came about that on the Sabbath he was going through the fields of grain , and his disciples took the heads of the grain for food , crushing them in their hands .
42006002	But some of the Pharisees said , Why do you do what it is not right to do on the Sabbath ?
42006003	And Jesus said , Have you not seen in the Writings what David did when he was in need of food , he , and those who were with him ;
42006004	How he went into the house of God and took for food the holy bread , which only the priests may take , and gave it to those who were with him ?
42006005	And he said , The Son of man is lord even of the Sabbath .
42006006	And it came about , on another Sabbath , that he went into the Synagogue and was teaching there . And a man was there whose right hand was dead .
42006007	And the scribes and Pharisees were watching him to see if he would make him well on the Sabbath , so that they might be able to say something against him .
42006008	But he had knowledge of their thoughts ; and he said to the man whose hand was dead , Get up and come into the middle . And he got up and came forward .
42006009	And Jesus said , I put the question to you , Is it right to do good on the Sabbath or to do evil ? to give life or to take it away ?
42006010	And looking round on all of them , he said to him , Put out your hand . And he did so : and his hand was made well .
42006011	But they were full of wrath , and were talking together about what they might do to Jesus .
42006012	And it came about in those days that he went out to the mountain for prayer ; and he was all night in prayer to God .
42006013	And the day came and , turning to his disciples , he made a selection from among them of twelve , to whom he gave the name of Apostles ;
42006014	Simon , to whom he gave the name of Peter , and Andrew , his brother , and James and John and Philip and Bartholomew
42006015	And Matthew and Thomas and James , the son of Alphaeus , and Simon , who was named the Zealot ,
42006016	And Judas , the son of James , and Judas Iscariot , he who was false to him .
42006017	And he came down with them to a level place , and a great band of his disciples , and a very great number of people from all Judaea and Jerusalem and from the parts of Tyre and Sidon by the sea , came to give hearing to him , and to be made well from their diseases ;
42006018	And those who were troubled with unclean spirits were made well .
42006019	And all the people were desiring to be touched by him , for power came from him and made them all well .
42006020	And turning his eyes to his disciples he said , Happy are you who are poor : for the kingdom of God is yours .
42006021	Happy are you who are in need of food now : for you will be made full . Happy are you who are weeping now ; for you will be glad .
42006022	Happy are you , when men have hate for you , and put you away from among them and say angry words to you , turning away in disgust at your name , because of the Son of man .
42006023	Be glad in that day , and be lifted up for joy , for your reward in heaven will be great : for their fathers did these same things to the prophets .
42006024	But unhappy are you who have wealth : for you have been comforted now .
42006025	Unhappy are you who are full of food now : for you will be in need . Unhappy are you who are laughing now : for you will be crying in sorrow .
42006026	Unhappy are you when all men give you their approval : for so their fathers did to the false prophets .
42006027	But I say to you who give ear to me , Have love for those who are against you , do good to those who have hate for you ,
42006028	Give blessing to those who give you curses , say prayers for those who are cruel to you .
42006029	If a man gives you a blow on one side of your face , then let the other side be turned to him ; from him who takes away your coat , do not keep back your robe .
42006030	Give to everyone who comes with a request , and if a man takes away your property , make no attempt to get it back again .
42006031	Do to others as you would have them do to you .
42006032	If you have love for those who have love for you , what credit is it to you ? for even sinners have love for those who have love for them .
42006033	And if you do good to those who do good to you , what credit is it to you ? for even sinners do the same .
42006034	And if you let those have the use of your money , from whom you are hoping to get it back , what credit is it to you ? even sinners do so to sinners , hoping to get back as much as they gave .
42006035	But be loving to those who are against you and do them good , and give them your money , not giving up hope , and your reward will be great and you will be the sons of the Most High : for he is kind to evil men , and to those who have hard hearts .
42006036	Be full of pity , even as your Father is full of pity .
42006037	Be not judges of others , and you will not be judged : do not give punishment to others , and you will not get punishment yourselves : make others free , and you will be made free :
42006038	Give , and it will be given to you ; good measure , crushed down , full and running over , they will give to you . For in the same measure as you give , it will be given to you again .
42006039	And he gave them teaching in the form of a story , saying , Is it possible for one blind man to be guide to another ? will they not go falling together into a hole ?
42006040	The disciple is not greater than his master , but everyone whose learning is complete will be like his master .
42006041	And why do you take note of the grain of dust in your brother's eye , but take no note of the bit of wood which is in your eye ?
42006042	How will you say to your brother , Brother , let me take the grain of dust out of your eye , when you yourself do not see the bit of wood in your eye ? O false one ! first take the wood out of your eye and then you will see clearly to take the dust out of your brother's eye .
42006043	For no good tree gives bad fruit , and no bad tree gives good fruit .
42006044	For every tree is judged by its fruit . Men do not get figs from thorns , or grapes from blackberry plants .
42006045	The good man , out of the good store of his heart , gives good things ; and the evil man , out of his evil store , gives evil : for out of the full store of the heart come the words of the mouth .
42006046	Why do you say to me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
42006047	Everyone who comes to me and gives ear to my words and does them , I will make clear to you what he is like :
42006048	He is like a man building a house , who went deep and put the base of it on a rock ; and when the water came up and the river was driving against that house , it was not moved , because the building was good .
42006049	But he who gives hearing , without doing , is like a man building a house on the earth without a base for it ; and when the force of the river came against it , straight away it came down ; and the destruction of that house was great .
42007001	After he had come to the end of all his words in the hearing of the people , he went into Capernaum .
42007002	And a certain captain had a servant who was very dear to him ; this servant was ill and near to death .
42007003	And when news of Jesus came to his ears , he sent to him rulers of the Jews , requesting that he would come and make his servant well .
42007004	And they , when they came to Jesus , made their request warmly , saying ,
42007005	It is right for you to do this for him , because he is a friend to our nation , and himself has put up a Synagogue for us .
42007006	And Jesus went with them . And when he was not far from the house , the man sent friends to him , saying , Lord , do not give yourself trouble : for I am not important enough for you to come into my house :
42007007	And I had the feeling that I was not even good enough to come to you : but say the word only , and my servant will be well .
42007008	For I , myself , am a man under authority , having men under me ; and I say to this one , Go , and he goes ; and to another , Come , and he comes ; and to my servant , Do this , and he does it .
42007009	And when these things were said to Jesus , he was surprised , and , turning to the mass of people coming after him , said , I have not seen such great faith , no , not in Israel .
42007010	And when those who were sent came back to the house they saw that the servant was well .
42007011	And it came about , after a little time , that he went to a town named Nain ; and his disciples went with him , and a great number of people .
42007012	Now when he came near the door of the town , a dead man was being taken out , the only son of his mother , who was a widow : and a great number of people from the town were with her .
42007013	And when the Lord saw her , he had pity on her and said to her , Be not sad .
42007014	And he came near , and put his hand on the stretcher where the dead man was : and those who were moving it came to a stop . And he said , Young man , I say to you , Get up .
42007015	And the dead man got up , and words came from his lips . And he gave him to his mother .
42007016	And fear came on all , and they gave praise to God , saying , A great prophet is among us : and , God has given thought to his people .
42007017	And this story about him went through all Judaea and the places round about .
42007018	And the disciples of John gave him an account of all these things .
42007019	Then John sent two of his disciples to the Lord , saying , Are you he who is to come , or are we waiting for another ?
42007020	And when the men came to him they said , John the Baptist has sent us to you , saying , Are you he who is to come , or are we waiting for another ?
42007021	At that time , he made a number of people free from their diseases and their pains , and from evil spirits ; and to others who were blind he gave back the use of their eyes .
42007022	And answering them he said , Go back and give news to John of what you have seen , and the things which have come to your ears ; the blind now see , those who had no power in their legs are walking , lepers are made clean , those who had no hearing now have their ears open , dead men come to life again , and the poor have the good news given to them .
42007023	And a blessing will be on him who has no doubts about me .
42007024	And when the men who were sent by John had gone away , he said to the people , about John , What did you go out into the waste land to see ? a tall stem moving in the wind ?
42007025	But what did you go out to see ? a man in soft clothing ? See now , those who have beautiful clothing and delicate food are in kings ' houses .
42007026	But what did you go out to see ? a prophet ? Yes , I say to you , and more than a prophet .
42007027	This is he of whom it has been said , See , I send my servant before your face , who will make ready your way before you .
42007028	I say to you , Among all the sons of women , not one is greater than John : but he who is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
42007029	( And all the people , and the tax-farmers , to whom John had given baptism , when they had knowledge of these things , gave glory to God .
42007030	But the Pharisees and the teachers of the law were against the purpose of God for themselves , not having had his baptism . )
42007031	What comparison am I to make of the men of this generation ? what are they like ?
42007032	They are like children who are seated in the market-place , crying out to one another , and saying , We made music for you , but you did not take part in the dance ; we gave cries of sorrow , but you were not sad .
42007033	For John the Baptist came , taking no food or drink , and you say , He has an evil spirit .
42007034	The Son of man came feasting , and you say , Here is a lover of food and wine , a friend of tax-farmers and sinners .
42007035	But wisdom is judged to be right by all her children .
42007036	And one of the Pharisees made a request that he would take a meal with him . And he went into the Pharisee's house and took his seat at the table .
42007037	And there was a woman in the town who was a sinner ; and when she had news that he was a guest in the Pharisee's house , she took a bottle of perfume ,
42007038	And went in and took her place at the back of him , near his feet , weeping , so that his feet were washed with the drops from her eyes , and with her hair she made them dry , and kissing his feet she put the perfume on them .
42007039	Now when the Pharisee in whose house he was saw it , he said to himself , This man , if he was a prophet , would be conscious what sort of woman this is who has put her hands on him , that she is a sinner .
42007040	And Jesus , answering , said , Simon , I have something to say to you . And he said , Master , say on .
42007041	And he said , Two men were in debt to a certain man of business : one had a debt of five hundred pence , and the other of fifty .
42007042	When they were unable to make payment , he made the two of them free of their debts . Which of them , now , will have the greater love for him ?
42007043	Simon , in answer , said , It seems he whose debt was greater . And he said , Your decision is right .
42007044	And turning to the woman he said to Simon , You see this woman ? I came into your house ; you did not give me water for my feet : but she has been washing my feet with the drops from her eyes , and drying them with her hair .
42007045	You did not give me a kiss : but she , from the time when I came in , has gone on kissing my feet .
42007046	You put no oil on my head : but she has put perfume on my feet .
42007047	And so I say to you , She will have forgiveness for her sins which are great in number , because of her great love : but he who has small need of forgiveness gives little love .
42007048	And he said to her , You have forgiveness for your sins .
42007049	And those who were seated at table with him said to themselves , Who is this who even gives forgiveness of sins ?
42007050	And he said to the woman , By your faith you have salvation ; go in peace .
42008001	And it came about , after a short time , that he went through town and country giving the good news of the kingdom of God , and with him were the twelve ,
42008002	And certain women who had been made free from evil spirits and diseases , Mary named Magdalene , from whom seven evil spirits had gone out ,
42008003	And Joanna , the wife of Chuza , Herod's chief house-servant , and Susanna and a number of others , who gave him of their wealth for his needs .
42008004	And when a great number of people came together , and men from every town went out to him , he gave them teaching in the form of a story :
42008005	A man went out to put in seed , and while he was doing it , some was dropped by the wayside and it was crushed under foot , and was taken by the birds of heaven .
42008006	And some went on the rock , and when it came up it became dry and dead because it had no water .
42008007	And some went among thorns , and the thorns came up with it and it had no room for growth .
42008008	And some falling on good earth , came up and gave fruit a hundred times as much . And with these words he said in a loud voice , He who has ears , let him give ear .
42008009	And his disciples put questions to him about the point of the story .
42008010	And he said , To you is given knowledge of the secrets of the kingdom of God ; but to the others , they are given in stories , so that seeing , they may not see , and though they give hearing , the sense will not be clear to them .
42008011	Now this is the point of the story : The seed is the word of God .
42008012	Those by the side of the road are those who have given hearing ; then the Evil One comes and takes away the word from their hearts , so that they may not have faith and get salvation .
42008013	And those on the rock are those who with joy give hearing to the word ; but having no root , they have faith for a time , and when the test comes they give up .
42008014	And those which went among thorns are those who have given hearing , and go on their way , but they are overcome by cares and wealth and the pleasures of life , and they give no fruit .
42008015	And those in the good earth are those who , having given ear to the word , keep it with a good and true heart , and in quiet strength give fruit .
42008016	No man , when the light is lighted , puts a cover over it , or puts it under a bed , but he puts it on its table , so that those who come in may see the light .
42008017	For nothing is put out of view which will not be made clear , and nothing is secret of which the knowledge will not come to light .
42008018	So take care how you give hearing , for to him who has will be given , and from him who has not will be taken even what he seems to have .
42008019	And his mother and his brothers came to him , and they were not able to get near him because of the great number of people .
42008020	And someone said to him , Your mother and your brothers are outside desiring to see you .
42008021	But he said to them in answer , My mother and my brothers are those who have knowledge of the word of God and do it .
42008022	Now it came about on one of those days that he got into a boat with his disciples ; and he said to them , Let us go over to the other side of the water : and they put out the boat .
42008023	But while they were sailing he went to sleep : and a storm of wind came down on the sea , and the boat became full of water and they were in danger .
42008024	Then they came to him and , awaking him out of his sleep , said , Master , Master , destruction is near . And he , when he was awake , gave orders to the wind and the rolling waves , and the storm came to an end , and all was calm .
42008025	And he said to them , Where is your faith ? And fear and wonder overcame them , and they said to one another , Who then is this , who gives orders even to the winds and the water and they do what he says ?
42008026	And they came to the country of the Gerasenes , which is opposite Galilee .
42008027	And when he had come to the land , there came to him a certain man from the town who had evil spirits ; and for a long time he had had no clothing on , and was not living in a house but in the place of the dead .
42008028	And when he saw Jesus , he gave a loud cry and went down on the earth before him and in a loud voice said , What have I to do with you , Jesus , Son of the Most High God ? Do not be cruel to me .
42008029	For he gave an order to the evil spirit to come out of the man . For frequently it would take a grip of him : and he was kept under control , and prisoned with chains ; but parting the chains in two , he would be sent by the driving of the evil spirit into waste places .
42008030	And Jesus said to him , What is your name ? And he said , Legion ; for a number of spirits had gone into him .
42008031	And they made a request to him that he would not give them an order to go away into the deep .
42008032	Now there was a great herd of pigs in that place , getting food on the mountain : and the evil spirits made a request to him that he would let them go into the pigs , and he let them .
42008033	And the evil spirits came out of the man and went into the pigs : and the herd went rushing down a sharp slope into the water and came to destruction .
42008034	And when the men who took care of them saw what had come about , they went quickly and gave news of it in the town and the country .
42008035	And they went out to see what had taken place , and they came to Jesus and saw the man out of whom the evil spirits had gone , seated , clothed and with full use of his senses , at the feet of Jesus ; and fear came on them .
42008036	And those who had seen it gave them an account of how the man who had the evil spirits was made well .
42008037	And all the people of the country of the Gerasenes made a request to him to go away from them ; for they were in great fear : and he got into a boat and went back .
42008038	But the man from whom the evil spirits had gone out had a great desire to be with him , but he sent him away , saying ,
42008039	Go back to your house and let them have news of all the great things which God has done for you . And he went away , giving word through all the town of the great things which Jesus had done for him .
42008040	And when Jesus went back , the people were glad to see him , for they were all waiting for him .
42008041	Then there came a man named Jairus , who was a ruler in the Synagogue : and he went down at the feet of Jesus , desiring him to come to his house ;
42008042	For he had an only daughter , about twelve years old , and she was near to death . But while he was on his way , the people were pushing to be near him .
42008043	And a woman , who had had a flow of blood for twelve years , and had given all her money to medical men , and not one of them was able to make her well ,
42008044	Came after him and put her hand on the edge of his robe , and straight away the flowing of her blood was stopped .
42008045	And Jesus said , Who was touching me ? And when they all said , It is not I , Peter and those who were with him said , Master , the people are pushing round you on every side .
42008046	But Jesus said , Someone was touching me , for I had the feeling that power had gone out from me .
42008047	And when the woman saw that she was not able to keep it secret , she came , shaking with fear , and falling down before him she made clear before all the people the reason for her touching him , and how she was made well straight away .
42008048	And he said to her , Daughter , your faith has made you well ; go in peace .
42008049	While he was still talking , someone came from the house of the ruler of the Synagogue , saying , Your daughter is dead ; do not go on troubling the Master .
42008050	But Jesus at these words said to him , Have no fear , only have faith , and she will be made well .
42008051	And when he came to the house he did not let any man go in with him , but only Peter and John and James , and the father of the girl and her mother .
42008052	And all the people were weeping and crying for her ; but he said , Do not be sad , for she is not dead , but sleeping .
42008053	And they were laughing at him , being certain that she was dead .
42008054	But he , taking her hand , said to her , My child , get up .
42008055	And her spirit came back to her and she got up straight away : and he gave orders that food was to be given to her .
42008056	And her father and mother were full of wonder , but he gave orders to them to say nothing about it to anyone .
42009001	And getting the twelve together , he gave them power and authority over all evil spirits and over diseases , to make them well .
42009002	And he sent them out to be preachers of the kingdom of God , and to make well those who were ill .
42009003	And he said to them , Take nothing for your journey , no stick or bag or bread or money , and do not take two coats .
42009004	And if you go into a house , let that house be your resting-place till you go away .
42009005	And if any people will not take you in , when you go away from that town , put off its dust from your feet for a witness against them .
42009006	And they went away , journeying through all the towns , preaching the good news and making people free from diseases in all places .
42009007	Now Herod the king had news of all these things : and he was in doubt , because it was said by some people that John had come back from the dead ;
42009008	And by some , that Elijah had come ; and by others , that one of the old prophets had come back to life .
42009009	And Herod said , I put John to death : but who is this , of whom such stories are given to me ? And he had a desire to see him .
42009010	And the twelve , when they came back , gave him an account of what they had done . And he took them with him and went away from the people to a town named Beth-saida .
42009011	But the people , getting news of it , went after him : and he was pleased to see them , and gave them teaching about the kingdom of God , and made those well who were in need of it .
42009012	And the day went on ; and the twelve came to him and said , Send these people away so that they may go into the towns and the country round about and get resting-places and food for themselves , for we are in a waste place .
42009013	But he said , Give them food yourselves . And they said , We have only five cakes of bread and two fishes , if we do not go and get food for all these people .
42009014	For there were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them be seated in groups , about fifty to a group .
42009015	And they did so , and made them all be seated .
42009016	And he took the five cakes of bread and the two fishes and , looking up to heaven , he said words of blessing over them , and when they had been broken , he gave them to the disciples to give to the people .
42009017	And they all took the food and had enough ; and they took up of the broken bits which were over , twelve baskets full .
42009018	And it came about that when he was in prayer , by himself , and the disciples were with him , he put a question to them , saying , Who do the people say I am ?
42009019	And they , answering , said , John the Baptist ; but others say Elijah ; and others , that one of the old prophets has come back .
42009020	And he said , But who do you say that I am ? And Peter , answering , said , The Christ of God .
42009021	But he gave them special orders , not to say this to any man ;
42009022	Saying , The Son of man will undergo much and be put on one side by the rulers and the chief priests and the teachers of the law , and be put to death , and on the third day he will come back to life .
42009023	And he said to them all , If any man has a desire to come after me , let him give up all , and take up his cross every day , and come after me .
42009024	For whoever has a desire to keep his life will have it taken from him , but whoever gives up his life because of me , will keep it .
42009025	For what profit will a man have if he gets all the world , but undergoes loss or destruction himself ?
42009026	For if any man has a feeling of shame because of me or of my words , the Son of man will have shame because of him when he comes in his glory and the glory of the Father and of the holy angels .
42009027	But truly I say to you , Some of those who are here now will have no taste of death till they see the kingdom of God .
42009028	And about eight days after he had said these things , he took Peter and John and James with him and went up into the mountain for prayer .
42009029	And while he was in prayer , his face was changed and his clothing became white and shining .
42009030	And two men , Moses and Elijah , were talking with him ;
42009031	Who were seen in glory and were talking of his death which was about to take place in Jerusalem .
42009032	Now Peter and those who were with him were overcome with sleep : but when they were fully awake , they saw his glory and the two men who were with him .
42009033	And when they were about to go away from him , Peter said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here ; let us make three tents , one for you and one for Moses and one for Elijah : having no knowledge of what he was saying .
42009034	And while he said these things , the shade of a cloud came over them , and they were full of fear when they went into the cloud .
42009035	And there was a voice from the cloud saying , This is my Son , the man of my selection ; give ear to him .
42009036	And after the voice was gone they saw that Jesus was by himself . And they kept quiet , and said nothing at that time to anyone of the things which they had seen .
42009037	And on the day after , when they came down from the mountain , a great band of people came to him .
42009038	And a man from among them , crying out , said , Master , I make a request to you , give a thought to my son , for he is my only child :
42009039	And see , a spirit takes him , and suddenly he gives a cry , twisted in pain and streaming at the lips , and when it goes away from him at last , he is marked as from blows .
42009040	And I made a request to your disciples to send it out of him , but they were not able to do it .
42009041	And Jesus said , O generation without faith and false in heart , how long will I have to be with you and put up with you ? let your son come here .
42009042	And while he was coming , he was pushed violently down and twisted by the evil spirit . But Jesus gave sharp orders to the unclean spirit , and made the boy well , and gave him back to his father .
42009043	And they were full of wonder at the great power of God . But while they were all wondering at all the things which he did , he said to his disciples ,
42009044	Let these words go deep into your ears , for the Son of man will be given up into the hands of men .
42009045	But this saying was not clear to them and its sense was kept secret from them so that they were not able to see it : and they had fear of questioning him about it .
42009046	Now there was a discussion among them about which of them would be the greatest .
42009047	But when Jesus saw the reasoning of their hearts , he took a small child and put him by his side ,
42009048	And said to them , Whoever gives honour to this child in my name , gives honour to me : and whoever gives honour to me , gives honour to him who sent me : for whoever is least among you all , that man is great .
42009049	And John , answering , said , Master , we saw a man driving out evil spirits in your name , and we did not let him do it , because he was not one of us .
42009050	But Jesus said to him , Let him do it , for he who is not against you is for you .
42009051	And it came about that when the days were near for him to be taken up , his face was turned to go to Jerusalem ,
42009052	And he sent men before : and they came to a small town of Samaria to make ready for him .
42009053	But they would not have him there , because he was clearly going to Jerusalem .
42009054	And when his disciples , James and John , saw this , they said , Lord , may we send fire from heaven and put an end to them ?
42009055	But turning round he said sharp words to them .
42009056	And they went to another small town .
42009057	And when they were on the way , a certain man said to him , I will come after you wherever you go .
42009058	And Jesus said to him , Foxes have holes and the birds of the air have resting-places , but the Son of man has nowhere to put his head .
42009059	And he said to another , Come after me . But he said , Lord , let me first go and give the last honours to my father .
42009060	But he said to him , Let the dead take care of their dead ; it is for you to go and give news of the kingdom of God .
42009061	And another man said , I will come with you , Lord , but first let me say a last good-day to those who are at my house .
42009062	But Jesus said , No man , having put his hand to the plough and looking back , is good enough for the kingdom of God .
42010001	Now after these things , the Lord made selection of seventy others and sent them before him , two together , into every town and place where he himself was about to come .
42010002	And he said to them , There is much grain ready to be cut , but not enough workers : so make prayer to the Lord of the grain-fields that he will send workers to get in the grain .
42010003	Go on your way : see , I send you out like lambs among wolves .
42010004	Take no bag for money or for food , and no shoes ; say no word to any man on the way .
42010005	And whenever you go into a house , first say , Peace be to this house .
42010006	And if a son of peace is there , your peace will be with him : but if not , it will come back to you again .
42010007	And keep in that same house , taking what food and drink they give you : for the worker has a right to his reward . Do not go from house to house .
42010008	And into whatever town you go , if they take you in , take whatever food is given to you :
42010009	And make well those in it who are ill and say to them , The kingdom of God is near to you .
42010010	But if you go into a town where they will not have you , go out into the streets of it and say ,
42010011	Even the dust of your town , which is on our feet , we put off as a witness against you ; but be certain of this , that the kingdom of God is near .
42010012	I say to you , It will be better in that day for Sodom than for that town .
42010013	A curse is on you , Chorazin ! A curse is on you , Beth-saida ! For if such works of power had been done in Tyre and Sidon as have been done in you , they would have been turned from their sins , in days gone by , seated in the dust .
42010014	But it will be better for Tyre and Sidon , in the day of judging , than for you .
42010015	And you , Capernaum , were you not lifted up to heaven ? you will go down to hell .
42010016	Whoever gives ear to you , gives ear to me ; and whoever is against you , is against me ; and whoever is against me , is against him who sent me .
42010017	And the seventy came back with joy , saying , Lord , even the evil spirits are under our power in your name .
42010018	And he said , I was watching for Satan , falling from heaven like a star .
42010019	See , I have given you power to put your feet on snakes and evil beasts , and over all the strength of him who is against you : and nothing will do you damage .
42010020	Do not be glad , however , because you have power over spirits , but because your names are recorded in heaven .
42010021	In that same hour he was full of joy in the Holy Spirit and said , I give praise to you , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because you have kept these things secret from the wise and the men of learning , and have made them clear to little children : for so , O Father , it was pleasing in your eyes .
42010022	All things have been given to me by my Father : and no one has knowledge of the Son , but only the Father : and of the Father , but only the Son , and he to whom the Son will make it clear .
42010023	And , turning to the disciples , he said privately , Happy are the eyes which see the things you see :
42010024	For I say to you that numbers of prophets and kings have had a desire to see the things which you see , and have not seen them , and to have knowledge of the things which have come to your ears , and they had it not .
42010025	And a certain teacher of the law got up and put him to the test , saying , Master , what have I to do so that I may have eternal life ?
42010026	And he said to him , What does the law say , in your reading of it ?
42010027	And he , answering , said , Have love for the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind ; and for your neighbour as for yourself .
42010028	And he said , You have given the right answer : do this and you will have life .
42010029	But he , desiring to put himself in the right , said to Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
42010030	And Jesus , answering him , said , A certain man was going down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and he got into the hands of thieves , who took his clothing and gave him cruel blows , and when they went away , he was half dead .
42010031	And by chance a certain priest was going down that way : and when he saw him , he went by on the other side .
42010032	And in the same way , a Levite , when he came to the place and saw him , went by on the other side .
42010033	But a certain man of Samaria , journeying that way , came where he was , and when he saw him , he was moved with pity for him ,
42010034	And came to him and put clean linen round his wounds , with oil and wine ; and he put him on his beast and took him to a house and took care of him .
42010035	And the day after he took two pennies and gave them to the owner of the house and said , Take care of him ; and if this money is not enough , when I come again I will give you whatever more is needed .
42010036	Which of these three men , in your opinion , was neighbour to the man who came into the hands of thieves ?
42010037	And he said , The one who had mercy on him . And Jesus said , Go and do the same .
42010038	Now , while they were on their way , he came to a certain town ; and a woman named Martha took him into her house .
42010039	And she had a sister , by name Mary , who took her seat at the Lord's feet and gave attention to his words .
42010040	But Martha had her hands full of the work of the house , and she came to him and said , Lord , is it nothing to you that my sister has let me do all the work ? Say to her that she is to give me some help .
42010041	But the Lord , answering , said to her , Martha , Martha , you are full of care and troubled about such a number of things :
42010042	Little is needed , or even one thing only : for Mary has taken that good part , which will not be taken away from her .
42011001	And it came about that he was in prayer in a certain place , and when he came to an end , one of his disciples said to him , Lord , will you give us teaching about prayer , as John did to his disciples ?
42011002	And he said to them , When you say your prayers , say , Father , may your name be kept holy and your kingdom come .
42011003	Give us every day bread for our needs .
42011004	May we have forgiveness for our sins , as we make free all those who are in debt to us . And let us not be put to the test .
42011005	And he said to them , Which of you , having a friend , would go to him in the middle of the night and say to him , Friend , let me have three cakes of bread ;
42011006	Because a friend of mine has come to me on a journey , and I have nothing to put before him ;
42011007	And he , from inside the house , would say in answer , Do not be a trouble to me ; the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; it is not possible for me to get up and give to you ?
42011008	I say to you , Though he will not get up and give to him , because he is his friend , still , if he keeps on making his request , he will get up and give him as much as he has need of .
42011009	And I say to you , Make requests , and they will be answered ; what you are searching for , you will get ; when you give the sign , the door will be open to you .
42011010	For to everyone who makes a request , it will be given ; and he who is searching will get his desire ; and to him who gives the sign , the door will be open .
42011011	And which of you , being a father , will give a stone to his son , who makes request for bread ? or for a fish , will give him a snake ?
42011012	Or for an egg , will give him a scorpion ?
42011013	If , then , you who are evil are able to give good things to your children , how much more will your Father in heaven give the Holy Spirit to those who make request to him ?
42011014	And he was sending an evil spirit out of a man who was without the power of talking . And it came about that when the spirit had gone the man had the power of talking ; and the people were full of wonder .
42011015	But some of them said , He sends out evil spirits by Beelzebul , the ruler of evil spirits .
42011016	And others , testing him , were looking for a sign from heaven from him .
42011017	But he , having knowledge of their thoughts , said to them , Every kingdom in which there is division is made waste ; and a house in which there is division comes to destruction .
42011018	If , then , Satan is at war with himself , how will he keep his kingdom ? because you say that I send evil spirits out of men by the help of Beelzebul .
42011019	And if I , by Beelzebul , send out evil spirits , by whose help do your sons send them out ? so let them be your judges .
42011020	But if I , by the finger of God , send out evil spirits , then the kingdom of God has overtaken you .
42011021	When the strong man armed keeps watch over his house , then his goods are safe :
42011022	But when one who is stronger makes an attack on him and overcomes him , he takes away his instruments of war , in which he had put his faith , and makes division of his goods .
42011023	He who is not with me is against me , and he who will not give me help in getting people together is driving them away .
42011024	The unclean spirit , when he has gone out of a man , goes through dry places , looking for rest ; and when he does not get it , he says , I will go back to my house from which I came .
42011025	And when he comes , he sees that it has been made fair and clean .
42011026	Then he goes and gets seven other spirits more evil than himself , and they go in , and take their places there : and the last condition of that man is worse than the first .
42011027	And it came about that when he said these things , a certain woman among the people said in a loud voice , Happy is the body which gave you birth , and the breasts from which you took milk .
42011028	But he said , More happy are they who give hearing to the word of God and keep it .
42011029	And when a great number of people came together to him , he said , This generation is an evil generation : it is looking for a sign and no sign will be given to it but the sign of Jonah .
42011030	For even as Jonah became a sign to the Ninevites , so will the Son of man be to this generation .
42011031	The queen of the South will come up on the day of judging and give her decision against the men of this generation : for she came from the ends of the earth to give ear to the wisdom of Solomon ; and now something greater than Solomon is here .
42011032	The men of Nineveh will come up in the day of judging and give their decision against this generation : for they were turned away from their sins at the preaching of Jonah ; but now something greater than Jonah is here .
42011033	No man , when the light has been lighted , puts it in a secret place , or under a vessel , but on its table , so that those who come in may see the light .
42011034	The light of the body is the eye : when your eye is true , all your body is full of light ; but when it is evil , your body is dark .
42011035	So take care that the light which is in you is not dark .
42011036	If , then , all your body is light , with no part of it dark , it will be completely full of light , as when a flame with its bright shining gives you light .
42011037	Now , while he was talking , a Pharisee made a request that he would come to a meal with him ; and he went in and took his seat at the meal .
42011038	And when the Pharisee saw it , he was surprised because he came to the meal without first washing himself .
42011039	And the Lord said to him , You Pharisees make the outside of the cup and the plate clean ; but inside you are thieves and full of evil .
42011040	O you foolish ones ! did not he who made the outside in the same way make the inside ?
42011041	But if you give to the poor such things as you are able , then all things are clean to you .
42011042	But a curse is on you , Pharisees ! for you make men give a tenth of every sort of plant , and give no thought to right and the love of God ; but it is right for you to do these things , and not let the others be undone .
42011043	A curse is on you , Pharisees ! for your desires are for the most important seats in the Synagogues and for words of respect said to you in the market-place .
42011044	A curse is on you ! for you are like the resting-places of dead men , which are not seen , and men go walking over them without knowledge of it .
42011045	And one of the teachers of the law , answering , said to him , Master , in saying this , you give a bad name to us as to them .
42011046	And he said , A curse is on you , teachers of the law ! for while other men are crushed under the weight of the rules you make for them , you yourselves do not put so much as one finger to them .
42011047	A curse is on you ! for you make resting-places for the bodies of the prophets , but your fathers put them to death .
42011048	So you are witnesses and give approval to the work of your fathers ; for they put them to death and you make their last resting-places .
42011049	For this reason the wisdom of God has said , I will send them prophets and teachers , and to some of them they will give death and cruel pains ;
42011050	So that punishment may come on this generation for the blood of all the prophets which was given from the earliest days ;
42011051	From the blood of Abel to the blood of Zachariah , who was put to death between the altar and the Temple . Yes , I say to you , It will come on this generation .
42011052	A curse is on you , teachers of the law ! for you have taken away the key of knowledge : you did not go in yourselves , and you got in the way of those who were going in .
42011053	And when he had come out of that place , the scribes and the Pharisees came round him angrily , questioning him about more things ;
42011054	And watching him , for a chance to get something from his words which might be used against him .
42012001	At that time , when thousands of the people had come together , in such numbers that they were crushing one another , he said first to his disciples , Have nothing to do with the leaven of the Pharisees , which is deceit .
42012002	But nothing is covered up , which will not come to light , or secret , which will not be made clear .
42012003	So , whatever you have said in the dark , will come to men's hearing in the light , and what you have said secretly inside the house , will be made public from the house-tops .
42012004	And I say to you , my friends , Have no fear of those who may put the body to death , and are able to do no more than that .
42012005	But I will make clear to you of whom you are to be in fear : of him who after death has power to send you to hell ; yes , truly I say , Have fear of him .
42012006	Are not five sparrows given in exchange for two farthings ? and God has every one of them in mind .
42012007	But even the hairs of your head are numbered . Have no fear : you are of more value than a flock of sparrows .
42012008	And I say to you that to everyone who gives witness to me before men , the Son of man will give witness before the angels of God .
42012009	But if anyone says before men that he has no knowledge of me , I will say that I have no knowledge of him before the angels of God .
42012010	And if anyone says a word against the Son of man , he will have forgiveness : but for him who says evil words against the Holy Spirit , there will be no forgiveness .
42012011	And when they take you before the Synagogues and the authorities and the rulers , take no thought about what answers you will give , or what you will say :
42012012	For the Holy Spirit will make clear to you in that very hour what to say .
42012013	And one of the people said to him , Master , give an order to my brother to make division of the heritage with me .
42012014	But he said , Man , who made me a judge or a maker of decisions for you ?
42012015	And he said to them , Take care to keep yourselves free from the desire for property ; for a man's life is not made up of the number of things which he has .
42012016	And he said to them , in a story , The land of a certain man of great wealth was very fertile :
42012017	And he said to himself , What is to be done ? for I have no place in which to put all my fruit .
42012018	And he said , This I will do : I will take down my store-houses and make greater ones , and there I will put all my grain and my goods .
42012019	And I will say to my soul , Soul , you have a great amount of goods in store , enough for a number of years ; be at rest , take food and wine and be happy .
42012020	But God said to him , You foolish one , tonight I will take your soul from you , and who then will be the owner of all the things which you have got together ?
42012021	So that is what comes to the man who gets wealth for himself , and has not wealth in the eyes of God .
42012022	And he said to his disciples , For this reason I say to you , Take no thought for your life , about what food you will take , or for your body , how it may be clothed .
42012023	Is not life more than food , and the body than its clothing ?
42012024	Give thought to the ravens ; they do not put seeds into the earth , or get together grain ; they have no store-houses or buildings ; and God gives them their food : of how much greater value are you than the birds !
42012025	And which of you by taking thought is able to make himself any taller ?
42012026	If , then , you are not able to do even that which is least , why are you troubled about the rest ?
42012027	Give thought to the flowers : they do no work , they make no thread ; and still I say to you , Even Solomon , in all his glory , was not clothed like one of these .
42012028	But if God gives such clothing to the grass in the field , which today is living , and tomorrow will be burned in the oven , how much more will he give clothing to you , O men of little faith ?
42012029	And do not give overmuch thought to your food and drink , and let not your mind be full of doubts .
42012030	For the nations of the world go in search of all these things : but your Father has knowledge that you have need of them .
42012031	But let your chief care be for his kingdom , and these other things will be given to you in addition .
42012032	Have no fear , little flock , for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
42012033	Give what property you have in exchange for money , and give the money to the poor ; make for yourselves money-bags which will not get old , wealth stored up in heaven which will be yours for ever , where thieves will not come nor worms put it to destruction .
42012034	For where your wealth is , there will your heart be .
42012035	Be ready , dressed as for a journey , with your lights burning .
42012036	And be like men who are looking for their lord , when he comes back from the bride-feast ; so that when he comes to the door , it will be open to him quickly .
42012037	Happy are those servants who are watching when the lord comes ; truly I say to you , he will make himself their servant and , placing them at the table , he will come out and give them food .
42012038	And if he comes in the second division of the night or in the third , and they are watching for him , happy are those servants .
42012039	But be certain of this , that if the master of the house had had knowledge of the time when the thief was coming , he would have been watching , and would not have let his house be broken into .
42012040	So be ready : for the Son of man is coming at a time when you are not looking for him .
42012041	And Peter said to him , Lord , are these words said to us only , or to all men ?
42012042	And the Lord said , Who then is the wise and responsible servant whom his lord will put in control of his family , to give them their food at the right time ?
42012043	Happy is that servant who , when his lord comes , is doing so .
42012044	Truly I say to you , he will put him in control of all his goods .
42012045	But if that servant says to himself , My lord is a long time coming ; and goes about giving blows to the men-servants and the women-servants , feasting and taking overmuch wine ;
42012046	The lord of that servant will come at a time when he is not looking for him , and at an hour when he is not ready for him , and he will have him cut in two and will give him his part in the fate of those who have no faith ;
42012047	And the servant who had knowledge of his lord's desires and was not ready for him and did not do as he was ordered , will be given a great number of blows ;
42012048	But he who , without knowledge , did things for which punishment is given , will get only a small number of blows . The man to whom much is given , will have to give much ; if much is given into his care , of him more will be requested .
42012049	I came to send a fire on the earth , and it may even now have been lighted .
42012050	But there is a baptism which I have to undergo ; and how am I kept back till it is complete !
42012051	Is it your opinion that I have come to give peace on earth ? I say to you , No , but division :
42012052	For from this time , a family of five in one house will be on opposite sides , three against two and two against three .
42012053	They will be at war , the father against his son , and the son against his father ; mother against daughter , and daughter against mother ; mother-in-law against daughter-in-law , and daughter-in-law against mother-in-law .
42012054	Then he said to the people , When you see a cloud coming up in the west , straight away you say , There will be rain ; and so it is .
42012055	And when you see a south wind blowing , you say , There will be heat ; and so it is .
42012056	O false ones ! the face of the earth and the heaven is clear to you ; how is it that the signs of these times are not as clear to you ?
42012057	And why are you , in your hearts , unable to be judges of what is right ?
42012058	For if anyone has a cause at law against you , and you are going with him before the ruler , make an attempt , on the way , to come to an agreement with him , for if you do not , he may take you before the judge and the judge will give you up to the police , and they will put you in prison .
42012059	I say to you , You will not come out of it till you have made payment to the very last farthing .
42013001	Now some people who were there at that time , gave him an account of how the blood of some Galilaeans had been mixed by Pilate with their offerings .
42013002	And he , in answer , said to them , Are you of the opinion that these Galilaeans were worse than all other Galilaeans , because these things were done to them ?
42013003	I say to you , It is not so : but if your hearts are not changed , you will all come to the same end .
42013004	Or those eighteen men who were crushed by the fall of the tower of Siloam , were they worse than all the other men living in Jerusalem ?
42013005	I say to you , It is not so : but if your hearts are not changed , you will all come to an end in the same way .
42013006	And he made up this story for them : A certain man had a fig-tree in his garden , and he came to get fruit from it , and there was no fruit .
42013007	And he said to the gardener , See , for three years I have been looking for fruit from this tree , and I have not had any : let it be cut down ; why is it taking up space ?
42013008	And he said , Lord , let it be for this year , and I will have the earth turned up round it , and put animal waste on it , to make it fertile :
42013009	And if , after that , it has fruit , it is well ; if not , let it be cut down .
42013010	And he was teaching in one of the Synagogues on the Sabbath .
42013011	And there was a woman who had had a disease for eighteen years ; she was bent , and was not able to make herself straight .
42013012	And when Jesus saw her , he said to her , Woman , you are made free from your disease .
42013013	And he put his hands on her , and she was made straight , and gave praise to God .
42013014	And the ruler of the Synagogue was angry because Jesus had made her well on the Sabbath , and he said to the people , There are six days in which men may do work : so come on those days to be made well , and not on the Sabbath .
42013015	But the Lord gave him an answer and said , O you false men ! do you not , every one of you , on the Sabbath , let loose his ox and his ass and take it to the water ?
42013016	And is it not right for this daughter of Abraham , who has been in the power of Satan for eighteen years , to be made free on the Sabbath ?
42013017	And when he said these things , those who were against him were shamed , and all the people were full of joy because of the great things which were done by him .
42013018	Then he said , What is the kingdom of God like ? what comparison may I make of it ?
42013019	It is like a grain of mustard seed which a man took and put in his garden , and it became a tree , and the birds of heaven made their resting-places in its branches .
42013020	And again he said , What is the kingdom of God like ?
42013021	It is like leaven , which a woman put into three measures of meal , and it was all leavened .
42013022	And he went on his way , through towns and country places , teaching and journeying to Jerusalem .
42013023	And someone said to him , Lord , will only a small number have salvation ? And he said to them ,
42013024	Do your best to go in by the narrow door , for I say to you , A number will make the attempt to go in , but will not be able to do so .
42013025	When the master of the house has got up , and the door has been shut , and you , still outside , give blows on the door , saying , Lord , let us in ; he will make answer and say , I have no knowledge of where you come from .
42013026	Then you will say , We have taken food and drink with you , and you were teaching in our streets .
42013027	But he will say , Truly , I have no knowledge of you or where you come from ; go away from me , you workers of evil .
42013028	There will be weeping and cries of sorrow when you see Abraham , Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , but you yourselves are shut outside .
42013029	And they will come from the east and from the west , from the north and from the south , and take their places in the kingdom of God .
42013030	And the last will be first , and the first will be last .
42013031	At that time , certain Pharisees came to him and said , Go away from this place , because Herod's purpose is to put you to death .
42013032	And he said , Go and say to that fox , I send out evil spirits and do works of mercy today and tomorrow , and on the third day my work will be complete .
42013033	But I have to go on my way today and tomorrow and the third day , for it is not right for a prophet to come to his death outside Jerusalem .
42013034	O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , putting to death the prophets , and stoning those who were sent to her ! again and again would I have taken your children to myself , as a bird takes her young ones under her wings , but you would not !
42013035	Now see , your house is waste , and I say to you , You will not see me again till you say , A blessing on him who comes in the name of the Lord .
