42014001	And it came about that when he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees on the Sabbath , to have a meal , they were watching him .
42014002	And a certain man was there who had a disease .
42014003	And Jesus , answering , said to the scribes and Pharisees , Is it right to make people well on the Sabbath or not ?
42014004	But they said nothing . And he made him well and sent him away .
42014005	And he said to them , Which of you , whose ox or ass has got into a water-hole , will not straight away get him out on the Sabbath ?
42014006	And they had no answer to that question .
42014007	And he gave teaching in the form of a story to the guests who came to the feast , when he saw how they took the best seats ; saying to them ,
42014008	When you get a request to come to a feast , do not take the best seat , for a more important man than you may be coming ,
42014009	And then the giver of the feast will come to you and say , Give your place to this man ; and you , with shame , will have to take the lowest seat .
42014010	But when you come , go and take the lowest seat , so that when the giver of the feast comes , he may say to you , Friend , come up higher ; and then you will have honour in the eyes of all the others who are there .
42014011	For every man who gives himself a high place will be put down , but he who takes a low place will be lifted up .
42014012	And he said to the master of the house , When you give a feast , do not send for your friends and your brothers and your family or your neighbours who have wealth , for they may give a feast for you , and so you will get a reward .
42014013	But when you give a feast , send for the poor and the blind and those who are broken in body :
42014014	And you will have a blessing , because they will not be able to give you any payment , and you will get your reward when the upright come back from the dead .
42014015	And , hearing these words , one of those who were at table with him said to him , Happy is the man who will be a guest in the kingdom of God .
42014016	And he said to them , A certain man gave a great feast , and sent word of it to a number of people .
42014017	And when the time had come , he sent his servants to say to them , Come , for all things are now ready .
42014018	And they all gave reasons why they were not able to come . The first said to him , I have got a new field , and it is necessary for me to go and see it : I am full of regret that I am unable to come .
42014019	And another said , I have got some cattle , and I am going to make a test of them : I am full of regret that I am unable to come .
42014020	And another said , I have been married , and so I am not able to come .
42014021	And the servant came back and gave his master an account of these things . Then the master of the house was angry and said to the servant , Go out quickly into the streets of the town and get the poor , the blind , and those who are broken in body .
42014022	And the servant said , Lord , your orders have been done , and still there is room .
42014023	And the lord said to the servant , Go out into the roads and the fields , and make them come in , so that my house may be full .
42014024	For I say to you that not one of those who were requested to come will have a taste of my feast .
42014025	Now a great number of people went with him .
42014026	And turning round , he said to them , If any man comes to me , and has not hate for his father and mother and wife and children and brothers and sisters , and even for his life , he may not be my disciple .
42014027	Whoever does not take up his cross and come after me may not be my disciple .
42014028	For which of you , desiring to put up a tower , does not first give much thought to the price , if he will have enough to make it complete ?
42014029	For fear that if he makes a start and is not able to go on with it to the end , all who see it will be laughing at him ,
42014030	And saying , This man made a start at building and is not able to make it complete .
42014031	Or what king , going to war with another king , will not first take thought if he will be strong enough , with ten thousand men , to keep off him who comes against him with twenty thousand ?
42014032	Or while the other is still a great distance away , he sends representatives requesting conditions of peace .
42014033	And so whoever is not ready to give up all he has may not be my disciple .
42014034	For salt is good , but if the taste goes from it , of what use is it ?
42014035	It is no good for the land or for the place of waste ; no one has a use for it . He who has ears , let him give ear .
42015001	Now all the tax-farmers and sinners came near to give ear to him .
42015002	And the Pharisees and scribes were angry , saying , This man gives approval to sinners , and takes food with them .
42015003	And he made a story for them , saying ,
42015004	What man of you , having a hundred sheep , if one of them gets loose and goes away , will not let the ninety-nine be in the waste land by themselves , and go after the wandering one , till he sees where it is ?
42015005	And when he has got it again , he takes it in his arms with joy .
42015006	And when he gets back to his house , he sends for his neighbours and friends , saying to them , Be glad with me , for I have got back my sheep which had gone away .
42015007	I say to you that even so there will be more joy in heaven when one sinner is turned away from his wrongdoing , than for ninety-nine good men , who have no need of a change of heart .
42015008	Or what woman , having ten bits of silver , if one bit has gone from her hands , will not get a light , and go through her house , searching with care till she sees it ?
42015009	And when she has it again , she gets her friends and neighbours together , saying , Be glad with me , for I have got back the bit of silver which had gone from me .
42015010	Even so , I say to you , There is joy among the angels of God , when one sinner is turned away from his wrongdoing .
42015011	And he said , A certain man had two sons :
42015012	And the younger of them said to his father , Father , give me that part of your property which will be mine . And he made division of his goods between them .
42015013	And not long after , the younger son got together everything which was his and took a journey into a far-away country , and there all his money went in foolish living .
42015014	And when everything was gone , there was no food to be had in that country , and he was in need .
42015015	And he went and put himself into the hands of one of the people of that country , and he sent him into his fields to give the pigs their food .
42015016	And so great was his need that he would have been glad to take the pigs ' food , and no one gave him anything .
42015017	But when he came to his senses , he said , What numbers of my father's servants have bread enough , and more , while I am near to death here through need of food !
42015018	I will get up and go to my father , and will say to him , Father , I have done wrong , against heaven and in your eyes :
42015019	I am no longer good enough to be named your son : make me like one of your servants .
42015020	And he got up and went to his father . But while he was still far away , his father saw him and was moved with pity for him and went quickly and took him in his arms and gave him a kiss .
42015021	And his son said to him , Father , I have done wrong , against heaven and in your eyes : I am no longer good enough to be named your son .
42015022	But the father said to his servants , Get out the first robe quickly , and put it on him , and put a ring on his hand and shoes on his feet :
42015023	And get the fat young ox and put it to death , and let us have a feast , and be glad .
42015024	For this , my son , who was dead , is living again ; he had gone away from me , and has come back . And they were full of joy .
42015025	Now the older son was in the field : and when he came near the house , the sounds of music and dancing came to his ears .
42015026	And he sent for one of the servants , questioning him about what it might be .
42015027	And he said to him , Your brother has come ; and your father has had the young ox put to death because he has come back safely .
42015028	But he was angry and would not go in ; and his father came out and made a request to him to come in .
42015029	But he made answer and said to his father , See , all these years I have been your servant , doing your orders in everything : and you never gave me even a young goat so that I might have a feast with my friends :
42015030	But when this your son came , who has been wasting your property with bad women , you put to death the fat young ox for him .
42015031	And he said to him , Son , you are with me at all times , and all I have is yours .
42015032	But it was right to be glad and to have a feast ; for this your brother , who was dead , is living again ; he had gone away and has come back .
42016001	And another time he said to the disciples , There was a certain man of great wealth who had a servant ; and it was said to him that this servant was wasting his goods .
42016002	And he sent for him and said , What is this which is said about you ? give me an account of all you have done , for you will no longer be the manager of my property .
42016003	And the servant said to himself , What am I to do now that my lord takes away my position ? I have not enough strength for working in the fields , and I would be shamed if I made requests for money from people in the streets .
42016004	I have come to a decision what to do , so that when I am put out of my position they will take me into their houses .
42016005	And sending for every one who was in debt to his lord he said to the first , What is the amount of your debt to my lord ?
42016006	And he said , A hundred measures of oil . And he said , Take your account straight away and put down fifty .
42016007	Then he said to another , What is the amount of your debt ? And he said , A hundred measures of grain . And he said to him , Take your account and put down eighty .
42016008	And his lord was pleased with the false servant , because he had been wise ; for the sons of this world are wiser in relation to their generation than the sons of light .
42016009	And I say to you , Make friends for yourselves through the wealth of this life , so that when it comes to an end , you may be taken into the eternal resting-places .
42016010	He who is true in a little , is true in much ; he who is false in small things , is false in great .
42016011	If , then , you have not been true in your use of the wealth of this life , who will give into your care the true wealth ?
42016012	And if you have not been true in your care of the property of other people , who will give you that which is yours ?
42016013	No man may be a servant to two masters : for he will have hate for the one and love for the other ; or he will keep to the one and have no respect for the other . You may not be servants of God and of wealth .
42016014	And the Pharisees , who had a great love of money , hearing these things , were making sport of him .
42016015	And he said , You take care to seem right in the eyes of men , but God sees your hearts : and those things which are important in the opinion of men , are evil in the eyes of God .
42016016	The law and the prophets were till John : but then came the preaching of the kingdom of God , and everyone makes his way into it by force .
42016017	But heaven and earth will come to an end before the smallest letter of the law may be dropped out .
42016018	Everyone who puts away his wife and takes another , is a false husband : and he who is married to a woman whose husband has put her away , is no true husband to her .
42016019	Now there was a certain man of great wealth , who was dressed in fair clothing of purple and delicate linen , and was shining and glad every day .
42016020	And a certain poor man , named Lazarus , was stretched out at his door , full of wounds ,
42016021	Desiring the broken bits of food which came from the table of the man of wealth ; and even the dogs came and put their tongues on his wounds .
42016022	And in time the poor man came to his end , and angels took him to Abraham's breast . And the man of wealth came to his end , and was put in the earth .
42016023	And in hell , being in great pain , lifting up his eyes he saw Abraham , far away , and Lazarus on his breast .
42016024	And he gave a cry and said , Father Abraham , have mercy on me and send Lazarus , so that he may put the end of his finger in water and put it on my tongue , for I am cruelly burning in this flame .
42016025	But Abraham said , Keep in mind , my son , that when you were living , you had your good things , while Lazarus had evil things : but now , he is comforted and you are in pain .
42016026	And in addition , there is a deep division fixed between us and you , so that those who might go from here to you are not able to do so , and no one may come from you to us .
42016027	And he said , Father , it is my request that you will send him to my father's house ;
42016028	For I have five brothers ; and let him give them an account of these things , so that they may not come to this place of pain .
42016029	But Abraham said , They have Moses and the prophets ; let them give ear to what they say .
42016030	And he said , No , father Abraham , but if someone went to them from the dead , their hearts would be changed .
42016031	And he said to him , If they will not give attention to Moses and the prophets , they will not be moved even if someone comes back from the dead .
42017001	And he said to his disciples , It is necessary for causes of trouble to come about , but unhappy is he by whom they come .
42017002	It would be well for him if a great stone was put round his neck and he was dropped into the sea , before he made trouble for any of these little ones .
42017003	Give attention to yourselves : if your brother does wrong , say a sharp word to him ; and if he has sorrow for his sin , let him have forgiveness .
42017004	And if he does you wrong seven times in a day , and seven times comes to you and says , I have regret for what I have done ; let him have forgiveness .
42017005	And the twelve said to the Lord , Make our faith greater .
42017006	And the Lord said , If your faith was only as great as a grain of mustard seed , you might say to this tree , Be rooted up and planted in the sea ; and it would be done .
42017007	But which of you , having a servant who is ploughing or keeping sheep , will say to him , when he comes in from the field , Come now and be seated and have a meal ,
42017008	Will he not say , Get a meal for me , and make yourself ready and see to my needs till I have had my food and drink ; and after that you may have yours ?
42017009	Does he give praise to the servant because he did what was ordered ?
42017010	In the same way , when you have done all the things which are given you to do , say , There is no profit in us , for we have only done what we were ordered to do .
42017011	And it came about that when they were on the way to Jerusalem he went through Samaria and Galilee .
42017012	And when he went into a certain small town he came across ten men who were lepers , and they , keeping themselves at a distance ,
42017013	Said , in loud voices , Jesus , Master , have mercy on us .
42017014	And when he saw them he said , Go , and let the priests see you . And , while they were going , they were made clean .
42017015	And one of them , when he saw that he was clean , turning back , gave praise to God in a loud voice ;
42017016	And , falling down on his face at the feet of Jesus , he gave the credit to him ; and he was a man of Samaria .
42017017	And Jesus said , Were there not ten men who were made clean ? where are the nine ?
42017018	Have not any of them come back to give glory to God , but only this one from a strange land ?
42017019	And he said to him , Get up , and go on your way ; your faith has made you well .
42017020	And when the Pharisees put questions to him about when the kingdom of God would come , he gave them an answer and said , The kingdom of God will not come through observation :
42017021	And men will not say , See , it is here ! or , There ! for the kingdom of God is among you .
42017022	And he said to his disciples , The time will come when you will have a great desire to see one of the days of the Son of man , but you will not see it .
42017023	And if they say to you , See , it is there ! or , It is here ! do not go away , or go after them .
42017024	For as in a thunderstorm the bright light is seen from one end of the sky to the other , so will the Son of man be when his time comes .
42017025	But first , he will have to undergo much and be put on one side by this generation .
42017026	And as it was in the days of Noah , so will it be in the day of the Son of man .
42017027	They were feasting and taking wives and getting married , till the day of the overflowing of the waters , when Noah went into the ark , and they all came to destruction .
42017028	In the same way , in the days of Lot ; they were feasting and trading , they were planting and building ;
42017029	But on the day when Lot went out of Sodom , fire came down from heaven and destruction came on them all .
42017030	So will it be in the day of the revelation of the Son of man .
42017031	On that day , if anyone is on the roof of the house , and his goods are in the house , let him not go down to take them away ; and let him who is in the field not go back to his house .
42017032	Keep in mind Lot's wife .
42017033	If anyone makes an attempt to keep his life , it will be taken from him , but if anyone gives up his life , he will keep it .
42017034	I say to you , In that night there will be two men sleeping in one bed , and one will be taken away and the other let go .
42017035	Two women will be crushing grain together ; one will be taken away and the other let go .
42017037	And they , answering him , said , Where , Lord ? And he said to them , Where the body is , there will the eagles come together .
42018001	And he made a story for them , the point of which was that men were to go on making prayer and not get tired ;
42018002	Saying , There was a judge in a certain town , who had no fear of God or respect for man :
42018003	And there was a widow in that town , and she kept on coming to him and saying , Give me my right against the man who has done me wrong .
42018004	And for a time he would not : but later , he said to himself , Though I have no fear of God or respect for man ,
42018005	Because this widow is a trouble to me , I will give her her right ; for if not , I will be completely tired out by her frequent coming .
42018006	And the Lord said , Give ear to the words of the evil judge .
42018007	And will not God do right in the cause of his saints , whose cries come day and night to his ears , though he is long in doing it ?
42018008	I say to you that he will quickly do right in their cause . But when the Son of man comes , will there be any faith on earth ?
42018009	And he made this story for some people who were certain that they were good , and had a low opinion of others :
42018010	Two men went up to the Temple for prayer ; one a Pharisee , and the other a tax-farmer .
42018011	The Pharisee , taking up his position , said to himself these words : God , I give you praise because I am not like other men , who take more than their right , who are evil-doers , who are untrue to their wives , or even like this tax-farmer .
42018012	Twice in the week I go without food ; I give a tenth of all I have .
42018013	The tax-farmer , on the other hand , keeping far away , and not lifting up even his eyes to heaven , made signs of grief and said , God , have mercy on me , a sinner .
42018014	I say to you , This man went back to his house with God's approval , and not the other : for everyone who makes himself high will be made low and whoever makes himself low will be made high .
42018015	And they took their children to him , so that he might put his hands on them : but when the disciples saw it , they said sharp words to them
42018016	But Jesus sent for them , saying , Let the children come to me , and do not keep them away , for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
42018017	Truly I say to you , Whoever does not put himself under the kingdom of God like a little child , will not come into it at all .
42018018	And a certain ruler put a question to him , saying , Good Master , what have I to do so that I may have eternal life ?
42018019	And Jesus said to him , Why do you say that I am good ? No one is good , but only God .
42018020	You have knowledge of what the law says : Do not be untrue to your wife , Do not put anyone to death , Do not take what is not yours , Do not give false witness , Give honour to your father and mother .
42018021	And he said , All these things I have done from the time when I was a boy .
42018022	And Jesus , hearing it , said to him , One thing you still have need of ; get money for your goods , and give it away to the poor , and you will have wealth in heaven ; and come after me .
42018023	But at these words he became very sad , for he had great wealth .
42018024	And Jesus , looking at him , said , How hard it is for those who have wealth to get into the kingdom of God !
42018025	It is simpler for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a man who has much money to come into the kingdom of God .
42018026	And those who were present said , Then who may have salvation ?
42018027	But he said , Things which are not possible with man are possible with God .
42018028	And Peter said , See , we have given up what is ours to come after you .
42018029	And he said to them , Truly I say to you , There is no man who has given up house or wife or brothers or father or mother or children , because of the kingdom of God ,
42018030	Who will not get much more in this time , and in the world to come , eternal life .
42018031	And he took with him the twelve and said to them , Now we are going up to Jerusalem , and all the things which were said by the prophets will be done to the Son of man .
42018032	For he will be given up to the Gentiles , and will be made sport of and put to shame :
42018033	And he will be given cruel blows and put to death , and on the third day he will come back to life .
42018034	But they did not take in the sense of any of these words , and what he said was not clear to them , and their minds were not able to see it .
42018035	And it came about that when he got near Jericho , a certain blind man was seated by the side of the road , making requests for money from those who went by .
42018036	And hearing the sound of a great number of people going by , he said , What is this ?
42018037	And they said to him , Jesus of Nazareth is going by .
42018038	And he said in a loud voice , Jesus , Son of David , have mercy on me .
42018039	And those who were in front made protests and said to him , Be quiet : but he said all the more , O Son of David , have mercy on me .
42018040	And Jesus , stopping , gave orders that he was to come to him , and when he came near , he said to him ,
42018041	What would you have me do for you ? And he said , Lord , that I may be able to see again .
42018042	And Jesus said , See again : your faith has made you well .
42018043	And straight away he was able to see , and he went after him , giving glory to God ; and all the people when they saw it gave praise to God .
42019001	And he went into Jericho , and when he was going through it ,
42019002	A man , named Zacchaeus , who was the chief tax-farmer , and a man of wealth ,
42019003	Made an attempt to get a view of Jesus , and was not able to do so , because of the people , for he was a small man .
42019004	And he went quickly in front of them and got up into a tree to see him , for he was going that way .
42019005	And when Jesus came to the place , looking up , he said to him , Zacchaeus , be quick and come down , for I am coming to your house today .
42019006	And he came down quickly , and took him into his house with joy .
42019007	And when they saw it , they were all angry , saying , He has gone into the house of a sinner .
42019008	And Zacchaeus , waiting before him , said to the Lord , See , Lord , half of my goods I give to the poor , and if I have taken anything from anyone wrongly , I give him back four times as much .
42019009	And Jesus said to him , Today salvation has come to this house , for even he is a son of Abraham .
42019010	For the Son of man came to make search for those who are wandering from the way , and to be their Saviour .
42019011	And while they were giving ear to these words , he made another story for them , because he was near Jerusalem , and because they were of the opinion that the kingdom of God was coming straight away .
42019012	So he said , A certain man of high birth went into a far-away country to get a kingdom for himself , and to come back .
42019013	And he sent for ten of his servants and gave them ten pounds and said to them , Do business with this till I come .
42019014	But his people had no love for him , and sent representatives after him , saying , We will not have this man for our ruler .
42019015	And when he came back again , having got his kingdom , he gave orders for those servants to whom he had given the money to come to him , so that he might have an account of what business they had done .
42019016	And the first came before him , saying , Lord , your pound has made ten pounds .
42019017	And he said to him , You have done well , O good servant : because you have done well in a small thing you will have authority over ten towns .
42019018	And another came , saying , Your pound has made five pounds .
42019019	And he said , You will be ruler over five towns .
42019020	And another came , saying , Lord , here is your pound , which I put away in a cloth ;
42019021	Because I was in fear of you , for you are a hard man : you take up what you have not put down , and get in grain where you have not put seed .
42019022	He said to him , By the words of your mouth you will be judged , you bad servant . You had knowledge that I am a hard man , taking up what I have not put down and getting in grain where I have not put seed ;
42019023	Why then did you not put my money in a bank , so that when I came I would get it back with interest ?
42019024	And he said to the others who were near , Take the pound away from him , and give it to the man who has ten .
42019025	And they say to him , Lord , he has ten pounds .
42019026	And I say to you that to everyone who has , more will be given , but from him who has not , even what he has will be taken away .
42019027	And as for those who were against me , who would not have me for their ruler , let them come here , and be put to death before me .
42019028	And when he had said this , he went on in front of them , going up to Jerusalem .
42019029	And it came about that when he got near Beth-phage and Bethany by the mountain which is named the Mountain of Olives , he sent two of the disciples ,
42019030	Saying , Go into the little town in front of you , and on going in you will see a young ass fixed with a cord , on which no man has ever been seated ; let him loose and take him .
42019031	And if anyone says to you , Why are you taking him ? say , The Lord has need of him .
42019032	And those whom he sent went away , and it was as he said .
42019033	And when they were getting the young ass , the owners of it said to them , Why are you taking the young ass ?
42019034	And they said , The Lord has need of him .
42019035	And they took him to Jesus , and they put their clothing on the ass , and Jesus got on to him .
42019036	And while he went on his way they put their clothing down on the road in front of him .
42019037	And when he came near the foot of the Mountain of Olives , all the disciples with loud voices gave praise to God with joy , because of all the great works which they had seen ;
42019038	Saying , A blessing on the King who comes in the name of the Lord ; peace in heaven and glory in the highest .
42019039	And some of the Pharisees among the people said to him , Master , make your disciples be quiet .
42019040	And he said in answer , I say to you , if these men keep quiet , the very stones will be crying out .
42019041	And when he got near and saw the town , he was overcome with weeping for it ,
42019042	Saying , If you , even you , had knowledge today , of the things which give peace ! but you are not able to see them .
42019043	For the time will come when your attackers will put a wall round you , and come all round you and keep you in on every side ,
42019044	And will make you level with the earth , and your children with you ; and there will not be one stone resting on another in you , because you did not see that it was your day of mercy .
42019045	And he went into the Temple and put out those who were trading there ,
42019046	Saying to them , It has been said , My house is to be a house of prayer , but you have made it a hole of thieves .
42019047	And every day he was teaching in the Temple . But the chief priests and the scribes and the rulers of the people were attempting to put him to death ;
42019048	But they were not able to do anything , because the people all kept near him , being greatly interested in his words .
42020001	And it came about on one of those days , when he was teaching the people in the Temple and preaching the good news ,
42020002	That the chief priests and the scribes and the rulers of the people came to him and said , Make clear to us by what authority you do these things and who gave you this authority .
42020003	And in answer he said to them , I will put a question to you , and do you give me an answer :
42020004	The baptism of John , was it from heaven or of men ?
42020005	And they said among themselves , If we say , From heaven ; he will say , Why did you not have faith in him ?
42020006	But if we say , Of men ; we will be stoned by the people , for they are certain that John was a prophet .
42020007	And they made answer that they had no idea where it came from .
42020008	And Jesus said , And I will not make clear to you by what authority I do these things .
42020009	And he gave the people this story : A man made a vine-garden and gave the use of it to some field-workers and went into another country for a long time .
42020010	And at the right time he sent a servant to the workers to get part of the fruit from the vines ; but the workmen gave him blows and sent him away with nothing .
42020011	And he sent another servant , and they gave blows to him in the same way , and put shame on him , and sent him away with nothing .
42020012	And he sent a third , and they gave him wounds and put him out .
42020013	And the lord of the garden said , What am I to do ? I will send my dearly loved son ; they may give respect to him .
42020014	But when the workmen saw him , they said to one another , This is he who will one day be the owner of the property : let us put him to death and the heritage will be ours .
42020015	And driving him out of the garden they put him to death . Now what will the lord do to these workmen ?
42020016	He will come and put them to destruction and give the garden to others . And when he said this , they said , May it not be so .
42020017	But he , looking on them , said , Is it not in the Writings , The stone which the builders put on one side , the same has become the chief stone of the building ?
42020018	Everyone falling on that stone will be broken , but the man on whom the stone comes down will be crushed to dust .
42020019	And the chief priests and the scribes made attempts to get their hands on him in that very hour ; and they were in fear of the people , for they saw that he had made up this story against them .
42020020	And they kept watch on him , and sent out secret representatives , who were acting the part of good men , in order that they might get something from his words , on account of which they might give him up to the government and into the power of the ruler .
42020021	And they put a question to him , saying , Master , we are certain that your teaching and your words are right , and that you have no respect for a man's position , but you are teaching the true way of God :
42020022	Is it right for us to make payment of taxes to Caesar or not ?
42020023	But he saw through their trick and said to them ,
42020024	Let me see a penny . Whose image and name are on it ? And they said , Caesar's .
42020025	And he said , Then give to Caesar the things which are Caesar's , and to God the things which are God's .
42020026	And they were not able to get anything from these words before the people : but they were full of wonder at his answer , and said nothing .
42020027	And some of the Sadducees came to him , who say that there is no coming back from the dead ; and they said to him ,
42020028	Master , Moses said that if a man's brother comes to his end , having a wife , but no children , his brother is to take the wife , and get a family for his brother .
42020029	Now there were seven brothers , and the first had a wife and came to his end , having no children ;
42020030	And the second ;
42020031	And the third took her ; and in the same way , all the seven , without having any children , came to their end .
42020032	And last of all , the woman came to her end .
42020033	When they come back from the dead , whose wife will she be ? for all the seven had her .
42020034	And Jesus said to them , The sons of this world are married and have wives ;
42020035	But those to whom is given the reward of the world to come , and to come back from the dead , have no wives , and are not married ;
42020036	And death has no more power over them , for they are equal to the angels , and are sons of God , being of those who will come back from the dead .
42020037	But even Moses made it clear that the dead come back to life , saying , in the story of the burning thorn-tree , The Lord , the God of Abraham , the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob .
42020038	Now he is not the God of the dead but of the living : for all men are living to him .
42020039	And some of the scribes , in answer to this , said , Master , you have said well .
42020040	And they had fear of putting any more questions to him .
42020041	And he said to them , Why do they say that the Christ is the son of David ?
42020042	For David himself says in the book of Psalms , The Lord said to my Lord , Take your seat at my right hand ,
42020043	Till I put under your feet all those who are against you .
42020044	David then gives him the name of Lord , so how is it possible for him to be his son ?
42020045	And in the hearing of all the people he said to his disciples ,
42020046	Keep away from the scribes , whose pleasure it is to go about in long robes , and to have words of respect said to them in the market-places , and to take the chief seats in the Synagogues and the first places at feasts ;
42020047	Who take the property of widows and before the eyes of men make long prayers ; they will get a greater punishment .
42021001	And looking up , he saw the men of wealth putting their offerings in the money-box .
42021002	And he saw a certain poor widow putting in a farthing .
42021003	And he said , Truly I say to you , This poor widow has given more than all of them :
42021004	For they gave out of their wealth , having more than enough for themselves : but she , even out of her need , has put in all her living .
42021005	And some were talking about the Temple , how it was made fair with beautiful stones and with offerings , but he said ,
42021006	As for these things which you see , the days will come when not one stone will be resting on another , but all will be broken down .
42021007	And they said to him , Master , when will these things be ? and what sign will there be when these events are to take place ?
42021008	And he said , Take care that you are not tricked : for a number of people will come in my name , saying , I am he ; and , The time is near : do not go after them .
42021009	And when news of wars and troubled times comes to your ears , have no fear ; for these things have to be , but the end will not be now .
42021010	Then he said to them , Nation will be moved against nation and kingdom against kingdom :
42021011	There will be great earth-shocks and outbursts of disease in a number of places , and men will be without food ; and there will be wonders and great signs from heaven .
42021012	But before all this , they will take you and be very cruel to you , giving you up to the Synagogues and to prisons , taking you before kings and rulers , because of my name .
42021013	And it will be turned to a witness for you .
42021014	So take care not to be troubled before the time comes , about what answers you will give :
42021015	For I will give you words and wisdom , so that not one of those who are against you will be able to get the better of you , or to put you in the wrong .
42021016	But you will be given up even by your fathers and mothers , your brothers and relations and friends ; and some of you will be put to death .
42021017	And you will be hated by all men , because of me .
42021018	But not a hair of your head will come to destruction .
42021019	By going through all these things , you will keep your lives .
42021020	But when you see armies all round about Jerusalem , then be certain that her destruction is near .
42021021	Then let those who are in Judaea go in flight to the mountains ; and those who are in the middle of the town go out ; and let not those who are in the country come in .
42021022	For these are the days of punishment , in which all the things in the Writings will be put into effect .
42021023	It will be hard for women who are with child , and for her with a baby at the breast , in those days . For great trouble will come on the land , and wrath on this people .
42021024	And they will be put to death with the sword , and will be taken as prisoners into all the nations ; and Jerusalem will be crushed under the feet of the Gentiles , till the times of the Gentiles are complete .
42021025	And there will be signs in the sun and moon and stars ; and on the earth , fear among the nations and doubt because of the loud noise of the sea and the waves ;
42021026	Men's strength will go from them in fear and in waiting for the things which are coming on the earth ; for the powers of the heavens will be moved .
42021027	And then they will see the Son of man coming in a cloud , with power and great glory .
42021028	But when these things come about , let your heads be lifted up , because your salvation is near .
42021029	And he made a story for them : See the fig-tree , and all the trees ;
42021030	When they put out their young leaves , you take note of it , and it is clear to you that summer is coming .
42021031	In the same way , when you see these things taking place you may be certain that the kingdom of God is near .
42021032	Truly I say to you , This generation will not come to an end till all things are complete .
42021033	Heaven and earth will come to an end , but my words will not come to an end .
42021034	But give attention to yourselves , for fear that your hearts become over-full of the pleasures of food and wine , and the cares of this life , and that day may come on you suddenly , and take you as in a net :
42021035	For so it will come on all those who are living on the face of all the earth .
42021036	But keep watch at all times with prayer , that you may be strong enough to come through all these things and take your place before the Son of man .
42021037	And every day he was teaching in the Temple and every night he went out to the mountain which is named the Mountain of Olives to take his rest .
42021038	And all the people came early in the morning to give ear to his words in the Temple .
42022001	Now the feast of unleavened bread was near , which is called the Passover .
42022002	And the chief priests and the scribes were looking for a chance to put him to death , but they went in fear of the people .
42022003	And Satan came into Judas Iscariot , who was one of the twelve .
42022004	And he went away and had a discussion with the chief priests and the rulers , about how he might give him up to them .
42022005	And they were glad , and undertook to give him money .
42022006	And he made an agreement with them to give him up to them , if he got a chance , when the people were not present .
42022007	And the day of unleavened bread came , when the Passover lamb is put to death .

42022009	And they said to him , Where are we to get it ready ?

42022016	For I say to you , I will not take it till it is made complete in the kingdom of God .

42022029	And I will give you a kingdom as my Father has given one to me ,

42022050	And one of them gave a blow to the servant of the high priest , cutting off his right ear .
42022051	But Jesus , answering , said , Put up with this , at least . And touching his ear , he made it well .
42022052	And Jesus said to the chief priests and the captains of the Temple and the rulers , who had come against him , Have you come out as against a thief , with swords and sticks ?
42022053	When I was in the Temple with you every day , your hands were not stretched out against me : but this is your hour , and the authority of the dark power .
42022054	And they made him a prisoner and took him away to the house of the high priest . But Peter went after them at a distance .
42022055	And a fire was lighted in the middle of the open square , and they were seated together , and Peter was among them .
42022056	And a certain woman-servant , seeing him in the light of the fire , and looking at him with attention , said , This man was with him .
42022057	But he said , Woman , it is not true ; I have no knowledge of him .
42022058	And after a little time , another saw him and said , You are one of them ; and he said , Man , I am not .
42022059	And after about an hour , another man said , with decision , Certainly this man was with him , for he is a Galilaean .
42022060	And Peter said , Man , I have no knowledge of these things of which you are talking . And straight away , while he was saying these words , there came the cry of a cock .
42022061	And the Lord , turning , gave Peter a look . And the words of the Lord came to Peter's mind , how he had said , This night , before the hour of the cock's cry , you will be false to me three times .
42022062	And he went out , weeping bitterly .

42022066	And when it was day , the rulers of the people came together , with the chief priests and the scribes , and they took him before their Sanhedrin , saying ,
42022067	If you are the Christ , say so . But he said , If I say so you will not have belief ;
42022068	And if I put a question to you , you will not give an answer .
42022069	But in the future the Son of man will be seated at the right hand of the power of God .
42022070	And they all said , Are you then the Son of God ? and he said , You say that I am .

42023001	And they all went and took him before Pilate .
42023002	And they made statements against him , saying , This man has to our knowledge been teaching our nation to do wrong , and not to make payment of taxes to Caesar , even saying that he himself is Christ , a king .

42023004	And Pilate said to the chief priests and the people , In my opinion this man has done no wrong .
42023005	But they became more violent than before , saying , He has made trouble among the people , teaching through all Judaea from Galilee to this place .
42023006	But at these words Pilate said , Is the man a Galilaean ?
42023007	And when he saw that he was under the authority of Herod , he sent him to Herod , who was in Jerusalem himself at that time .
42023008	Now when Herod saw Jesus he was very glad , having for a long time had a desire to see him , for he had had accounts of him , and was hoping to see some wonders done by him .
42023009	And he put a great number of questions to him , but he said nothing .
42023010	And the chief priests and the scribes were there , making statements against him violently .
42023011	And Herod , with the men of his army , put shame on him and made sport of him , and dressing him in shining robes , he sent him back to Pilate .
42023012	And that day Herod and Pilate became friends with one another , for before they had been against one another .
42023013	And Pilate sent for the chief priests and the rulers and the people , and said to them ,
42023014	You say that this man has been teaching the people evil things : now I , after going into the question before you , see nothing wrong in this man in connection with the things which you have said against him :
42023015	And Herod is of the same opinion , for he has sent him back to us ; for , you see , he has done nothing for which I might put him to death .
42023016	And so I will give him punishment and let him go .
42023018	But with loud voices they said all together , Put this man to death , and make Barabbas free .
42023019	Now this man was in prison because of an attack against the government in the town , in which there had been loss of life .
42023020	And Pilate again said to them that it was his desire to let Jesus go free .
42023021	But crying out they said , To the cross with him !

42023024	And Pilate gave his decision for their desire to be put into effect .

42023050	Now there was a man named Joseph , a man of authority and a good and upright man
42023051	( He had not given his approval to their decision or their acts ) , of Arimathaea , a town of the Jews , who was waiting for the kingdom of God :

42023056	And they went back and got ready spices and perfumes ; and on the Sabbath they took their rest , in agreement with the law .
42024001	But on the first day of the week , at dawn , they came to the place where his body had been put , taking the spices which they had got ready .

42024042	And they gave him a bit of cooked fish .

43001001	From the first he was the Word , and the Word was in relation with God and was God .
43001002	This Word was from the first in relation with God .
43001003	All things came into existence through him , and without him nothing was .
43001004	What came into existence in him was life , and the life was the light of men .
43001005	And the light goes on shining in the dark ; it is not overcome by the dark .
43001006	There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
43001007	He came for witness , to give witness about the light , so that all men might have faith through him .
43001008	He himself was not the light : he was sent to give witness about the light .
43001009	The true light , which gives light to every man , was then coming into the world .
43001010	He was in the world , the world which came into being through him , but the world had no knowledge of him .
43001011	He came to the things which were his and his people did not take him to their hearts .
43001012	To all those who did so take him , however , he gave the right of becoming children of God--that is , to those who had faith in his name :
43001013	Whose birth was from God and not from blood , or from an impulse of the flesh and man's desire .
43001014	And so the Word became flesh and took a place among us for a time ; and we saw his glory--such glory as is given to an only son by his father--saw it to be true and full of grace .
43001015	John gave witness about him , crying , This is he of whom I said , He who is coming after me is put over me because he was in existence before me .
43001016	From his full measure we have all been given grace on grace .
43001017	For the law was given through Moses ; grace and the true way of life are ours through Jesus Christ .
43001018	No man has seen God at any time ; the only Son , who is on the breast of the Father , he has made clear what God is .
43001019	And this is the witness of John when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to him with the question , Who are you ?
43001020	He said quite openly and straightforwardly , I am not the Christ .
43001021	And they said to him , What then ? Are you Elijah ? And he said , I am not . Are you the prophet ? And his answer was , I am not .
43001022	So they said to him , Who are you then ? We have to give some answer to those who sent us . What have you to say about yourself ?
43001023	He said , I am the voice of one crying in the waste land , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said Isaiah the prophet .
43001024	Those who had been sent came from the Pharisees .
43001025	And they put this question to him , saying , Why then are you giving baptism if you are not the Christ , or Elijah , or the prophet ?
43001026	John's answer was : I give baptism with water ; but there is one among you of whom you have no knowledge ;
43001027	It is he who is coming after me ; I am not good enough to undo his shoes .
43001028	These things took place at Bethany on the other side of the Jordan , where John was giving baptism .
43001029	The day after , John sees Jesus coming to him and says , See , here is the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world !
43001030	This is he of whom I said , One is coming after me who is put over me because he was in existence before me .
43001031	I myself had no knowledge of him , but I came giving baptism with water so that he might be seen openly by Israel .
43001032	And John gave this witness , saying , I saw the Spirit coming down from heaven like a dove and resting on him .
43001033	I had no knowledge who he was , but he who sent me to give baptism with water said to me , The one on whom you see the Spirit coming down and resting , it is he who gives baptism with the Holy Spirit .
43001034	This I saw myself and my witness is that he is the Son of God .
43001035	The day after , John was there again with two of his disciples ;
43001036	And looking at Jesus while he was walking he said , See , there is the Lamb of God !
43001037	Hearing what he said , the two disciples went after Jesus .
43001038	And Jesus , turning round , saw them coming after him and said to them , What are you looking for ? They said to him , Rabbi ( which is to say , Master ) , where are you living ? 
43001039	He said to them , Come and see . They went with him then and saw where he was living ; and they were with him all that day : it was then about the tenth hour of the day .
43001040	Andrew , Simon Peter's brother , was one of the two men who , hearing what John said , went after Jesus .
43001041	Early in the morning he came across his brother and said to him , We have made discovery ! It is the Messiah ! ( which is to say , the Christ ) .
43001042	And he took him to Jesus . Looking at him fixedly Jesus said , You are Simon , the son of John ; your name will be Cephas ( which is to say , Peter ) .
43001043	The day after this , Jesus had a desire to go into Galilee . He came across Philip and said to him , Come and be my disciple .
43001044	Now Philip's town was Beth-saida , where Andrew and Peter came from .
43001045	Philip came across Nathanael and said to him , We have made a discovery ! It is he of whom Moses , in the law , and the prophets were writing , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
43001046	Nazareth ! said Nathanael , Is it possible for any good to come out of Nazareth ? Philip said to him , Come and see .
43001047	Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him and said of him , See , here is a true son of Israel in whom there is nothing false .
43001048	Nathanael said to him , Where did you get knowledge of me ? In answer Jesus said , Before Philip was talking with you , while you were still under the fig-tree , I saw you .
43001049	Nathanael said to him , Rabbi , you are the Son of God , you are King of Israel !
43001050	In answer Jesus said to him , You have faith because I said to you , I saw you under the fig-tree . You will see greater things than these .
43001051	And he said to him , Truly I say to you all , You will see heaven opening and God's angels going up and coming down on the Son of man .
43002001	On the third day two people were going to be married at Cana in Galilee . The mother of Jesus was there :
43002002	And Jesus with his disciples came as guests .
43002003	When they had not enough wine , the mother of Jesus said to him , They have no wine .
43002004	Jesus said to her , Woman , this is not your business ; my time is still to come .
43002005	His mother said to the servants , Whatever he says to you , do it .
43002006	Now six pots of stone , every one taking two or three firkins of water , were placed there for the purpose of washing , as is the way of the Jews .
43002007	Jesus said to the servants , Make the pots full of water . And they made them full to the top .
43002008	Then he said to them , Now take some , and give it to the master of the feast . So they took it to him .
43002009	After tasting the water which had now become wine , the master of the feast ( having no idea where it came from , though it was clear to the servants who took the water out ) sent for the newly-married man ,
43002010	And said to him , Every man first puts out his best wine and when all have had enough he puts out what is not so good ; but you have kept the good wine till now .
43002011	This , the first of his signs , Jesus did at Cana in Galilee and let his glory be seen openly ; and his disciples put their faith in him .
43002012	After this he went down to Capernaum , with his mother , his brothers , and his disciples , and they were there not more than two or three days .
43002013	The time of the Passover of the Jews was near and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43002014	And there in the Temple he saw men trading in oxen and sheep and doves , and he saw the changers of money in their seats :
43002015	And he made a whip of small cords and put them all out of the Temple , with the sheep and the oxen , sending in all directions the small money of the changers and overturning their tables ;
43002016	And to those who were trading in doves he said , Take these things away ; do not make my Father's house a market .
43002017	And it came to the minds of the disciples that the Writings say , I am on fire with passion for your house .
43002018	Then the Jews put this question to him : What sign of authority have you to give us , seeing that you do these things ?
43002019	And Jesus said to them , Send destruction on this Temple and I will put it up again in three days .
43002020	The Jews said , The building of this Temple took forty-six years ; and you will put it up in three days !
43002021	But his words were about that holy building which was his body .
43002022	So when he had come back again from the dead , the memory of these words came back to the disciples , and they had faith in the holy Writings and in the word which Jesus had said .
43002023	Now while he was in Jerusalem at the feast of the Passover , a great number of people came to have faith in his name , after seeing the signs which he did .
43002024	But Jesus did not have faith in them , because he had knowledge of them all .
43002025	He had no need for any witness about man ; for he himself had knowledge of what was in man .
43003001	Now there was among the Pharisees a man named Nicodemus , who was one of the rulers of the Jews .
43003002	He came to Jesus by night and said to him , Rabbi , we are certain that you have come from God as a teacher , because no man would be able to do these signs which you do if God was not with him .
43003003	Jesus said to him , Truly , I say to you , Without a new birth no man is able to see the kingdom of God .
43003004	Nicodemus said to him , How is it possible for a man to be given birth when he is old ? Is he able to go into his mother's body a second time and come to birth again ?
43003005	Jesus said in answer , Truly , I say to you , If a man's birth is not from water and from the Spirit , it is not possible for him to go into the kingdom of God .
43003006	That which has birth from the flesh is flesh , and that which has birth from the Spirit is spirit .
43003007	Do not be surprised that I say to you , It is necessary for you to have a second birth .
43003008	The wind goes where its pleasure takes it , and the sound of it comes to your ears , but you are unable to say where it comes from and where it goes : so it is with everyone whose birth is from the Spirit .
43003009	And Nicodemus said to him , How is it possible for these things to be ?
43003010	And Jesus , answering , said , Are you the teacher of Israel and have no knowledge of these things ?
43003011	Truly , I say to you , We say that of which we have knowledge ; we give witness of what we have seen ; and you do not take our witness to be true .
43003012	If you have no belief when my words are about the things of earth , how will you have belief if my words are about the things of heaven ?
43003013	And no one has ever gone up to heaven but he who came down from heaven , the Son of man .
43003014	As the snake was lifted up by Moses in the waste land , even so it is necessary for the Son of man to be lifted up :
43003015	So that whoever has faith may have in him eternal life .
43003016	For God had such love for the world that he gave his only Son , so that whoever has faith in him may not come to destruction but have eternal life .
43003017	God did not send his Son into the world to be judge of the world ; he sent him so that the world might have salvation through him .
43003018	The man who has faith in him does not come up to be judged ; but he who has no faith in him has been judged even now , because he has no faith in the name of the only Son of God .
43003019	And this is the test by which men are judged : the light has come into the world and men have more love for the dark than for the light , because their acts are evil .
43003020	The light is hated by everyone whose acts are evil and he does not come to the light for fear that his acts will be seen .
43003021	But he whose life is true comes to the light , so that it may be clearly seen that his acts have been done by the help of God .
43003022	After these things Jesus and his disciples went into the land of Judaea , and there he was with them for some time , giving baptism .
43003023	Now John was then giving baptism at Aenon near Salim , because there was much water there ; and people came and were given baptism .
43003024	For at this time John had not been put into prison .
43003025	Then a question came up between John's disciples and a Jew about washing .
43003026	And they went to John and said to him , Rabbi , the man who was with you on the other side of the Jordan , the man to whom you gave witness , is now giving baptism , and everyone is going to him .
43003027	And this was John's answer : A man is unable to have anything if it is not given to him from heaven .
43003028	You yourselves give witness that I said , I am not the Christ . What I said was , I am sent before the Christ .
43003029	He who has the bride is the husband : but the husband's friend , whose place is by his side and whose ears are open to him , is full of joy because of the husband's voice : such is my joy , and it is complete .
43003030	He has to become greater while I become less .
43003031	He who comes from heaven is greater than all others : he who comes from earth is of the earth , and of the earth are his words : he who comes from heaven is over all .
43003032	He gives witness of what he has seen and of what has come to his ears ; and no man takes his witness as true .
43003033	He who so takes his witness has made clear his faith that God is true .
43003034	For he whom God has sent says God's words ; and God does not give him the Spirit by measure .
43003035	The Father has love for the Son and has put all things into his hands .
43003036	He who has faith in the Son has eternal life ; but he who has not faith in the Son will not see life ; God's wrath is resting on him .
43004001	Now when it was clear to the Lord that word had come to the ears of the Pharisees that Jesus was making more disciples than John and was giving them baptism
43004002	( Though , in fact , it was his disciples who gave baptism , not Jesus himself ) ,
43004003	He went out of Judaea into Galilee again .
43004004	And it was necessary for him to go through Samaria .
43004005	So he came to a town of Samaria which was named Sychar , near to the bit of land which Jacob gave to his son Joseph :
43004006	Now Jacob's fountain was there . Jesus , being tired after his journey , was resting by the fountain . It was about the sixth hour .
43004007	A woman of Samaria came to get water , and Jesus said to her , Give me some water .
43004008	For his disciples had gone to the town to get food .
43004009	The woman of Samaria said to him , Why do you , a Jew , make a request for water to me , a woman of Samaria ? She said this because Jews have nothing to do with the people of Samaria .
43004010	In answer Jesus said , If you had knowledge of what God gives freely and who it is who says to you , Give me water , you would make your prayer to him , and he would give you living water .
43004011	The woman said to him , Sir , you have no vessel and the fountain is deep ; from where will you get the living water ?
43004012	Are you greater than our father Jacob who gave us the fountain and took the water of it himself , with his children and his cattle ?
43004013	Jesus said to her , Everyone who takes this water will be in need of it again :
43004014	But whoever takes the water I give him will never be in need of drink again ; for the water I give him will become in him a fountain of eternal life .
43004015	The woman said to him , Sir , give me this water , so that I may not be in need again of drink and will not have to come all this way for it .
43004016	Jesus said to her , Go , get your husband and come back here with him .
43004017	In answer , the woman said , I have no husband . Jesus said to her , You have said rightly , I have no husband :
43004018	You have had five husbands , and the man you have now is not your husband : that was truly said .
43004019	The woman said to him , Sir , I see that you are a prophet .
43004020	Our fathers gave worship on this mountain , but you Jews say that the right place for worship is in Jerusalem .
43004021	Jesus said to her , Woman , take my word for this ; the time is coming when you will not give worship to the Father on this mountain or in Jerusalem .
43004022	You give worship , but without knowledge of what you are worshipping : we give worship to what we have knowledge of : for salvation comes from the Jews .
43004023	But the time is coming , and is even now here , when the true worshippers will give worship to the Father in the true way of the spirit , for these are the worshippers desired by the Father .
43004024	God is Spirit : then let his worshippers give him worship in the true way of the spirit .
43004025	The woman said to him , I am certain that the Messiah , who is named Christ , is coming ; when he comes he will make all things clear to us .
43004026	Jesus said to her , I , who am talking to you , am he .
43004027	At that point the disciples came back , and they were surprised to see him talking to a woman ; but not one of them said to him , What is your purpose ? or , Why are you talking to her ?
43004028	Then the woman put down her water-pot and went into the town , and said to the people ,
43004029	Come and see a man who has been talking to me of everything I ever did ! Is it possible that this is the Christ ?
43004030	So they went out of the town and came to him .
43004031	While this was taking place , the disciples were saying to Jesus , Master , take some food .
43004032	But he said to them , I have food of which you have no knowledge .
43004033	So the disciples said one to another , Did anyone give him food ?
43004034	Jesus said , My food is to do the pleasure of him who sent me and to make his work complete .
43004035	You would say , Four months from now is the time of the grain-cutting . Take a look , I say to you , at the fields ; they are even now white for cutting .
43004036	He who does the cutting now has his reward ; he is getting together fruit for eternal life , so that he who did the planting and he who gets in the grain may have joy together .
43004037	In this the saying is a true one , One does the planting , and another gets in the grain .
43004038	I sent you to get in grain which you had no hand in planting : other men did that work , and you take the reward .
43004039	Now a number of the people of that town had faith in him because of the woman's witness : He has been talking to me of everything I ever did .
43004040	So when the people came to him they made request to him to be among them for a time , and he was there two days .
43004041	And a great number more of them came to have faith in him because of what he himself said .
43004042	And they said to the woman , Now we have faith , but not because of your story : we ourselves have given ear to his words , and we are certain that he is truly the Saviour of the world .
43004043	And after the two days he went on from there into Galilee .
43004044	For Jesus himself said that a prophet has no honour in the country of his birth .
43004045	So when he came into Galilee , the Galilaeans took him to their hearts because of the things which they had seen him do in Jerusalem at the feast--they themselves having been there at the feast .
43004046	So he came to Cana in Galilee , where he had made the water wine . And there was a certain man of high position whose son was ill at Capernaum .
43004047	When it came to his ears that Jesus had come from Judaea into Galilee , he went to him and made a request that he would come down to his son , who was near to death , and make him well .
43004048	Then Jesus said to him , You will not have faith if you do not see signs and wonders .
43004049	The man said , Sir , come down before my boy is dead .
43004050	And Jesus said , Go in peace ; your son is living . The man had faith in the word which Jesus said to him and went away .
43004051	And while he was going down , his servants came to him and said , Your boy is living .
43004052	So he put a question to them as to the hour when he became better ; and they said to him , The disease went from him yesterday at the seventh hour .
43004053	It was clear then to the father that this was the very time at which Jesus said to him , Your son is living . And he had faith in Jesus , he and all his family .
43004054	Now this is the second sign which Jesus did after he had come out of Judaea into Galilee .
43005001	After these things there was a feast of the Jews , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
43005002	Now in Jerusalem near the sheep-market there is a public bath which in Hebrew is named Beth-zatha . It has five doorways .
43005003	In these doorways there were a great number of people with different diseases : some unable to see , some without the power of walking , some with wasted bodies .
43005005	One man was there who had been ill for thirty-eight years .
43005006	When Jesus saw him there on the floor it was clear to him that he had been now a long time in that condition , and so he said to the man , Is it your desire to get well ?
43005007	The ill man said in answer , Sir , I have nobody to put me into the bath when the water is moving ; and while I am on the way down some other person gets in before me .
43005008	Jesus said to him , Get up , take your bed and go .
43005009	And the man became well straight away , and took up his bed and went . Now that day was the Sabbath .
43005010	So the Jews said to the man who had been made well , It is the Sabbath ; and it is against the law for you to take up your bed .
43005011	He said to them , But he who made me well , said to me , Take up your bed and go .
43005012	Then they put to him the question : Who is the man who said to you , Take it up and go ?
43005013	Now he who had been made well had no knowledge who it was , Jesus having gone away because of the number of people who were in that place .
43005014	After a time Jesus came across him in the Temple and said to him , See , you are well and strong ; do no more sin for fear a worse thing comes to you .
43005015	The man went away and said to the Jews that it was Jesus who had made him well .
43005016	And for this reason the Jews were turned against Jesus , because he was doing these things on the Sabbath .
43005017	But his answer was : My Father is still working even now , and so I am working .
43005018	For this cause the Jews had an even greater desire to put Jesus to death , because not only did he not keep the Sabbath but he said God was his Father , so making himself equal with God .
43005019	So Jesus made answer and said , Truly I say to you , The Son is not able to do anything himself ; he is able to do only what he sees the Father doing ; whatever the Father does the Son does it in the same way .
43005020	For the Father has love for the Son and lets him see everything which he does : and he will let him see greater works than these so that you may be full of wonder .
43005021	In the same way , as the Father gives life to the dead , even so the Son gives life to those to whom he is pleased to give it .
43005022	The Father is not the judge of men , but he has given all decisions into the hands of the Son ;
43005023	So that all men may give honour to the Son even as they give honour to the Father . He who gives no honour to the Son gives no honour to the Father who sent him .
43005024	Truly I say to you , The man whose ears are open to my word and who has faith in him who sent me , has eternal life ; he will not be judged , but has come from death into life .
43005025	Truly I say to you , The time is coming , it has even now come , when the voice of the Son of God will come to the ears of the dead , and those hearing it will have life .
43005026	For even as the Father has life in himself , so he has given to the Son to have life in himself .
43005027	And he has given him authority to be judge because he is the Son of man .
43005028	Do not be surprised at this : for the time is coming when his voice will come to all who are in the place of the dead ,
43005029	And they will come out ; those who have done good , into the new life ; and those who have done evil , to be judged .
43005030	Of myself I am unable to do anything : as the voice comes to me so I give a decision : and my decision is right because I have no desire to do what is pleasing to myself , but only what is pleasing to him who sent me .
43005031	If I gave witness about myself , my witness would not be true .
43005032	There is another who gives witness about me and I am certain that the witness he gives about me is true .
43005033	You sent to John and he gave true witness .
43005034	But I have no need of a man's witness : I only say these things so that you may have salvation .
43005035	He was a burning and shining light , and for a time you were ready to be happy in his light .
43005036	But the witness which I have is greater than that of John : the work which the Father has given me to do , the very work which I am now doing , is a witness that the Father has sent me .
43005037	And the Father himself who sent me has given witness about me . Not one of you has ever given ear to his voice ; his form you have not seen .
43005038	And you have not kept his word in your hearts , because you have not faith in him whom he has sent .
43005039	You make search in the holy Writings , in the belief that through them you get eternal life ; and it is those Writings which give witness about me .
43005040	And still you have no desire to come to me so that you may have life .
43005041	I do not take honour from men ;
43005042	But I have knowledge of you that you have no love for God in your hearts .
43005043	I have come in my Father's name , and your hearts are not open to me . If another comes with no other authority but himself , you will give him your approval .
43005044	How is it possible for you to have faith while you take honour one from another and have no desire for the honour which comes from the only God ?
43005045	Put out of your minds the thought that I will say things against you to the Father : the one who says things against you is Moses , on whom you put your hopes .
43005046	If you had belief in Moses you would have belief in me ; for his writings are about me .
43005047	If you have no belief in his writings , how will you have belief in my words ?
43006001	After these things Jesus went away to the other side of the sea of Galilee--that is , the sea of Tiberias .
43006002	And a great number of people went after him because they saw the signs which he did on those who were ill .
43006003	Then Jesus went up the mountain and was seated there with his disciples .
43006004	Now the Passover , a feast of the Jews , was near .
43006005	Lifting up his eyes , Jesus saw a great number of people coming to where he was , and he said to Philip , Where may we get bread for all these people ?
43006006	This he said , testing him : for he had no doubt what he himself would do .
43006007	Philip made answer , Bread to the value of two hundred pence would not be enough even to give everyone a little .
43006008	One of his disciples , Andrew , the brother of Simon Peter , said to Jesus ,
43006009	There is a boy here with five barley cakes and two fishes : but what is that among such a number ?
43006010	Jesus said , Let the people be seated . Now there was much grass in that place . And those seated on the grass were about five thousand .
43006011	Then Jesus took the cakes and having given praise to God , he gave them to the people who were seated , and the fishes in the same way , as much as they had need of .
43006012	And when they had had enough , Jesus said to his disciples , Take up the broken bits which are over , so that nothing may be wasted .
43006013	So they took them up : twelve baskets full of broken bits of the five cakes which were over after the people had had enough .
43006014	And when the people saw the sign which he had done , they said , Truly , this is the prophet who is to come into the world .
43006015	Now when Jesus saw that the people were about to come and take him by force to make him a king , he went away again up the mountain by himself .
43006016	When evening came the disciples went down to the sea ;
43006017	And they took a boat and went across the sea in the direction of Capernaum . By then it was dark and still Jesus had not come to them .
43006018	The sea was getting rough because of a strong wind which was blowing .
43006019	After they had gone three or four miles they saw Jesus walking on the sea and coming near to the boat ; and they had great fear .
43006020	But he said to them , It is I , have no fear .
43006021	Then they readily took him into the boat : and straight away the boat was at the land to which they were going .
43006022	The day after , the people who were on the other side of the sea saw that only one small boat had been there , that Jesus had not gone in that boat with the disciples , but that the disciples had gone away by themselves .
43006023	Some other boats , however , came from Tiberias near to the place where they had taken the bread after the Lord had given praise .
43006024	So when the people saw that Jesus was not there , or his disciples , they got into those boats and went over to Capernaum looking for Jesus .
43006025	And when they came across him on the other side of the sea they said , Rabbi , when did you come here ?
43006026	Jesus , answering them , said , Truly I say to you , You come after me , not because you saw signs , but because you were given the bread and had enough .
43006027	Let your work not be for the food which comes to an end , but for the food which goes on for eternal life , which the Son of man will give to you , for on him has God the Father put his mark .
43006028	Then they said to him , How may we do the works of God ?
43006029	Jesus , answering , said to them , This is to do the work of God : to have faith in him whom God has sent .
43006030	So they said , What sign do you give us , so that we may see and have faith in you ? What do you do ?
43006031	Our fathers had the manna in the waste land , as the Writings say , He gave them bread from heaven .
43006032	Jesus then said to them , Truly I say to you , What Moses gave you was not the bread from heaven ; it is my Father who gives you the true bread from heaven .
43006033	The bread of God is the bread which comes down out of heaven and gives life to the world .
43006034	Ah , Lord , they said , give us that bread for ever !
43006035	And this was the answer of Jesus : I am the bread of life . He who comes to me will never be in need of food , and he who has faith in me will never be in need of drink .
43006036	But it is as I said to you : you have seen me , and still you have no faith .
43006037	Whatever the Father gives to me will come to me ; and I will not send away anyone who comes to me .
43006038	For I have come down from heaven , not to do my pleasure , but the pleasure of him who sent me .
43006039	And this is the pleasure of him who sent me , that I am not to let out of my hands anything which he has given me , but I am to give it new life on the last day .
43006040	This , I say , is my Father's pleasure , that everyone who sees the Son and has faith in him may have eternal life : and I will take him up on the last day .
43006041	Now the Jews said bitter things about Jesus because of his words , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
43006042	And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we have seen ? How is it then that he now says , I have come down from heaven ?
43006043	Jesus made answer and said , Do not say things against me , one to another .
43006044	No man is able to come to me if the Father who sent me does not give him the desire to come : and I will take him up from the dead on the last day .
43006045	The writings of the prophets say , And they will all have teaching from God . Everyone whose ears have been open to the teaching of the Father comes to me .
43006046	Not that anyone has ever seen the Father ; only he who is from God , he has seen the Father .
43006047	Truly I say to you , He who has faith in me has eternal life .
43006048	I am the bread of life .
43006049	Your fathers took the manna in the waste land--and they are dead .
43006050	The bread which comes from heaven is such bread that a man may take it for food and never see death .
43006051	I am the living bread which has come from heaven : if any man takes this bread for food he will have life for ever : and more than this , the bread which I will give is my flesh which I will give for the life of the world .
43006052	Then the Jews had an angry discussion among themselves , saying , How is it possible for this man to give us his flesh for food ?
43006053	Then Jesus said to them , Truly I say to you , If you do not take the flesh of the Son of man for food , and if you do not take his blood for drink , you have no life in you .
43006054	He who takes my flesh for food and my blood for drink has eternal life : and I will take him up from the dead at the last day .
43006055	My flesh is true food and my blood is true drink .
43006056	He who takes my flesh for food and my blood for drink is in me and I in him .
43006057	As the living Father has sent me , and I have life because of the Father , even so he who takes me for his food will have life because of me .
