43006058	This is the bread which has come down from heaven . It is not like the food which your fathers had : they took of the manna , and are dead ; but he who takes this bread for food will have life for ever .
43006059	Jesus said these things in the Synagogue while he was teaching at Capernaum .
43006060	Then , hearing this , a number of his disciples said , This is a hard saying ; who is able to take in such teaching ?
43006061	When Jesus became conscious that his disciples were protesting about what he said , he said to them , Does this give you trouble ?
43006062	What then will you say if you see the Son of man going up to where he was before ?
43006063	The spirit is the life giver ; the flesh is of no value : the words which I have said to you are spirit and they are life .
43006064	But still some of you have no faith . For it was clear to Jesus from the first who they were who had no faith , and who it was who would be false to him .
43006065	And he said , This is why I said to you , No man is able to come to me if he is not given the power to do so by the Father .
43006066	Because of what he said , a number of the disciples went back and would no longer go with him .
43006067	So Jesus said to the twelve , Have you a desire to go away ?
43006068	Then Simon Peter gave this answer : Lord , to whom are we to go ? you have the words of eternal life ;
43006069	And we have faith and are certain that you are the Holy One of God .
43006070	Then Jesus said , Did I not make a selection of you , the twelve , and one of you is a son of the Evil One ?
43006071	He was talking of Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot . It was he who was to be false to Jesus--one of the twelve .
43007001	After this , Jesus went from place to place in Galilee . He did not go about in Judaea , because the Jews were looking for a chance to put him to death .
43007002	But the feast of the Jews , the feast of tents , was near .
43007003	So his brothers said to him , Go away from here into Judaea so that your disciples may see the works which you do .
43007004	Because no man does things secretly if he has a desire that men may have knowledge of him . If you do these things , let yourself be seen by all men .
43007005	For even his brothers had no belief in him .
43007006	Jesus said to them , My time is still to come , but any time is good for you .
43007007	It is not possible for you to be hated by the world ; but I am hated by it , because I give witness that what it does is evil .
43007008	Go you up to the feast : I am not going up now to the feast because my time has not fully come .
43007009	Having said these things to them , he still kept in Galilee .
43007010	But after his brothers had gone up to the feast , then he went up , not publicly , but in secret .
43007011	At the feast the Jews were looking for him and saying , Where is he ?
43007012	And there was much discussion about him among the mass of the people . Some said , He is a good man ; but others said , No , he is giving people false ideas .
43007013	But no man said anything about him openly for fear of the Jews .
43007014	Now in the middle of the feast Jesus went up to the Temple and was teaching .
43007015	Then the Jews were surprised and said , How has this man got knowledge of books ? He has never been to school .
43007016	Jesus gave them this answer : It is not my teaching , but his who sent me .
43007017	If any man is ready to do God's pleasure he will have knowledge of the teaching and of where it comes from--from God or from myself .
43007018	The man whose words come from himself is looking for glory for himself , but he who is looking for the glory of him who sent him--that man is true and there is no evil in him .
43007019	Did not Moses give you the law ? Even so , not one of you keeps the law . Why have you a desire to put me to death ?
43007020	The people said in answer , You have an evil spirit : who has any desire to put you to death ?
43007021	This was the answer of Jesus : I have done one work and you are all surprised at it .
43007022	Moses gave you circumcision--not that it comes from Moses , but from the fathers--and even on the Sabbath you give a child circumcision .
43007023	If a child is given circumcision on the Sabbath so that the law of Moses may not be broken , why are you angry with me because I made a man completely well on the Sabbath ?
43007024	Let not your decisions be based on what you see , but on righteousness .
43007025	Then some of the people of Jerusalem said , Is not this the man whose death is desired ?
43007026	And here he is talking openly and they say nothing to him ! Is it possible that the rulers have knowledge that this is truly the Christ ?
43007027	However , it is clear to us where this man comes from : but when the Christ comes no one will have knowledge where he comes from .
43007028	Then , when he was teaching in the Temple , Jesus said with a loud voice , You have knowledge of me and you have knowledge of where I come from ; and I have not come of myself ; but there is One who has sent me ; he is true , but you have no knowledge of him .
43007029	I have knowledge of him because I came from him and he sent me .
43007030	Then they had a desire to take him : but no man put hands on him because his hour was still to come .
43007031	And numbers of the people had belief in him , and they said , When the Christ comes will he do more signs than this man has done ?
43007032	This discussion of the people came to the ears of the Pharisees ; and the chief priests and the Pharisees sent servants to take him .
43007033	Then Jesus said , I will be with you a little longer and then I go to him who sent me .
43007034	You will be looking for me , and you will not see me : and where I am you may not come .
43007035	So the Jews said among themselves , To what place is he going where we will not see him ? will he go to the Jews living among the Greeks and become the teacher of the Greeks ?
43007036	What is this saying of his , You will be looking for me and will not see me , and where I am you may not come ?
43007037	On the last day , the great day of the feast , Jesus got up and said in a loud voice , If any man is in need of drink let him come to me and I will give it to him .
43007038	He who has faith in me , out of his body , as the Writings have said , will come rivers of living water .
43007039	This he said of the Spirit which would be given to those who had faith in him : the Spirit had not been given then , because the glory of Jesus was still to come .
43007040	When these words came to their ears , some of the people said , This is certainly the prophet .
43007041	Others said , This is the Christ . But others said , Not so ; will the Christ come from Galilee ?
43007042	Do not the Writings say that the Christ comes of the seed of David and from Beth-lehem , the little town where David was ?
43007043	So there was a division among the people because of him .
43007044	And some of them had a desire to take him ; but no man put hands on him .
43007045	Then the servants went back to the chief priests and Pharisees , who said to them , Why have you not got him with you ?
43007046	The servants made answer , No man ever said things like this man .
43007047	Then the Pharisees said to them , Have you , like the others , been given false ideas ?
43007048	Have any of the rulers belief in him , or any one of the Pharisees ?
43007049	But these people who have no knowledge of the law are cursed .
43007050	Nicodemus--he who had come to Jesus before , being himself one of them--said to them ,
43007051	Is a man judged by our law before it has given him a hearing and has knowledge of what he has done ?
43007052	This was their answer : And do you come from Galilee ? Make search and you will see that no prophet comes out of Galilee .
43007053	[ And every man went to his house ;
43008001	But Jesus went to the Mountain of Olives .
43008002	And early in the morning he came again into the Temple and all the people came to him and he was seated teaching them .
43008003	Now the scribes and Pharisees came , with a woman who had been taken in the act of sinning against the married relation ;
43008004	And putting her forward , they said to him , Master , this woman has been taken in the very act of sinning against the married relation .
43008005	Now in the law Moses gave directions that such women were to be stoned ; what do you say about it ?
43008006	They said this , testing him , so that they might have something against him . But Jesus , with his head bent down , made letters on the floor with his finger .
43008007	But when they went on with their questions , he got up and said to them , Let him among you who is without sin be the first to send a stone at her .
43008008	And again , with bent head , he made letters on the floor .
43008009	And when his words came to their ears , they went out one by one , starting with the oldest even to the last , because they were conscious of what was in their hearts : and Jesus was there by himself with the woman before him .
43008010	Then Jesus got up , and seeing nobody but the woman , he said to her , Where are the men who said things against you ? did no one give a decision against you ?
43008011	And she said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said , And I do not give a decision against you : go , and never do wrong again . ]
43008012	Then again Jesus said to them , I am the light of the world ; he who comes with me will not be walking in the dark but will have the light of life .
43008013	So the Pharisees said to him , The witness you give is about yourself : your witness is not true .
43008014	Jesus said in answer , Even if I give witness about myself , my witness is true , because I have knowledge of where I came from and where I am going ; but you have no knowledge of where I come from or of where I am going .
43008015	You are judging from what you see ; I am judging no man .
43008016	Even if I am judging , my decision is right , because I am not by myself--with me is the Father who sent me .
43008017	Even in your law it is said that the witness of two men is true .
43008018	I give witness about myself and the Father who sent me gives witness about me .
43008019	Then they said to him , Where is your Father ? Jesus said in answer , You have no knowledge of me or of my Father : if you had knowledge of me you would have knowledge of my Father .
43008020	Jesus said these words in the place where the offerings were stored , while he was teaching in the Temple : but no man took him because his time was still to come .
43008021	Then he said to them again , I am going away and you will be looking for me , but death will overtake you in your sins . It is not possible for you to come where I am going .
43008022	So the Jews said , Will he take his life ? Is that why he says , Where I go it is not possible for you to come ?
43008023	And he said to them , You are of the earth ; I am from heaven : you are of this world ; I am not of this world .
43008024	For this reason I said to you that death will overtake you in your sins : for if you have not faith that I am he , death will come to you while you are in your sins .
43008025	Then they said to him , Who are you ? Jesus said , What I said to you from the first .
43008026	I have much to say about you and against you : but he who sent me is true and what he has said to me I say to the world .
43008027	They did not see that his words were about the Father .
43008028	So Jesus said , When the Son of man has been lifted up by you , then it will be clear to you who I am , and that I do nothing of myself , but say as the Father gave me teaching .
43008029	He who sent me is with me ; he has not gone from me , because at all times I do the things which are pleasing to him .
43008030	When he said this a number came to have faith in him .
43008031	Then Jesus said to the Jews who had faith in him , If you keep my word , then you are truly my disciples ;
43008032	And you will have knowledge of what is true , and that will make you free .
43008033	They said to him in answer , We are Abraham's seed and have never been any man's servant : why do you say , You will become free ?
43008034	And this was the answer Jesus gave them : Truly I say to you , Everyone who does evil is the servant of sin .
43008035	Now the servant does not go on living in the house for ever , but the son does .
43008036	If then the son makes you free , you will be truly free .
43008037	I am conscious that you are Abraham's seed ; but you have a desire to put me to death because my word has no place in you .
43008038	I say the things which I have seen in my Father's house : and you do the things which come to you from your father's house .
43008039	In answer they said to him , Our father is Abraham . Jesus said to them , If you were Abraham's children you would do what Abraham did .
43008040	But now you have a desire to put me to death , a man who has said to you what is true , as I had it from God : Abraham did not do that .
43008041	You are doing the works of your father . They said to him , We are true sons of Abraham ; we have one Father , who is God .
43008042	Jesus said to them , If God was your Father you would have love for me , because it was from God I came and am here . I did not come of myself , but he sent me .
43008043	Why are my words not clear to you ? It is because your ears are shut to my teaching .
43008044	You are the children of your father the Evil One and it is your pleasure to do his desires . From the first he was a taker of life ; and he did not go in the true way because there is no true thing in him . When he says what is false , it is natural to him , for he is false and the father of what is false .
43008045	But because I say what is true , you have no belief in me .
43008046	Which of you is able truly to say that I am a sinner ? If I say what is true , why have you no belief in me ?
43008047	He who is a child of God gives ear to the words of God : your ears are not open to them because you are not from God .
43008048	The Jews said to him in answer , Are we not right in saying that you are of Samaria and have an evil spirit ?
43008049	And this was the answer of Jesus : I have not an evil spirit ; but I give honour to my Father and you do not give honour to me .
43008050	I , however , am not in search of glory for myself : there is One who is searching for it and he is judge .
43008051	Truly I say to you , If a man keeps my word he will never see death .
43008052	The Jews said to him , Now we are certain that you have an evil spirit . Abraham is dead , and the prophets are dead ; and you say , If a man keeps my word he will never see death .
43008053	Are you greater than our father Abraham , who is dead ? and the prophets are dead : who do you say that you are ?
43008054	Jesus said in answer , If I take glory for myself , my glory is nothing : it is my Father who gives me glory , of whom you say that he is your God .
43008055	You have no knowledge of him , but I have knowledge of him ; and if I said I have no knowledge of him I would be talking falsely like you : but I have full knowledge of him , and I keep his word .
43008056	Your father Abraham was full of joy at the hope of seeing my day : he saw it and was glad .
43008057	Then the Jews said to him , You are not fifty years old ; have you seen Abraham ?
43008058	Jesus said to them , Truly I say to you , Before Abraham came into being , I am .
43008059	So they took up stones to send at him : but Jesus got secretly out of their way and went out of the Temple .
43009001	And when he went on his way , he saw a man blind from birth .
43009002	And his disciples put a question to him , saying , Master , was it because of this man's sin , or the sin of his father and mother , that he has been blind from birth ?
43009003	Jesus said in answer , It was not because of his sin , or because of his father's or mother's ; it was so that the works of God might be seen openly in him .
43009004	While it is day we have to do the works of him who sent me : the night comes when no work may be done .
43009005	As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
43009006	Having said these words , he put earth , mixed with water from his mouth , on the man's eyes ,
43009007	And said to him , Go and make yourself clean in the bath of Siloam ( the sense of the name is , Sent ) . So he went away and , after washing , came back able to see .
43009008	Then the neighbours and others who had seen him before in the street , with his hand out for money , said , Is not this the man who got money from people ?
43009009	Some said , It is he : others said , No , but he is like him . He said , I am he .
43009010	So they said to him , How then were your eyes made open ?
43009011	His answer was : The man who is named Jesus put earth mixed with water on my eyes , and said to me , Go and make yourself clean in Siloam : so I went away and , after washing , am now able to see .
43009012	And they said to him , Where is he ? His answer was : I have no knowledge .
43009013	They took him before the Pharisees--this man who had been blind .
43009014	Now the day on which the earth was mixed by Jesus and the man's eyes were made open was the Sabbath .
43009015	So the Pharisees put more questions to him about how his eyes had been made open . And he said to them , He put earth on my eyes , and I had a wash and am able to see .
43009016	Then some of the Pharisees said , That man has not come from God , for he does not keep the Sabbath . Others said , How is it possible for a sinner to do such signs ? So there was a division among them .
43009017	Again they said to the blind man , What have you to say about him for opening your eyes ? And he said , He is a prophet .
43009018	Now the Jews had no belief in the statement that he had been blind and was now able to see , till they sent for the father and mother of the man whose eyes had been made open ,
43009019	And put the question to them , saying , Is this your son , of whom you say that he was blind at birth ? how is it then that he is now able to see ?
43009020	In answer his father and mother said , We are certain that this is our son and that he was blind at birth :
43009021	But how it is he is now able to see , or who made his eyes open , we are not able to say : put the question to him ; he is old enough to give an answer for himself .
43009022	They said this because of their fear of the Jews : for the Jews had come to an agreement that if any man said that Jesus was the Christ he would be put out of the Synagogue .
43009023	That was the reason why they said , He is old enough ; put the question to him .
43009024	So they sent a second time for the man who had been blind and they said to him , Give glory to God : it is clear to us that this man is a sinner .
43009025	He said in answer , I have no knowledge if he is a sinner or not , but one thing I am certain about ; I was blind , and now I see .
43009026	Then they said to him , What did he do to you ? how did he give you the use of your eyes ?
43009027	His answer was : I have said it before , but your ears were shut : why would you have me say it again ? is it your desire to become his disciples ?
43009028	And they were angry with him and said , You are his disciple , but we are disciples of Moses .
43009029	We are certain that God gave his word to Moses : but as for this man , we have no knowledge where he comes from .
43009030	The man said in answer , Why , here is a strange thing ! You have no knowledge where he comes from though he gave me the use of my eyes .
43009031	We have knowledge that God does not give ear to sinners , but if any man is a worshipper of God and does his pleasure , to him God's ears are open .
43009032	In all the years nobody has ever before seen the eyes of a man blind from birth made open .
43009033	If this man did not come from God he would be unable to do anything .
43009034	Their answer was : You came to birth through sin ; do you make yourself our teacher ? And they put him out of the Synagogue .
43009035	It came to the ears of Jesus that they had put him out , and meeting him he said , Have you faith in the Son of man ?
43009036	He said in answer , And who is he , Lord ? Say , so that I may have faith in him .
43009037	Jesus said to him , You have seen him ; it is he who is talking to you .
43009038	And he said , Lord , I have faith . And he gave him worship .
43009039	And Jesus said , I came into this world to be a judge , so that those who do not see may see , and those who see may become blind .
43009040	These words came to the ears of the Pharisees who were with him and they said to him , Are we , then , blind ?
43009041	Jesus said to them , If you were blind you would have no sin : but now that you say , We see ; your sin is there still .
43010001	Truly I say to you , He who does not go through the door into the place where the sheep are kept , but gets in by some other way , is a thief and an outlaw .
43010002	He who goes in by the door is the keeper of the sheep .
43010003	The porter lets him in ; and the sheep give ear to his voice ; he says over the names of the sheep , and takes them out .
43010004	When he has got them all out , he goes before them , and the sheep go after him , for they have knowledge of his voice .
43010005	They will not go after another who is not their keeper , but will go from him in flight , because his voice is strange to them .
43010006	In this Jesus was teaching them in the form of a story : but what he said was not clear to them .
43010007	So Jesus said again , Truly I say to you , I am the door of the sheep .
43010008	All who came before me are thieves and outlaws : but the sheep did not give ear to them .
43010009	I am the door : if any man goes in through me he will have salvation , and will go in and go out , and will get food .
43010010	The thief comes only to take the sheep and to put them to death : he comes for their destruction : I have come so that they may have life and have it in greater measure .
43010011	I am the good keeper of sheep : the good keeper gives his life for the sheep .
43010012	He who is a servant , and not the keeper or the owner of the sheep , sees the wolf coming and goes in flight , away from the sheep ; and the wolf comes down on them and sends them in all directions :
43010013	Because he is a servant he has no interest in the sheep .
43010014	I am the good keeper ; I have knowledge of my sheep , and they have knowledge of me ,
43010015	Even as the Father has knowledge of me and I of the Father ; and I am giving my life for the sheep .
43010016	And I have other sheep which are not of this field : I will be their guide in the same way , and they will give ear to my voice , so there will be one flock and one keeper .
43010017	For this reason am I loved by the Father , because I give up my life so that I may take it again .
43010018	No one takes it away from me ; I give it up of myself . I have power to give it up , and I have power to take it again . These orders I have from my Father .
43010019	There was a division again among the Jews because of these words .
43010020	And a number of them said , He has an evil spirit and is out of his mind ; why do you give ear to him ?
43010021	Others said , These are not the words of one who has an evil spirit . Is it possible for an evil spirit to make blind people see ?
43010022	Then came the feast of the opening of the Temple in Jerusalem : it was winter ;
43010023	And Jesus was walking in the Temple , in Solomon's covered way .
43010024	Then the Jews came round him , saying , how long are you going to keep us in doubt ? If you are the Christ , say so clearly .
43010025	Jesus said in answer , I have said it and you have no belief : the works which I do in my Father's name , these give witness about me .
43010026	But you have no belief because you are not of my sheep .
43010027	My sheep give ear to my voice , and I have knowledge of them , and they come after me :
43010028	And I give them eternal life ; they will never come to destruction , and no one will ever take them out of my hand .
43010029	That which my Father has given to me has more value than all ; and no one is able to take anything out of the Father's hand .
43010030	I and my Father are one .
43010031	Then the Jews took up stones again to send at him .
43010032	Jesus said to them in answer , I have let you see a number of good works from the Father ; for which of those works are you stoning me ?
43010033	This was their answer : We are not stoning you for a good work but for evil words ; because being a man you make yourself God .
43010034	In answer , Jesus said , Is there not a saying in your law , I said , You are gods ?
43010035	If he said they were gods , to whom the word of God came ( and the Writings may not be broken ) ,
43010036	Do you say of him whom the Father made holy and sent into the world , Your words are evil ; because I said , I am God's Son ?
43010037	If I am not doing the works of my Father , do not have belief in me ;
43010038	But if I am doing them , then have belief in the works even if you have no belief in me ; so that you may see clearly and be certain that the Father is in me and I am in the Father .
43010039	Then again they made an attempt to take him ; but he got away from them .
43010040	And he went again to the other side of the Jordan , to the place where John first gave baptism ; and he was there for a time .
43010041	And a great number of people came to him , saying , John did no sign : but everything John said of this man was true .
43010042	And a number came to have faith in him there .
43011001	Now a certain man named Lazarus was ill ; he was of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
43011002	( The Mary whose brother Lazarus was ill , was the Mary who put perfumed oil on the Lord and made his feet dry with her hair . )
43011003	So the sisters sent to him , saying , Lord , your dear friend is ill .
43011004	When this came to his ears , Jesus said , The end of this disease is not death , but the glory of God , so that the Son of God may have glory because of it .
43011005	Now Jesus had love in his heart for Martha and her sister and Lazarus .
43011006	So when the news came to him that Lazarus was ill , he did not go from the place where he was for two days .
43011007	Then after that time he said to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
43011008	The disciples said to him , Master , the Jews were attempting only the other day to have you stoned , and are you going back there again ?
43011009	Then Jesus said in answer , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? A man may go about in the day without falling , because he sees the light of this world .
43011010	But if a man goes about in the night , he may have a fall because the light is not in him .
43011011	These things said he : and after that he said to them , Lazarus our friend is at rest ; but I go so that I may make him come out of his sleep .
43011012	Then his disciples said to him , Lord , if he is resting he will get well .
43011013	Jesus , however , was talking of his death : but they had the idea that he was talking about taking rest in sleep .
43011014	Then Jesus said to them clearly , Lazarus is dead .
43011015	And because of you I am glad I was not there , so that you may have faith ; but let us go to him .
43011016	Then Thomas , who was named Didymus , said to the other disciples , Let us go so that we may be with him in death .
43011017	Now when Jesus came , he made the discovery that Lazarus had been put into the earth four days before .
43011018	Now Bethany was near to Jerusalem , about two miles away ;
43011019	And a number of Jews had come to Martha and Mary to give them comfort about their brother .
43011020	When Martha had the news that Jesus was on the way , she went out to him , but Mary did not go from the house .
43011021	Then Martha said to Jesus , Lord , if you had been here my brother would not be dead .
43011022	But I am certain that , even now , whatever request you make to God , God will give it to you .
43011023	Jesus said to her , Your brother will come to life again .
43011024	Martha said to him , I am certain that he will come to life again when all come back from the dead at the last day .
43011025	Jesus said to her , I am myself that day and that life ; he who has faith in me will have life even if he is dead ;
43011026	And no one who is living and has faith in me will ever see death . Is this your faith ?
43011027	She said to him , Yes , Lord : my faith is that you are the Christ , the Son of God , who was to come into the world .
43011028	And having said this , she went away and said secretly to her sister Mary , The Master is here and has sent for you .
43011029	And Mary , hearing this , got up quickly and went to him .
43011030	Now Jesus had not at this time come into the town , but was still in the place where Martha had seen him .
43011031	Then the Jews who were with her in the house , comforting her , when they saw Mary get up quickly and go out , went after her in the belief that she was going to the place of the dead and would be weeping there .
43011032	When Mary came to where Jesus was and saw him , she went down at his feet , saying , Lord , if you had been here my brother would not be dead .
43011033	And when Jesus saw her weeping , and saw the Jews weeping who came with her , his spirit was moved and he was troubled ,
43011034	And said , Where have you put him ? They said , Come and see , Lord .
43011035	And Jesus himself was weeping .
43011036	So the Jews said , See how dear he was to him !
43011037	But some of them said , This man , who made open the eyes of the blind man , was he not able to keep his friend from death ?
43011038	So Jesus , deeply troubled in heart , came to the place of the dead . It was a hole in the rock , and a stone was over the opening .
43011039	Jesus said , Take away the stone . Martha , the sister of him who was dead , said , Lord , by this time the body will be smelling , for he has been dead four days .
43011040	Jesus said to her , Did I not say to you that if you had faith you would see the glory of God ?
43011041	So they took away the stone . And Jesus , looking up to heaven , said , Father , I give praise to you for hearing me .
43011042	I was certain that your ears are at all times open to me , but I said it because of these who are here , so that they may see that you sent me .
43011043	Then he said in a loud voice , Lazarus , come out !
43011044	And he who was dead came out , with linen bands folded tightly about his hands and feet , and a cloth about his face . Jesus said to them , Make him free and let him go .
43011045	Then a number of the Jews who had come to Mary and had seen the things which Jesus did had belief in him .
43011046	But some of them went to the Pharisees with the news of what Jesus had done .
43011047	Then the high priests and the Pharisees had a meeting and said , What are we doing ? This man is doing a number of signs .
43011048	If we let him go on in this way , everybody will have belief in him and the Romans will come and take away our place and our nation .
43011049	But one of them , Caiaphas , who was high priest that year , said to them , You have no knowledge of anything ;
43011050	You do not see that it is in your interest for one man to be put to death for the people , so that all the nation may not come to destruction .
43011051	He did not say this of himself , but being the high priest that year he said , as a prophet , that Jesus would be put to death for the nation ;
43011052	And not for that nation only , but for the purpose of uniting in one body the children of God all over the world .
43011053	And from that day they took thought together how to put him to death .
43011054	So Jesus no longer went about publicly among the Jews , but went from there into the country near to the waste land , to a town named Ephraim , where he was for some time with the disciples .
43011055	Now the Passover of the Jews was near , and numbers of people went up from the country to Jerusalem to make themselves clean before the Passover .
43011056	They were looking for Jesus and saying to one another while they were in the Temple , What is your opinion ? Will he not come to the feast ?
43011057	Now the chief priests and the Pharisees had given orders that if anyone had knowledge where he was , he was to give them word , so that they might take him .
43012001	Then , six days before the Passover , Jesus came to Bethany where Lazarus was , whom Jesus had made to come back from the dead .
43012002	So they made him a meal there , and he was waited on by Martha , and Lazarus was among those who were seated with him at table .
43012003	Then Mary , taking a pound of perfumed oil of great value , put it on the feet of Jesus and made them dry with her hair : and the house became full of the smell of the perfume .
43012004	But one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot ( who was to give him up ) , said ,
43012005	Why was not this perfume traded for three hundred pence , and the money given to the poor ?
43012006	( He said this , not because he had any love for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and , having the money-bag , took for himself what was put into it . )
43012007	Then Jesus said , Let her be . Let her keep what she has for the day of my death .
43012008	The poor you have ever with you , but me you have not for ever .
43012009	Then a great number of the Jews had news that he was there : and they came , not only because of Jesus , but so that they might see Lazarus who had been dead and to whom he had given life .
43012010	Now there was talk among the chief priests of putting Lazarus to death ;
43012011	For because of him a great number of the Jews went away and had belief in Jesus .
43012012	The day after , a great number of people who were there for the feast , when they had the news that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
43012013	Took branches of palm-trees and went out to him , crying , A blessing on him who comes in the name of the Lord , the King of Israel !
43012014	And Jesus saw a young ass and took his seat on it ; as the Writings say ,
43012015	Have no fear , daughter of Zion : see your King is coming , seated on a young ass .
43012016	( These things were not clear to his disciples at first : but when Jesus had been lifted up into his glory , then it came to their minds that these things in the Writings were about him and that they had been done to him . )
43012017	Now the people who were with him when his voice came to Lazarus in the place of the dead , and gave him life again , had been talking about it .
43012018	And that was the reason the people went out to him , because it had come to their ears that he had done this sign .
43012019	Then the Pharisees said one to another , You see , you are unable to do anything : the world has gone after him .
43012020	Now there were some Greeks among the people who had come up to give worship at the feast :
43012021	They came to Philip , who was of Beth-saida in Galilee , and made a request , saying , Sir , we have a desire to see Jesus .
43012022	Philip went and gave word of it to Andrew ; and Andrew went with Philip to Jesus .
43012023	And Jesus said to them in answer , The hour of the glory of the Son of man has come .
43012024	Truly I say to you , If a seed of grain does not go into the earth and come to an end , it is still a seed and no more ; but through its death it gives much fruit .
43012025	He who is in love with life will have it taken from him ; and he who has no care for his life in this world will keep it for ever and ever .
43012026	If any man is my servant , let him come after me ; and where I am , there will my servant be . If any man becomes my servant , my Father will give him honour .
43012027	Now is my soul troubled ; and what am I to say ? Father , keep me from this hour . No : for this purpose have I come to this hour .
43012028	Father , give glory to your name . Then there came a voice out of heaven , saying , I have given it glory , and I will give it glory again .
43012029	Hearing the sound , a number of people who were there said that it was thunder : others said , An angel was talking to him .
43012030	Jesus said in answer , This voice came not for me but for you .
43012031	Now is this world to be judged : now will the ruler of this world be sent out .
43012032	And I , if I am lifted up from the earth , will make all men come to me .
43012033	( This he said , pointing to the sort of death he would have . )
43012034	Then the people in answer said to him , The law says that the Christ will have life without end : how say you then that it is necessary for the Son of man to be lifted up ? Who is this Son of man ?
43012035	Jesus said to them , For a little time longer the light will be among you ; while you have the light go on walking in it , so that the dark may not overtake you : one walking in the dark has no knowledge of where he is going .
43012036	In so far as you have the light , put your faith in the light so that you may become sons of light . With these words Jesus went away and for a time was not seen again by them .
43012037	But though he had done such a number of signs before them , they still had no belief in him :
43012038	So that the words of the prophet Isaiah might come true , when he said , Lord , who has any belief in our preaching ? and the arm of the Lord , to whom has it been unveiled ?
43012039	For this reason they were unable to have belief , because Isaiah said again ,
43012040	He has made their eyes blind , and their hearts hard ; for fear that they might see with their eyes and get knowledge with their hearts , and be changed , and I might make them well .
43012041	( Isaiah said these words because he saw his glory . His words were about him . )
43012042	However , a number even of the rulers had belief in him , but because of the Pharisees they did not say so openly for fear that they might be shut out from the Synagogue :
43012043	For the praise of men was dearer to them than the approval of God .
43012044	Then Jesus said with a loud voice , He who has faith in me , has faith not in me , but in him who sent me .
43012045	And he who sees me , sees him who sent me .
43012046	I have come as a light into the world , so that no one who has faith in me will go on living in the dark .
43012047	And if any man gives ear to my words and does not keep them , I am not his judge : I did not come to be judge of the world but to give salvation to the world .
43012048	He who puts me on one side and does not take my words to heart , is not without a judge : the word which I have said will be his judge on the last day .
43012049	For I have not said it on my authority , but the Father who sent me gave me orders what to say and how to say it .
43012050	And I have knowledge that his order is eternal life : so that the things which I say , I say them even as the Father says them to me .
43013001	Now before the feast of the Passover , it was clear to Jesus that the time had come for him to go away from this world to the Father . Having once had love for those in the world who were his , his love for them went on to the end .
43013002	So while a meal was going on , the Evil One having now put it into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon's son , to be false to him ,
43013003	Jesus , being conscious that the Father had put everything into his hands , and that he came from God and was going to God ,
43013004	Got up from table , put off his robe and took a cloth and put it round him .
43013005	Then he put water into a basin and was washing the feet of the disciples and drying them with the cloth which was round him .
43013006	So he came to Simon Peter . Peter said , Lord , are my feet to be washed by you ?
43013007	And Jesus , answering , said to him , What I do is not clear to you now , but it will be clear to you in time to come .
43013008	Peter said , I will never let my feet be washed by you , never . Jesus said in answer , If I do not make you clean you have no part with me .
43013009	Simon Peter said to him , Lord , not my feet only , but my hands and my head .
43013010	Jesus said to him , He who is bathed has need only to have his feet washed and then he is clean all over : and you , my disciples , are clean , but not all of you .
43013011	( He had knowledge who was false to him ; that is why he said , You are not all clean . )
43013012	Then , after washing their feet and putting on his robe again , he took his seat and said to them , Do you see what I have done to you ?
43013013	You give me the name of Master and Lord : and you are right ; that is what I am .
43013014	If then I , the Lord and the Master , have made your feet clean , it is right for you to make one another's feet clean .
43013015	I have given you an example , so that you may do what I have done to you .
43013016	Truly I say to you , A servant is not greater than his lord ; and he who is sent is not greater than the one who sent him .
43013017	If these things are clear to you , happy are you if you do them .
43013018	I am not talking of you all : I have knowledge of my true disciples , but things are as they are , so that the Writings may come true , The foot of him who takes bread with me is lifted up against me .
43013019	From this time forward , I give you knowledge of things before they come about , so that when they come about you may have belief that I am he .
43013020	Truly I say to you , He who takes to his heart anyone whom I send , takes me to his heart ; and he who so takes me , takes him who sent me .
43013021	When Jesus had said this he was troubled in spirit , and gave witness , saying , Truly I say to you , that one of you will be false to me .
43013022	Then the eyes of the disciples were turned on one another , in doubt as to whom he had in mind .
43013023	There was at table one of his disciples , the one dear to Jesus , resting his head on Jesus ' breast .
43013024	Making a sign to him , Simon Peter said , Who is it he is talking about ?
43013025	He , then , resting his head on Jesus ' breast , said to him , Lord , who is it ?
43013026	This was the answer Jesus gave : It is the one to whom I will give this bit of bread after I have put it in the vessel . Then he took the bit of bread , put it into the vessel , and gave it to Judas , the son of Simon Iscariot .
43013027	And when Judas took the bread Satan went into him . Then Jesus said to him , Do quickly what you have to do .
43013028	Now it was not clear to anyone at table why he said this to him .
43013029	Some were of the opinion that because Judas kept the money-bag Jesus said to him , Get the things we have need of for the feast ; or , that he was to give something to the poor .
43013030	So Judas , having taken the bit of bread , straight away went out : and it was night .
43013031	Then when he had gone out , Jesus said , Now is glory given to the Son of man , and God is given glory in him .
43013032	If God is given glory in him , God will give him glory in himself , and will give him glory even now .
43013033	My dear children , I am only to be with you a little longer . Then you will be looking for me : and as I said to the Jews , so now I say to you , Where I am going you may not come .
43013034	I give you a new law : Have love one for another ; even as I have had love for you , so are you to have love one for another .
43013035	By this it will be clear to all men that you are my disciples , if you have love one for another .
43013036	Simon Peter said to him , Lord , where are you going ? Jesus said in answer , Where I am going you may not come with me now , but you will come later .
43013037	Peter said to him , Why may I not come with you even now ? I will give up my life for you .
43013038	Jesus said in answer , Will you give up your life for me ? Truly I say to you , Before the cry of the cock you will have said three times that you are not my disciple .
43014001	Let not your heart be troubled : have faith in God and have faith in me .
43014002	In my Father's house are rooms enough ; if it was not so , would I have said that I am going to make ready a place for you ?
43014003	And if I go and make ready a place for you , I will come back again and will take you to be with me , so that you may be where I am .
43014004	And you all have knowledge of where I am going , and of the way to it .
43014005	Thomas said , Lord , we have no knowledge of where you are going ; how may we have knowledge of the way ?
43014006	Jesus said to him , I am the true and living way : no one comes to the Father but by me .
43014007	If you had knowledge of me , you would have knowledge of my Father : you have knowledge of him now and have seen him .
43014008	Philip said to him , Lord , let us see the Father , and we have need of nothing more .
43014009	Jesus said to him , Philip , have I been with you all this time , and still you have no knowledge of me ? He who has seen me has seen the Father . Why do you say , Let us see the Father ?
43014010	Have you not faith that I am in the Father and the Father is in me ? The words which I say to you , I say not from myself : but the Father who is in me all the time does his works .
43014011	Have faith that I am in the Father and that the Father is in me : at least , have faith in me because of what I do .
43014012	Truly I say to you , He who puts his faith in me will do the very works which I do , and he will do greater things than these , because I am going to my Father .
43014013	And whatever request you make in my name , that I will do , so that the Father may have glory in the Son .
43014014	If you make any request to me in my name , I will do it .
43014015	If you have love for me , you will keep my laws .
43014016	And I will make prayer to the Father and he will give you another Helper to be with you for ever ,
43014017	Even the Spirit of true knowledge . That Spirit the world is not able to take to its heart because it sees him not and has no knowledge of him : but you have knowledge of him , because he is ever with you and will be in you .
43014018	I will not let you be without a friend : I am coming to you .
43014019	A little time longer , and the world will see me no more ; but you will see me ; and you will be living because I am living .
43014020	At that time it will be clear to you that I am in my Father , and you are in me , and I in you .
43014021	He who has my laws and keeps them , he it is who has love for me : and he who has love for me will be loved by my Father , and I will have love for him and will let myself be seen clearly by him .
43014022	Judas ( not Iscariot ) said to him , How is it that you will let yourself be seen clearly by us and not by the world ?
43014023	Jesus said to him in answer , If anyone has love for me , he will keep my words : and he will be dear to my Father ; and we will come to him and make our living-place with him .
43014024	He who has no love for me does not keep my words ; and the word which you are hearing is not my word but the Father's who sent me .
43014025	I have said all this to you while I am still with you .
43014026	But the Helper , the Holy Spirit , whom the Father will send in my name , will be your teacher in all things and will put you in mind of everything I have said to you .
43014027	May peace be with you ; my peace I give to you : I give it not as the world gives . Let not your heart be troubled ; let it be without fear .
43014028	Keep in mind how I said to you , I go away and come to you again . If you had love for me you would be glad , because I am going to the Father : for the Father is greater than I .
43014029	And now I have given you word of it before it comes , so that , when it comes , you may have faith .
43014030	After this I will not say much to you , because the ruler of this world comes : and he has no power over me ;
43014031	But he comes so that the world may see that I have love for the Father , and that I am doing as I am ordered by the Father . Get up , and let us go .
43015001	I am the true vine and my Father is the gardener .
43015002	He takes away every branch in me which has no fruit , and every branch which has fruit he makes clean , so that it may have more fruit .
43015003	You are clean , even now , through the teaching which I have given you .
43015004	Be in me at all times as I am in you . As the branch is not able to give fruit of itself , if it is not still on the vine , so you are not able to do so if you are not in me .
43015005	I am the vine , you are the branches : he who is in me at all times as I am in him , gives much fruit , because without me you are able to do nothing .
43015006	If a man does not keep himself in me , he becomes dead and is cut off like a dry branch ; such branches are taken up and put in the fire and burned .
43015007	If you are in me at all times , and my words are in you , then anything for which you make a request will be done for you .
43015008	Here is my Father's glory , in that you give much fruit and so are my true disciples .
43015009	Even as the Father has given me his love , so I have given my love to you : be ever in my love .
43015010	If you keep my laws , you will be ever in my love , even as I have kept my Father's laws , and am ever in his love .
43015011	I have said these things to you so that I may have joy in you and so that your joy may be complete .
43015012	This is the law I give you : Have love one for another , even as I have love for you .
43015013	Greater love has no man than this , that a man gives up his life for his friends .
43015014	You are my friends , if you do what I give you orders to do .
43015015	No longer do I give you the name of servants ; because a servant is without knowledge of what his master is doing : I give you the name of friends , because I have given you knowledge of all the things which my Father has said to me .
43015016	You did not take me for yourselves , but I took you for myself ; and I gave you the work of going about and producing fruit which will be for ever ; so that whatever request you make to the Father in my name he may give it to you .
43015017	So this is my law for you : Have love one for another .
43015018	If you are hated by the world , keep in mind that I was hated by the world before you .
43015019	If you were of the world , you would be loved by the world : but because you are not of the world , but I have taken you out of the world , you are hated by the world .
43015020	Keep in mind the words I said to you , A servant is not greater than his lord . If they were cruel to me , they will be cruel to you ; if they kept my words , they will keep yours .
43015021	They will do all this to you because of my name--because they have no knowledge of him who sent me .
43015022	If I had not come and been their teacher they would have had no sin : but now they have no reason to give for their sin .
43015023	He who has hate for me has hate for my Father .
43015024	If I had not done among them the works which no other man ever did , they would have had no sin : but now they have seen , and they have had hate in their hearts for me and my Father .
43015025	This comes about so that the writing in their law may be made true , Their hate for me was without cause .
43015026	When the Helper comes , whom I will send to you from the Father even the Spirit of true knowledge who comes from the Father--he will give witness about me ;
43015027	And you , in addition , will give witness because you have been with me from the first .
43016001	I have said these things to you so that you may not be in doubt .
43016002	They will put you out of the Synagogues : yes , the time is coming when whoever puts you to death will have the belief that he is doing God's pleasure .
43016003	They will do these things to you because they have not had knowledge of the Father or of me .
43016004	I have said these things to you so that when the time comes , what I have said may come to your mind . I did not say them to you at the first , because then I was still with you .
43016005	But now I am going to him who sent me ; and not one of you says to me , Where are you going ?
43016006	But your hearts are full of sorrow because I have said these things .
43016007	But what I am saying is true : my going is for your good : for if I do not go away , the Helper will not come to you ; but if I go , I will send him to you .
43016008	And he , when he comes , will make the world conscious of sin , and of righteousness , and of being judged :
43016009	Of sin , because they have not faith in me ;
43016010	Of righteousness , because I go to the Father and you will see me no more ;
43016011	Of being judged , because the ruler of this world has been judged .
43016012	I have still much to say to you , but you are not strong enough for it now .
43016013	However , when he , the Spirit of true knowledge , has come , he will be your guide into all true knowledge : for his words will not come from himself , but whatever has come to his hearing , that he will say : and he will make clear to you the things to come .
43016014	He will give me glory , because he will take of what is mine , and make it clear to you .
43016015	Everything which the Father has is mine : that is why I say , He will take of what is mine and will make it clear to you .
43016016	After a little time you will see me no longer ; and then again , after a little time , you will see me .
43016017	So some of the disciples said one to another , What is this he is saying , After a little time , you will see me no longer ; and then again , after a little time , you will see me ? and , I am going to the Father ?
43016018	So they said again and again , What is this he is saying , A little time ? His words are not clear to us .
43016019	Jesus saw that they had a desire to put the question to him , so he said to them , Is this what you are questioning one with another , why I said , After a little time , you will see me no longer ; and then again , after a little time , you will see me ?
43016020	Truly I say to you , You will be weeping and sorrowing , but the world will be glad : you will be sad , but your sorrow will be turned into joy .
43016021	When a woman is about to give birth she has sorrow , because her hour is come ; but when she has given birth to the child , the pain is put out of her mind by the joy that a man has come into the world .
43016022	So you have sorrow now : but I will see you again , and your hearts will be glad , and no one will take away your joy .
43016023	And on that day you will put no questions to me . Truly I say to you , Whatever request you make to the Father , he will give it to you in my name .
43016024	Up to now you have made no request in my name : do so , and it will be answered , so that your hearts may be full of joy .
43016025	All this I have said to you in veiled language : but the time is coming when I will no longer say things in veiled language but will give you knowledge of the Father clearly .
43016026	In that day you will make requests in my name : and I do not say that I will make prayer to the Father for you ,
43016027	For the Father himself gives his love to you , because you have given your love to me and have had faith that I came from God .
43016028	I came out from the Father and have come into the world : again , I go away from the world and go to the Father .
43016029	His disciples said , Now you are talking clearly and not in veiled language .
43016030	Now we are certain that you have knowledge of all things and have no need for anyone to put questions to you : through this we have faith that you came from God .
43016031	Jesus made answer , Have you faith now ?
43016032	See , a time is coming , yes , it is now here , when you will go away in all directions , every man to his house , and I will be by myself : but I am not by myself , because the Father is with me .
43016033	I have said all these things to you so that in me you may have peace . In the world you have trouble : but take heart ! I have overcome the world .
43017001	Jesus said these things ; then , lifting his eyes to heaven , he said , Father , the time has now come ; give glory to your Son , so that the Son may give glory to you :
43017002	Even as you gave him authority over all flesh , to give eternal life to all those whom you have given to him .
43017003	And this is eternal life : to have knowledge of you , the only true God , and of him whom you have sent , even Jesus Christ .
43017004	I have given you glory on the earth , having done all the work which you gave me to do .
43017005	And now , Father , let me have glory with you , even that glory which I had with you before the world was .
43017006	I have given knowledge of your name to the men whom you gave me out of the world : yours they were , and you gave them to me , and they have kept your words .
43017007	Now it is clear to them that whatever you have given to me comes from you :
43017008	Because I have given them the words which you gave to me ; and they have taken them to heart , and have certain knowledge that I came from you , and they have faith that you sent me .
43017009	My prayer is for them : my prayer is not for the world , but for those whom you have given to me , because they are yours
43017010	( All mine are yours , and yours are mine ) and I have glory in them .
43017011	And now I will be no longer in the world , but they are in the world and I come to you . Holy Father , keep them in your name which you have given to me , so that they may be one even as we are one .
43017012	While I was with them I kept them safe in your name which you have given to me : I took care of them and not one of them has come to destruction , but only the son of destruction , so that the Writings might come true .
43017013	And now I come to you ; and these things I say in the world so that they may have my joy complete in them .
43017014	I have given your word to them ; and they are hated by the world , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
43017015	My prayer is not that you will take them out of the world , but that you will keep them from the Evil One .
43017016	They are not of the world any more than I am of the world .
43017017	Make them holy by the true word : your word is the true word .
43017018	Even as you have sent me into the world , so I have sent them into the world .
43017019	And for them I make myself holy , so that they may be made truly holy .
43017020	My prayer is not for them only , but for all who will have faith in me through their word ;
43017021	May they all be one ! Even as you , Father , are in me and I am in you , so let them be in us , so that all men may come to have faith that you sent me .
43017022	And the glory which you have given to me I have given to them , so that they may be one even as we are one ;
43017023	I in them , and you in me , so that they may be made completely one , and so that it may become clear to all men that you have sent me and that they are loved by you as I am loved by you .
43017024	Father , it is my desire that these whom you have given to me may be by my side where I am , so that they may see my glory which you have given to me , because you had love for me before the world came into being .
43017025	Father of righteousness , I have knowledge of you , though the world has not ; and to these it is clear that you sent me ;
43017026	And I have given to them knowledge of your name , and will give it , so that the love which you have for me may be in them and I in them .
43018001	When Jesus had said these words he went out with his disciples over the stream Kedron to a garden , into which he went with his disciples .
43018002	And Judas , who was false to him , had knowledge of the place because Jesus went there frequently with his disciples .
43018003	So Judas , getting a band of armed men and police from the chief priests and Pharisees , went there with lights and with arms .
43018004	Then Jesus , having knowledge of everything which was coming on him , went forward and said to them , Who are you looking for ?
43018005	Their answer was , Jesus the Nazarene . Jesus said , I am he . And Judas , who was false to him , was there at their side .
43018006	And when he said to them , I am he , they went back , falling to the earth .
43018007	So again he put the question to them , Who are you looking for ? And they said , Jesus the Nazarene .
43018008	Jesus made answer , I have said that I am he ; if you are looking for me , let these men go away .
43018009	( He said this so that his words might come true , I have kept safe all those whom you gave to me . )
43018010	Then Simon Peter , who had a sword , took it out and gave the high priest's servant a blow , cutting off his right ear . The servant's name was Malchus .
43018011	Then Jesus said to Peter , Put back your sword : am I not to take the cup which my Father has given to me ?
43018012	Then the band and the chief captain and the police took Jesus and put cords round him .
43018013	They took him first to Annas , because Annas was the father-in-law of Caiaphas who was the high priest that year .
43018014	It was Caiaphas who had said to the Jews that it was in their interest for one man to be put to death for the people .
43018015	And Simon Peter went after Jesus with another disciple . Now that disciple was a friend of the high priest and he went in with Jesus into the house of the high priest ;
43018016	But Peter was kept outside at the door . Then this other disciple , who was a friend of the high priest , came out and had a word with the girl who kept the door , and took Peter in .
43018017	Then the girl who was the door-keeper said to Peter , Are you not one of this man's disciples ? In answer he said , I am not .
43018018	Now the servants and the police had made a fire of coals because it was cold ; they were warming themselves in front of it and Peter was there with them , warming himself .
43018019	Then the high priest put questions to Jesus about his disciples and his teaching .
43018020	Jesus made answer , I said things openly to the world at all times ; I have given my teaching in the Synagogues and in the Temple to which all the Jews come ; and I have said nothing secretly .
43018021	Why are you questioning me ? put questions to my hearers about what I have said to them : they have knowledge of what I said .
43018022	When he said this , one of the police by his side gave him a blow with his open hand , saying , Do you give such an answer to the high priest ?
43018023	Jesus said in answer , If I have said anything evil , give witness to the evil : but if I said what is true , why do you give me blows ?
43018024	Then Annas sent him chained to Caiaphas , the high priest .
43018025	But Simon Peter was still there warming himself by the fire . They said to him , Are you not one of his disciples ? He said , No , I am not .
43018026	One of the servants of the high priest , a relation of him whose ear had been cut off by Peter , said , Did I not see you with him in the garden ?
43018027	Then again Peter said , No . And straight away a cock gave its cry .
43018028	So they took Jesus from the house of Caiaphas to the Praetorium . It was early . They themselves did not go into the Praetorium , so that they might not become unclean , but might take the Passover .
43018029	So Pilate came out to them and put the question : What have you to say against this man ?
43018030	They said to him in answer , If the man was not a wrongdoer we would not have given him up to you .
43018031	Then Pilate said to them , Take him yourselves and let him be judged by your law . But the Jews said to him , We have no right to put any man to death .
43018032	( That the word of Jesus might come true , pointing to the sort of death he would have . )
43018033	Then Pilate went back into the Praetorium and sent for Jesus and said to him , Are you the King of the Jews ?
43018034	Jesus made answer , Do you say this of yourself , or did others say it about me ?
43018035	Pilate said , Am I a Jew ? Your nation and the chief priests have given you into my hands : what have you done ?
43018036	Jesus said in answer , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom was of this world , my disciples would have made a good fight to keep me out of the hands of the Jews : but my kingdom is not here .
43018037	Then Pilate said to him , Are you then a king ? Jesus made answer , You say that I am a king . For this purpose was I given birth , and for this purpose I came into the world , that I might give witness to what is true . Every lover of what is true gives ear to my voice .
43018038	Pilate said to him , True ? what is true ? Having said this he went out again to the Jews and said to them , I see no wrong in him .
43018039	But every year you make a request to me to let a prisoner go free at the Passover . Is it your desire that I let the King of the Jews go free ?
43018040	Then again they gave a loud cry , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was an outlaw .
43019001	Then Pilate took Jesus and had him whipped with cords .
43019002	And the men of the army made a crown of thorns and put it on his head , and they put a purple robe on him .
43019003	And they kept coming and saying , Long life to the King of the Jews ! And they gave him blows with their hands .
43019004	And Pilate went out again and said to them , See , I let him come out to you to make it clear to you that I see no wrong in him .
43019005	Then Jesus came out with the crown of thorns and the purple robe . And Pilate said to them , Here is the man !
43019006	So when the chief priests and the police saw him they gave a loud cry , To the cross ! to the cross ! Pilate said to them , Take him yourselves and put him on the cross : I see no crime in him .
43019007	And the Jews made answer , We have a law , and by that law it is right for him to be put to death because he said he was the Son of God .
43019008	When this saying came to Pilate's ears his fear became greater ;
43019009	And he went again into the Praetorium and said to Jesus , Where do you come from ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
43019010	Then Pilate said to him , You say nothing to me ? is it not clear to you that I have power to let you go free and power to put you to death on the cross ?
43019011	Jesus gave this answer : You would have no power at all over me if it was not given to you by God ; so that he who gave me up to you has the greater sin .
43019012	Hearing this , Pilate had a desire to let him go free , but the Jews said in a loud voice , If you let this man go , you are not Caesar's friend : everyone who makes himself a king goes against Caesar .
43019013	So when these words came to Pilate's ear , he took Jesus out , seating himself in the judge's seat in a place named in Hebrew , Gabbatha , or the Stone Floor .
43019014	( It was the day when they made ready for the Passover ; and it was about the sixth hour . ) And he said to the Jews , There is your King !
43019015	Then they gave a loud cry , Away with him ! away with him ! to the cross ! Pilate said to them , Am I to put your King to death on the cross ? The chief priests said in answer , We have no king but Caesar .
43019016	So then he gave him up to them to be put to death on the cross . And they took Jesus away ;
43019017	And he went out with his cross on him to the place which is named Dead Man's Head ( in Hebrew , Golgotha ) :
43019018	Where they put him on the cross with two others , one on this side and one on that , and Jesus in the middle .
43019019	And Pilate put on the cross a statement in writing . The writing was : JESUS THE NAZARENE , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
43019020	The writing was seen by a number of the Jews , for the place where Jesus was put to death on the cross was near the town ; and the writing was in Hebrew and Latin and Greek .
43019021	Then the chief priests of the Jews said to Pilate , Do not put , The King of the Jews , but , He said , I am the King of the Jews .
43019022	But Pilate made answer , What I have put in writing will not be changed .
43019023	And when Jesus was nailed to the cross , the men of the army took his clothing , and made a division of it into four parts , to every man a part , and they took his coat : now the coat was without a join , made out of one bit of cloth .
43019024	So they said among themselves , Let this not be cut up , but let us put it to the decision of chance and see who gets it . ( They did this so that the Writings might come true , which say , They made a distribution of my clothing among them , and my coat they put to the decision of chance . ) This was what the men of the army did .
43019025	Now by the side of the cross of Jesus were his mother , and his mother's sister Mary , the wife of Cleopas , and Mary Magdalene .
43019026	So when Jesus saw his mother and the disciple who was dear to him , he said to his mother , Mother , there is your son !
43019027	Then he said to the disciple , There is your mother ! And from that hour the disciple took her to his house .
43019028	After this , being conscious that all things had now been done so that the Writings might come true , Jesus said , Give me water .
43019029	Now there was a vessel ready , full of bitter wine , and they put a sponge full of it on a stick and put it to his mouth .
43019030	So when Jesus had taken the wine he said , All is done . And with his head bent he gave up his spirit .
43019031	Now it was the day of getting ready for the Passover , and so that the bodies might not be on the cross on the Sabbath ( because the day of that Sabbath was a great day ) , the Jews made a request to Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
43019032	So the men of the army came , and the legs of the first were broken and then of the other who was put to death on the cross with Jesus :
43019033	But when they came to Jesus , they saw that he was dead by this time , and so his legs were not broken ;
43019034	But one of the men made a wound in his side with a spear , and straight away there came out blood and water .
43019035	And he who saw it has given witness ( and his witness is true ; he is certain that what he says is true ) so that you may have belief .
43019036	These things came about so that the Writings might be true , No bone of his body will be broken .
43019037	And again another verse says , They will see him who was wounded by their spears .
43019038	After these things , Joseph of Arimathaea , who was a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , made a request to Pilate to let him take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate said he might do so . So he went and took away his body .
43019039	And Nicodemus came ( he who had first come to Jesus by night ) with a roll of myrrh and aloes mixed , about a hundred pounds .
43019040	Then they took the body of Jesus , folding linen about it with the spices , as is the way of the Jews when they put the dead to rest .
43019041	Now there was a garden near the cross , and in the garden a new place for the dead in which no man had ever been put .
43019042	So they put Jesus there , because it was the Jews ' day of getting ready for the Passover , and the place was near .
43020001	Now on the first day of the week , very early , while it was still dark , Mary Magdalene came to the place and saw that the stone had been taken away from it .
43020002	Then she went running to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple who was loved by Jesus , and said to them , They have taken away the Lord out of the place of the dead and we have no knowledge where they have put him .
43020003	So Peter and the other disciple went out to the place of the dead .
43020004	They went running together , and the other disciple got in front of Peter and came first to the hole in the rock ;
43020005	And looking in , he saw the linen bands on the earth ; but he did not go in ,
43020006	Then Simon Peter came after him and went into the hole in the rock ; and he saw the linen bands on the earth ,
43020007	And the cloth , which had been round his head , not with the linen bands but rolled up in a place by itself .
43020008	Then the other disciple who came there first went in ; and he saw and belief came to him .
43020009	For at that time they had no knowledge that the Writings said that he would have to come again from the dead .
43020010	So then the disciples went away again to their houses .
43020011	But Mary was still there outside the hole in the rock , weeping ; and while she was weeping and looking into the hole ,
43020012	She saw two angels in white seated where the body of Jesus had been , one at the head and the other at the feet .
43020013	They said to her , Woman , why are you weeping ? She said to them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I have no knowledge where they have put him .
43020014	And then looking round , she saw Jesus there , but had no idea that it was Jesus .
43020015	Jesus said to her , Woman , why are you weeping ? who are you looking for ? She , taking him for the gardener , said to him , Sir , if you have taken him away from here , say where you have put him and I will take him away .
43020016	Jesus said to her , Mary ! Turning , she said to him in Hebrew , Rabboni ! ( which is to say , Master ) .
43020017	Jesus said to her , Do not put your hand on me , for I have not gone up to the Father : but go to my brothers and say to them , I go up to my Father and your Father , to my God and your God .
43020018	Mary Magdalene went with the news to the disciples , and said she had seen the Lord and that he had said these things to her .
43020019	At evening on that day , the first day of the week , when , for fear of the Jews , the doors were shut where the disciples were , Jesus came among them and said to them , May peace be with you !
43020020	And when he had said this , he let them see his hands and his side . Then the disciples were glad when they saw the Lord .
43020021	And Jesus said to them again , May peace be with you ! As the Father sent me , even so I now send you .
43020022	And when he had said this , breathing on them , he said to them , Let the Holy Spirit come on you :
43020023	Any to whom you give forgiveness , will be made free from their sins ; and any from whom you keep back forgiveness , will still be in their sins .
43020024	Now Thomas , one of the twelve , named Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
43020025	So the other disciples said to him , We have seen the Lord . But he said to them , If I do not see in his hands the print of the nails and put my finger into the print of the nails , and if I do not put my hand into his side , I will never have belief .
43020026	And after eight days , his disciples were again in the house and Thomas was with them . Though the doors were shut , Jesus came , and taking his place in the middle of them , he said , May peace be with you !
43020027	Then he said to Thomas , Put out your finger , and see my hands ; and put your hand here into my side : and be no longer in doubt but have belief .
43020028	And Thomas said in answer , My Lord and my God !
43020029	Jesus said to him , Because you have seen me you have belief : a blessing will be on those who have belief though they have not seen me !
43020030	A number of other signs Jesus did before his disciples which are not recorded in this book :
43020031	But these are recorded , so that you may have faith that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God , and so that , having this faith you may have life in his name .
43021001	After these things Jesus let himself be seen again by the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and it came about in this way .
43021002	Simon Peter , Thomas named Didymus , Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , the sons of Zebedee , and two others of his disciples were all together .
43021003	Simon Peter said to them , I am going fishing . They said to him , And we will come with you . They went out and got into the boat ; but that night they took no fish .
43021004	Now very early in the morning Jesus was there by the edge of the sea ( though the disciples were not conscious that it was Jesus ) .
43021005	So Jesus said to them , Children , have you taken any fish ? They made answer , No .
43021006	And he said to them , Let down the net on the right side of the boat and you will get some . So they put it in the water and now they were not able to get it up again because of the great number of fish .
43021007	So the disciple who was dear to Jesus said to Peter , It is the Lord ! Hearing that it was the Lord , Peter put his coat round him ( because he was not clothed ) and went into the sea .
43021008	And the other disciples came in the little boat ( they were not far from land , only about two hundred cubits off ) pulling the net full of fish .
43021009	When they got to land , they saw a fire of coals there , with fish cooking on it , and bread .
43021010	Jesus said to them , Get some of the fish which you have now taken .
43021011	So Peter went to the boat and came back pulling the net to land , full of great fish , a hundred and fifty-three ; and though there was such a number the net was not broken .
43021012	Jesus said to them , Come and take some food . And all the disciples were in fear of putting the question , Who are you ? being conscious that it was the Lord .
43021013	Then Jesus came and took the bread and gave it to them , and the fish in the same way .
43021014	Now this was the third time that Jesus let himself be seen by the disciples after he had come back from the dead .
43021015	Then when they had taken food , Jesus said to Simon Peter , Simon , son of John , is your love for me greater than the love of these others ? He said to him , Yes , Lord ; you are certain of my love for you . He said to him , Then give my lambs food .
43021016	Again , a second time , he said to him , Simon , son of John , have you any love for me ? Yes , Lord , he said , you are certain of my love for you . Then take care of my sheep , said Jesus .
43021017	He said to him a third time , Simon , son of John , am I dear to you ? Now Peter was troubled in his heart because he put the question a third time , Am I dear to you ? And he said to him , Lord , you have knowledge of all things ; you see that you are dear to me . Jesus said to him , Then give my sheep food .
43021018	Truly I say to you , When you were young , you made yourself ready and went wherever you had a desire to go : but when you are old , you will put out your hands and another will make you ready , and you will be taken where you have no desire to go .
43021019	Now this he said , pointing out the sort of death by which he would give God glory . And after saying this , he said to him , Come after me .
43021020	Then Peter , turning round , saw the disciple who was dear to Jesus coming after them--the disciple who was resting on his breast at the last meal , and said , Lord , who is it who will be false to you ?
43021021	Seeing him , Peter said to Jesus , What about this man ?
43021022	Jesus said to him , If it is my desire for him to be here till I come back , what is that to you ? come yourself after me .
43021023	So this saying went about among the brothers that this disciple would not undergo death : Jesus , however , did not say that he would not undergo death , but , If it is my desire for him to be here till I come back , what is that to you ?
43021024	This is the disciple who gives witness about these things and who put them in writing : and we have knowledge that his witness is true .
