43021025	And Jesus did such a number of other things that , if every one was recorded , it is my opinion that even the world itself is not great enough for the books there would be .
44001001	I have given an earlier account , O Theophilus , of all the things which Jesus did , and of his teaching from the first ,
44001002	Till the day when he was taken up to heaven after he had given his orders , through the Holy Spirit , to the Apostles of whom he had made selection :
44001003	And to whom he gave clear and certain signs that he was living , after his death ; for he was seen by them for forty days , and gave them teaching about the kingdom of God :
44001004	And when they were all together , with him , he gave them orders not to go away from Jerusalem , but to keep there , waiting till the word of the Father was put into effect , of which , he said , I have given you knowledge :
44001005	For the baptism of John was with water , but you will have baptism with the Holy Spirit , after a little time .
44001006	So , when they were together , they said to him , Lord , will you at this time give back the kingdom to Israel ?
44001007	And he said to them , It is not for you to have knowledge of the time and the order of events which the Father has kept in his control .
44001008	But you will have power , when the Holy Spirit has come on you ; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem and all Judaea and Samaria , and to the ends of the earth .
44001009	And when he had said these things , while they were looking , he was taken up , and went from their view into a cloud .
44001010	And while they were looking up to heaven with great attention , two men came to them , in white clothing ,
44001011	And said , O men of Galilee , why are you looking up into heaven ? This Jesus , who was taken from you into heaven , will come again , in the same way as you saw him go into heaven .
44001012	Then they went back to Jerusalem from the mountain named Olivet , which is near Jerusalem , a Sabbath day's journey away .
44001013	And when they came in , they went up into the room where they were living ; Peter and John and James and Andrew , Philip and Thomas , Bartholomew and Matthew , James , the son of Alphaeus , and Simon the Zealot , and Judas , the son of James .
44001014	And they all with one mind gave themselves up to prayer , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and his brothers .
44001015	And in those days Peter got up among the brothers ( there were about one hundred and twenty of them ) , and said ,
44001016	My brothers , the word of God had to be put into effect , which the Holy Spirit had said before , by the mouth of David , about Judas , who was guide to those who took Jesus ,
44001017	For he was numbered among us , and had his part in our work .
44001018	( Now this man , with the reward of his evil-doing , got for himself a field , and falling head first , came to a sudden and violent end there .
44001019	And this came to the knowledge of all those who were living in Jerusalem , so that the field was named in their language , Akel-dama , or , The field of blood . )
44001020	For in the book of Psalms it says , Let his house be waste , and let no man be living in it : and , Let his position be taken by another .
44001021	For this reason , of the men who have been with us all the time , while the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
44001022	Starting from the baptism of John till he went up from us , one will have to be a witness with us of his coming back from death .
44001023	And they made selection of two , Joseph , named Barsabbas , whose other name was Justus , and Matthias .
44001024	And they made prayers and said , Lord , having knowledge of the hearts of all men , make clear which of these two has been marked out by you ,
44001025	To take that position as a servant and Apostle , from which Judas by his sin was shut out , so that he might go to his place .
44001026	And they put it to the decision of chance , and the decision was given for Matthias , and he was numbered with the eleven Apostles .
44002001	And when the day of Pentecost was come , they were all together in one place .
44002002	And suddenly there came from heaven a sound like the rushing of a violent wind , and all the house where they were was full of it .
44002003	And they saw tongues , like flames of fire , coming to rest on every one of them .
44002004	And they were all full of the Holy Spirit , and were talking in different languages , as the Spirit gave them power .
44002005	Now there were living at Jerusalem , Jews , God-fearing men , from every nation under heaven .
44002006	And when this sound came to their ears , they all came together , and were greatly surprised because every man was hearing the words of the disciples in his special language .
44002007	And they were full of wonder and said , Are not all these men Galilaeans ?
44002008	And how is it that every one of us is hearing their words in the language which was ours from our birth ?
44002009	Men of Parthia , Media , and Elam , and those living in Mesopotamia , in Judaea and Cappadocia , in Pontus and Asia ,
44002010	In Phrygia and Pamphylia , in Egypt and the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and those who have come from Rome , Jews by birth and others who have become Jews ,
44002011	Men of Crete and Arabia , to all of us they are talking in our different languages , of the great works of God .
44002012	And they were all surprised and in doubt saying to one another , What is the reason of this ?
44002013	But others , making sport of them , said , They are full of new wine .
44002014	But Peter , getting up , with the eleven , said in a loud voice , O men of Judaea , and all you who are living in Jerusalem , take note of this and give ear to my words .
44002015	For these men are not overcome with wine , as it seems to you , for it is only the third hour of the day ;
44002016	But this is the thing which was said by the prophet Joel ;
44002017	And it will come about , in the last days , says God , that I will send out my Spirit on all flesh ; and your sons and your daughters will be prophets , and your young men will see visions , and your old men will have dreams :
44002018	And on my men-servants and my women-servants I will send my Spirit , and they will be prophets .
44002019	And wonders will be seen in heaven , and signs on the earth , blood and fire and smoke :
44002020	The sun will become dark and the moon will be turned to blood , before that great day of the Lord comes in glory :
44002021	And whoever makes his prayer to the Lord will have salvation .
44002022	Men of Israel , give ear to these words : Jesus of Nazareth , a man who had the approval of God , as was made clear to you by the great works and signs and wonders which God did by him among you , as you yourselves have knowledge ,
44002023	Him , when he was given up , by the decision and knowledge of God , you put to death on the cross , by the hands of evil men :
44002024	But God gave him back to life , having made him free from the pains of death because it was not possible for him to be overcome by it .
44002025	For David said of him , I saw the Lord before my face at all times , for he is at my right hand , so that I may not be moved :
44002026	And for this cause my heart was glad and my tongue full of joy , and my flesh will be resting in hope :
44002027	For you will not let my soul be in hell and you will not give up your Holy One to destruction .
44002028	You have made me see the ways of life ; I will be full of joy when I see your face .
44002029	My brothers , I may say to you openly that David came to his death , and was put in the earth , and his resting-place is with us today .
44002030	But being a prophet , and having in mind the oath which God had given to him , that of the fruit of his body one would take his place as a king ,
44002031	He , having knowledge of the future , was talking of the coming again of Christ from the dead , that he was not kept in hell and his body did not see destruction .
44002032	This Jesus God has given back to life , of which we all are witnesses .
44002033	And so , being lifted up to the right hand of God , and having the Father's word that the Holy Spirit would come , he has sent this thing , which now you see and have knowledge of .
44002034	For David has not gone up into heaven , but says , himself , The Lord said to my Lord , Be seated at my right hand ,
44002035	Till I put all those who are against you under your feet .
44002036	For this reason , let all Israel be certain that this Jesus , whom you put to death on the cross , God has made Lord and Christ .
44002037	Now when these words came to their ears their hearts were troubled , and they said to Peter and the other Apostles , Brothers , what are we to do ?
44002038	And Peter said , Let your hearts be changed , every one of you , and have baptism in the name of Jesus Christ , for the forgiveness of your sins ; and you will have the Holy Spirit given to you .
44002039	For the word of God is for you and for your children and for all those who are far off , even all those who may be marked out by the Lord our God .
44002040	And with more such words he gave his witness , offering them salvation and saying , Come out from this evil generation .
44002041	Then those who gave hearing to his words had baptism : and about three thousand souls were joined to them that day .
44002042	And they kept their attention fixed on the Apostles ' teaching and were united together in the taking of broken bread and in prayer .
44002043	But fear came on every soul : and all sorts of wonders and signs were done by the Apostles .
44002044	And all those who were of the faith kept together , and had all things in common ;
44002045	And exchanging their goods and property for money , they made division of it among them all , as they had need .
44002046	And day by day , going in agreement together regularly to the Temple and , taking broken bread together in their houses , they took their food with joy and with true hearts ,
44002047	Giving praise to God , and having the approval of all the people ; and every day the number of those who had salvation was increased by the Lord .
44003001	Now Peter and John were going up to the Temple at the ninth hour , the hour of prayer ;
44003002	And a certain man who from birth had had no power in his legs , was taken there every day , and put down at the door of the Temple which is named Beautiful , requesting money from those who went into the Temple ;
44003003	He then , seeing Peter and John going into the Temple , made a request to them .
44003004	And Peter , looking at him , with John , said , Keep your eyes on us .
44003005	And he gave attention to them , hoping to get something from them .
44003006	But Peter said , I have no silver or gold , but what I have , that I give to you . In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , get up on your feet .
44003007	And he took him by his right hand , lifting him up ; and straight away his feet and the bones of his legs became strong ,
44003008	And , jumping up , he got on to his feet and went into the Temple with them , walking and jumping and giving praise to God .
44003009	And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
44003010	And they saw that it was the man who made requests for money at the door of the Temple , and they were full of wonder and surprise at what had taken place .
44003011	And while he kept his hands on Peter and John , all the people came running together to the covered way which is named Solomon's , full of wonder .
44003012	And when Peter saw it he said to the people , You men of Israel , why are you so greatly surprised at this man ? or why are you looking at us as if by our power or virtue we had given him the use of his legs ?
44003013	The God of Abraham , of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , has given glory to his servant Jesus ; whom you gave up , turning your backs on him , when Pilate had made the decision to let him go free .
44003014	But you would have nothing to do with the Holy and Upright One , and made request for a man of blood to be given to you ,
44003015	And put to death the Lord of life ; whom God gave back from the dead ; of which fact we are witnesses .
44003016	And his name , through faith in his name , has made this man strong , whom you see and have knowledge of : yes , the faith which is through him has made him well , before you all .
44003017	And now , my brothers , I am conscious that you did this , as did your rulers , without knowledge .
44003018	But the things which God had made clear before , by the mouth of all the prophets , that the Christ would have to undergo , he has put into effect in this way .
44003019	So then , let your hearts be changed and be turned to God , so that your sins may be completely taken away , and times of blessing may come from the Lord ;
44003020	And that he may send the Christ who was marked out for you from the first , even Jesus :
44003021	Who is to be kept in heaven till the time when all things are put right , of which God has given word by the mouth of his holy prophets , who have been from the earliest times .
44003022	For Moses said , The Lord will give you a prophet from among your people , like me ; you will give ear to everything which he will say to you .
44003023	And every soul who does not give attention to that prophet , will be cut off from among the people .
44003024	And all the prophets from Samuel and those who came after , every one of them , gave word of these days .
44003025	You are the sons of the prophets , and of the agreement which God made with your fathers , saying to Abraham , Through your seed a blessing will come on all the families of the earth .
44003026	To you , first , God sent his servant , blessing you by turning every one of you from his sins .
44004001	And while they were talking to the people , the priests and the captain of the Temple and the Sadducees came up to them ,
44004002	Being greatly troubled because they were teaching the people and preaching Jesus as an example of the coming back from the dead .
44004003	And they took them and put them in prison till the morning , for it was now evening .
44004004	But a number of those who gave hearing to the word had faith ; and they were now about five thousand .
44004005	And on the day after , the rulers and those in authority and the scribes came together in Jerusalem ;
44004006	And Annas , the high priest , was there , and Caiaphas and John and Alexander , and all the relations of the high priest .
44004007	Then sending for Peter and John , they said , By what power and in whose name have you done this ?
44004008	Then Peter , being full of the Holy Spirit , said to them , O you rulers of the people and men of authority ,
44004009	If we are questioned today about a good work done to a man who was ill , as to how he has been made well ,
44004010	Take note , all of you , and all the people of Israel , that in the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom you put to death on the cross , whom God gave back from the dead , even through him is this man now before you completely well .
44004011	He is the stone which you builders had no use for , but which has been made the chief stone of the building .
44004012	And in no other is there salvation : for there is no other name under heaven , given among men , through which we may have salvation .
44004013	Now when they saw that Peter and John were without fear , though they were men of no education or learning , they were greatly surprised ; and they took note of them that they had been with Jesus .
44004014	And , seeing that the man who had been made well was there with them , they were not able to say anything against it .
44004015	But when they had given them orders to go out of the Sanhedrin , they had a discussion among themselves ,
44004016	Saying , What are we to do with these men ? for certainly it is clear to all who are living in Jerusalem that a most important sign has been done by them , and it is not possible to say that it is not so .
44004017	But so that it may not go farther among the people , let us put them in fear of punishment if they say anything in future in this name .
44004018	And they sent for them , and gave them orders not to make statements or give teaching in the name of Jesus .
44004019	But Peter and John in answer said to them , It is for you to say if it is right in the eyes of God to give attention to you more than to God :
44004020	For it is not possible for us to keep from saying what we have seen and have knowledge of .
44004021	And when they had said more sharp words to them , they let them go , not seeing what punishment they might give them , because of the people ; for all men were giving praise to God for what had taken place .
44004022	For the man on whom this act of power was done was more than forty years old .
44004023	And when they had been made free , they came back to their friends , and gave an account of all the things which the chief priests and the authorities had said to them .
44004024	And hearing it , they all , with one mind , made prayer to God and said , O Lord , maker of heaven and earth and the sea and all things in them :
44004025	Who has said , by the Holy Spirit , through the mouth of our father David your servant , Why are the nations so violently moved , and why are the thoughts of the people so foolish ?
44004026	The kings of the earth were lifted up , the rulers came together , against the Lord , and against his Christ :
44004027	For , truly , in this town , against your holy servant , Jesus , who was marked out by you as Christ , Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles and the people of Israel , came together ,
44004028	To do that which had been fixed before by your hand and your purpose .
44004029	And now , Lord , take note of their cruel words , and give your servants power to be preachers of your word without fear ,
44004030	While your hand is stretched out to do works of mercy ; so that signs and wonders may be done through the name of your holy servant Jesus .
44004031	And when their prayer was ended , the place where they were was violently moved , and they all became full of the Holy Spirit , preaching the word of God without fear .
44004032	And all those who were of the faith were one in heart and soul : and not one of them said that any of the things which he had was his property only ; but they had all things in common .
44004033	And with great power the Apostles gave witness of the coming back of the Lord Jesus from the dead ; and grace was on them all .
44004034	And no one among them was in need ; for everyone who had land or houses , exchanging them for money , took the price of them ,
44004035	And put it at the feet of the Apostles for distribution to everyone as he had need .
44004036	And Joseph , who was given by the Apostles the name of Barnabas ( the sense of which is , Son of comfort ) , a Levite and a man of Cyprus by birth ,
44004037	Having a field , got money for it and put the money at the feet of the Apostles .
44005001	But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , got money for his property ,
44005002	And kept back part of the price , his wife having knowledge of it , and took the rest and put it at the feet of the Apostles .
44005003	But Peter said , Ananias , why has the Evil One put it into your heart to be false to the Holy Spirit , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
44005004	While you had it , was it not your property ? and after you had given it in exchange , was it not still in your power ? how has this purpose come into your mind ? you have been false , not to men , but to God .
44005005	And at these words , Ananias went down on the earth , and his life went from him : and great fear came on all who were present .
44005006	And the young men went and made ready his body , and took it out , and put it in the earth .
44005007	And about three hours after , his wife , having no knowledge of what had taken place , came in .
44005008	And Peter said to her , Give me an answer : was this amount of money the price of the land ? And she said , Yes , it was .
44005009	But Peter said to her , Why have you made an agreement together to be false to the Spirit of the Lord ? See , the feet of the young men who have put the body of your husband in the earth , are at the door , and they will take you out .
44005010	And straight away she went down at his feet , and her life went from her : and the young men came in and saw her dead , and they took her out and put her in the earth with her husband .
44005011	Then great fear came on all the church and on all who had knowledge of these things .
44005012	Now a number of signs and wonders were done among the people by the hands of the Apostles ; and they were all together in Solomon's covered way .
44005013	The others , in fear , kept back from joining them : but the people made much of them ;
44005014	And a great number of men and women had faith , and were joined to the Lord ;
44005015	And they even took into the streets people who were ill , and put them on beds , so that when Peter went by , some of them might be in his shade .
44005016	And numbers of people came together from the towns round about Jerusalem , with those who were ill and those who were troubled with unclean spirits : and they were all made well .
44005017	But the high priest and those who were with him ( the Sadducees ) were full of envy ,
44005018	And they took the Apostles and put them in the common prison .
44005019	But in the night an angel of the Lord , opening the doors of the prison , took them out and said ,
44005020	Go , take your place in the Temple and give the people all the teaching about this Life .
44005021	And hearing this , they went into the Temple at dawn , and were teaching . But the high priest and those who were with him got together the Sanhedrin and the representatives of the children of Israel , and sent to the prison to get them .
44005022	But the men who were sent saw that they were not in the prison , and came back with the news ,
44005023	Saying , The doors of the prison were safely shut , and the keepers were at the doors , but when they were open , there was nobody inside .
44005024	Now , at these words , the captain of the Temple and the chief priests were greatly troubled about what might be the end of this business .
44005025	And someone came and said to them , The men , whom you put in prison , are in the Temple teaching the people .
44005026	Then the captain and some of the police went and took them , but not violently , for fear that they might be stoned by the people .
44005027	And they took them into the Sanhedrin , and the high priest said to them ,
44005028	We gave you very clear orders not to give teaching in this name : and now Jerusalem is full of your teaching , and you are attempting to make us responsible for this man's death .
44005029	But Peter and the Apostles , answering , said , We have to do the orders of God , not of man .
44005030	The God of our fathers gave Jesus back to life , whom you had put to death , hanging him on a tree .
44005031	Him God has put on high at his right hand , as a Ruler and a Saviour , to give to Israel a change of heart and forgiveness of sins .
44005032	And we are witnesses of these things , and so is the Holy Spirit , whom God has given to those who keep his laws .
44005033	But when these words came to their ears , they were cut to the heart , and had a mind to put them to death .
44005034	But one of the Sanhedrin , a Pharisee named Gamaliel , a man of learning in the law , of whom all the people had a high opinion , got up and made a suggestion for the men to be put outside for a little time .
44005035	And he said to them , Men of Israel , take care what you do about these men .
44005036	For before this there was Theudas , who said he was someone important , to whom about four hundred men gave their support : he was put to death , and his band was broken up and came to nothing .
44005037	After this man , there was Judas of Galilee , at the time of the numbering , and some of the people went after him : he was put to death , and all his supporters were put to flight .
44005038	And now I say to you , Do nothing to these men , but let them be : for if this teaching or this work is of men , it will come to nothing :
44005039	But if it is of God , you will not be able to overcome them , and you are in danger of fighting against God .
44005040	And he seemed to them to be right : and they sent for the Apostles , and , after having them whipped and giving them orders to give no teaching in the name of Jesus , they let them go .
44005041	So they went away from the Sanhedrin , happy to undergo shame for the Name .
44005042	And every day , in the Temple and privately , they went on teaching and preaching Jesus as the Christ .
44006001	Now in those days , when the number of the disciples was increasing , protests were made by the Greek Jews against the Hebrews , because their widows were not taken care of in the distribution of food every day .
44006002	And the Apostles sent for all the disciples and said , It is not right for us to give up preaching the word of God in order to make distribution of food .
44006003	Take then from among you seven men of good name , full of the Spirit and of wisdom , to whom we may give control of this business .
44006004	Then we will give all our time to prayer and the teaching of the word .
44006005	And this saying was pleasing to all of them : and they made selection of Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Spirit , and Philip and Prochorus and Nicanor and Timon and Parmenas and Nicolas of Antioch , who had become a Jew :
44006006	These they took to the Apostles , who , after prayer , put their hands on them .
44006007	And the word of God was increasing in power ; and the number of the disciples in Jerusalem became very great , and a great number of priests were in agreement with the faith .
44006008	And Stephen , full of grace and power , did great wonders and signs among the people .
44006009	But some of those who were of the Synagogue named that of the Libertines , and some of the men of Cyrene and of Alexandria and those from Cilicia and Asia , had arguments with Stephen .
44006010	But they were not able to get the better of him , for his words were full of wisdom and of the Spirit .
44006011	Then they got men to say , He has said evil against Moses and against God , in our hearing .
44006012	And the people , with the rulers and the scribes , were moved against him , and they came and took him before the Sanhedrin ,
44006013	And they got false witnesses who said , This man is for ever saying things against this holy place and against the law :
44006014	For he has said in our hearing that this Jesus of Nazareth will put this place to destruction and make changes in the rules which were handed down to us by Moses .
44006015	And all those who were in the Sanhedrin , looking at him , saw that his face was like the face of an angel .
44007001	Then the high priest said , Are these things true ?
44007002	And he said , My brothers and fathers , give hearing . The God of glory came to our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he was living in Haran ,
44007003	And said to him , Go out of your land , and away from your family , and come into the land to which I will be your guide .
44007004	Then he came out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and went into Haran ; and from there , when his father was dead , he was guided by God into this land , where you are living now :
44007005	And God gave him no heritage in it , not even enough to put his foot on : but he gave him an undertaking that he would give it to him and to his children after him , though he had no child at that time .
44007006	And God said that his seed would be living in a strange land , and that they would make them servants , and be cruel to them for four hundred years .
44007007	And I will be the judge , said God , of that nation which made them servants : and after that , they will come out and give me worship in this place .
44007008	And he made with him the agreement of which circumcision was the sign . And so Abraham had a son , Isaac , and gave him circumcision on the eighth day ; and Isaac had a son , Jacob , and Jacob was the father of the twelve heads of the families of Israel .
44007009	And the brothers , moved with envy against Joseph , gave him to the Egyptians for money : but God was with him ,
44007010	And made him free from all his troubles , and gave him wisdom and the approval of Pharaoh , king of Egypt , who made him ruler over Egypt and all his house .
44007011	Now there was no food to be had in all Egypt and Canaan , and there was great trouble : and our fathers were not able to get food .
44007012	But Jacob , hearing that there was grain in Egypt , sent out our fathers the first time .
44007013	And the second time his brothers had a meeting with Joseph , and Pharaoh had knowledge of Joseph's family .
44007014	Then Joseph sent for Jacob his father and all his family , seventy-five persons .
44007015	And Jacob went down to Egypt , and came to his end there , and so did our fathers ;
44007016	And they were taken over to Shechem , and put to rest in the place which Abraham got for a price in silver from the sons of Hamor in Shechem .
44007017	But when the time was near for putting into effect the undertaking which God had given to Abraham , the people were increasing in Egypt ,
44007018	Till another king came to power , who had no knowledge of Joseph .
44007019	He , having evil designs against our nation , was cruel to our fathers , and they were forced to put out their young children , so that they might not go on living .
44007020	At which time Moses came to birth , and he was very beautiful ; and he was kept for three months in his father's house :
44007021	And when he was put out , Pharaoh's daughter took him and kept him as her son .
44007022	And Moses was trained in all the wisdom of Egypt , and was great in his words and works .
44007023	But when he was almost forty years old , it came into his heart to go and see his brothers , the children of Israel .
44007024	And seeing one of them being attacked , he went to his help and gave the Egyptian a death-blow :
44007025	And he was hoping that his brothers would see that God had sent him to be their saviour ; but they did not see .
44007026	And the day after , he came to them , while they were having a fight , and would have made peace between them , saying , Sirs , you are brothers ; why do you do wrong to one another ?
44007027	But the man who was doing wrong to his neighbour , pushing him away , said , Who made you a ruler and a judge over us ?
44007028	Will you put me to death as you did the Egyptian yesterday ?
44007029	And at these words , Moses went in flight to the land of Midian , and was living there for a time , and had two sons .
44007030	At the end of forty years , an angel came to him in the waste land of Sinai , in the flame of a burning thorn-tree .
44007031	And Moses , seeing it , was full of wonder , and when he came up to have a nearer view of it , the voice of the Lord came to him , saying ,
44007032	I am the God of your fathers , the God of Abraham and of Isaac and of Jacob . And Moses , shaking with fear , kept his eyes from looking at it .
44007033	And the Lord said , Take off the shoes from your feet , for the place where you are is holy .
44007034	Truly , I have seen the sorrows of my people in Egypt , and their cries have come to my ears , and I have come down to make them free : and now , come , I will send you to Egypt .
44007035	This Moses , whom they would not have , saying , Who made you a ruler and a judge ? him God sent to be a ruler and a saviour , by the hand of the angel whom he saw in the thorn-tree .
44007036	This man took them out , having done wonders and signs in Egypt and in the Red Sea and in the waste land , for forty years .
44007037	This is the same Moses , who said to the children of Israel , God will give you a prophet from among your brothers , like me .
44007038	This is the man who was in the church in the waste land with the angel who was talking to him in Sinai , and with our fathers ; and to him were given the living words of God , so that he might give them to you .
44007039	By whom our fathers would not be controlled ; but they put him on one side , turning back in their hearts to Egypt ,
44007040	And saying to Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : as for this Moses , who took us out of the land of Egypt , we have no idea what has become of him .
44007041	And they made the image of a young ox in those days , and made an offering to it , and had joy in the work of their hands .
44007042	But God was turned from them and let them give worship to the stars of heaven , as it says in the book of the prophets , Did you make offerings to me of sheep and oxen for forty years in the waste land , O house of Israel ?
44007043	And you took up the tent of Moloch and the star of the god Rephan , images which you made to give worship to them : and I will take you away , farther than Babylon .
44007044	Our fathers had the Tent of witness in the waste land , as God gave orders to Moses to make it after the design which he had seen .
44007045	Which our fathers , in their turn , took with them when , with Joshua , they came into the heritage of the nations whom God was driving out before the face of our fathers , till the time of David ,
44007046	Who was pleasing to God ; and he had a desire to make a holy tent for the God of Jacob .
44007047	But Solomon was the builder of his house .
44007048	But still , the Most High has not his resting-place in houses made with hands , as the prophet says ,
44007049	Heaven is the seat of my power , and earth is a resting-place for my feet : what sort of house will you make for me , says the Lord , or what is my place of rest ?
44007050	Did not my hand make all these things ?
44007051	You whose hearts are hard and whose ears are shut to me ; you are ever working against the Holy Spirit ; as your fathers did , so do you .
44007052	Which of the prophets was not cruelly attacked by your fathers ? and they put to death those who gave them the news of the coming of the Upright One ; whom you have now given up and put to death ;
44007053	You , to whom the law was given as it was ordered by angels , and who have not kept it .
44007054	Hearing these things , they were cut to the heart and moved with wrath against him .
44007055	But he was full of the Holy Spirit , and looking up to heaven , he saw the glory of God and Jesus at the right hand of God .
44007056	And he said , Now I see heaven open , and the Son of man at the right hand of God .
44007057	But with loud cries , and stopping their ears , they made an attack on him all together ,
44007058	Driving him out of the town and stoning him : and the witnesses put their clothing at the feet of a young man named Saul .
44007059	And Stephen , while he was being stoned , made prayer to God , saying , Lord Jesus , take my spirit .
44007060	And going down on his knees , he said in a loud voice , Lord , do not make them responsible for this sin . And when he had said this , he went to his rest .
44008001	And Saul gave approval to his death . Now at that time a violent attack was started against the church in Jerusalem ; and all but the Apostles went away into all parts of Judaea and Samaria .
44008002	And God-fearing men put Stephen's body in its last resting-place , making great weeping over him .
44008003	But Saul was burning with hate against the church , going into every house and taking men and women and putting them in prison .
44008004	But those who had gone in flight went everywhere preaching the word .
44008005	And Philip went down to Samaria and was teaching them about Christ .
44008006	And all the people gave attention to the words which Philip said , when they saw the signs which he did .
44008007	For unclean spirits came out from those who had them , crying with a loud voice ; and a number of those who were ill and broken in body were made well .
44008008	And there was much joy in that town .
44008009	But there was a certain man named Simon , who in the past had been a wonder-worker and a cause of surprise to the people of Samaria , saying that he himself was a great man :
44008010	To whom they all gave attention , from the smallest to the greatest , saying , This man is that power of God which is named Great .
44008011	And they gave attention to him , because for a long time his wonder-working powers had kept them under his control .
44008012	But when they had faith in the good news given by Philip about the kingdom of God and the name of Jesus Christ , a number of men and women had baptism .
44008013	And Simon himself had faith and , having had baptism , he went with Philip and , seeing the signs and the great wonders which he did , he was full of surprise .
44008014	Now when the Apostles at Jerusalem had news that the people of Samaria had taken the word of God into their hearts , they sent to them Peter and John ;
44008015	Who , when they came there , made prayer for them , that the Holy Spirit might be given to them :
44008016	For up to that time he had not come on any of them ; only baptism had been given to them in the name of the Lord Jesus .
44008017	Then they put their hands on them , and the Holy Spirit came on them .
44008018	Now when Simon saw that the Holy Spirit was given through the touch of the Apostles ' hands , he made them an offering of money , saying ,
44008019	Give me this power , so that when I put my hands on anyone he may get the Holy Spirit .
44008020	But Peter said , May your money come to destruction with you , because you had the idea that what is freely given by God may be got for a price .
44008021	You have no part in this business , because your heart is not right before God .
44008022	Let your heart be changed , and make prayer to God that you may have forgiveness for your evil thoughts .
44008023	For I see that you are prisoned in bitter envy and the chains of sin .
44008024	And Simon , answering , said , Make prayer for me to the Lord , so that these things which you have said may not come on me .
44008025	So they , having given their witness and made clear the word of the Lord , went back to Jerusalem , giving the good news on their way in a number of the small towns of Samaria .
44008026	But an angel of the Lord said to Philip , Get up , and go to the south , to the road which goes from Jerusalem to Gaza , through the waste land .
44008027	And he went and there was a man of Ethiopia , a servant of great authority under Candace , queen of the Ethiopians , and controller of all her property , who had come up to Jerusalem for worship ;
44008028	He was going back , seated in his carriage , and was reading the book of the prophet Isaiah .
44008029	And the Spirit said to Philip , Go near , and get on his carriage .
44008030	And Philip , running up to him , saw that he was reading Isaiah the prophet , and said to him , Is the sense of what you are reading clear to you ?
44008031	And he said , How is that possible when I have no guide ? And he made Philip get up by his side .
44008032	Now the place in the book where he was reading was this : He was taken , like a sheep , to be put to death ; and as a lamb is quiet when its wool is being cut , so he made no sound :
44008033	Being of low degree , his cause was not given a hearing : who has knowledge of his family ? for his life is cut off from the earth .
44008034	And the Ethiopian said to Philip , About whom are these words said by the prophet ? about himself , or some other ?
44008035	So Philip , starting from this writing , gave him the good news about Jesus .
44008036	And while they were going on their way , they came to some water , and the Ethiopian said , See , here is water ; why may I not have baptism ?
44008038	And he gave orders for the carriage to be stopped , and the two of them went down into the water , and Philip gave him baptism .
44008039	And when they came up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord took Philip away ; and the Ethiopian saw him no more , for he went on his way full of joy .
44008040	But Philip came to Azotus , and went through all the towns , preaching the good news , till he came to Caesarea .
44009001	But Saul , still burning with desire to put to death the disciples of the Lord , went to the high priest ,
44009002	And made a request for letters from him to the Synagogues of Damascus , so that if there were any of the Way there , men or women , he might take them as prisoners to Jerusalem .
44009003	And while he was journeying , he came near Damascus ; and suddenly he saw a light from heaven shining round him ;
44009004	And he went down on the earth , and a voice said to him , Saul , Saul , why are you attacking me so cruelly ?
44009005	And he said , Who are you , Lord ? And he said , I am Jesus , whom you are attacking :
44009006	But get up , and go into the town , and it will be made clear to you what you have to do .
44009007	And the men who were with him were not able to say anything ; hearing the voice , but seeing no one .
44009008	And Saul got up from the earth , and when his eyes were open , he saw nothing ; and he was guided by the hand into Damascus .
44009009	And for three days he was not able to see , and he took no food or drink .
44009010	Now there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and the Lord said to him in a vision , Ananias ! and he said , Here I am , Lord .
44009011	And the Lord said to him , Get up , and go to the street which is named Straight , and make search at the house of Judas for one named Saul of Tarsus : for he is at prayer ;
44009012	And he has seen a man named Ananias coming in and putting his hands on him , so that he may be able to see .
44009013	But Ananias said , Lord , I have had accounts of this man from a number of people , how much evil he has done to your saints at Jerusalem :
44009014	And here he has authority from the chief priests to make prisoners all who give worship to your name .
44009015	But the Lord said , Go without fear : for he is a special vessel for me , to give to the Gentiles and kings and to the children of Israel the knowledge of my name :
44009016	For I will make clear to him what troubles he will have to undergo for me .
44009017	And Ananias went out and came to the house , and putting his hands on him , said , Brother Saul , the Lord Jesus , whom you saw when you were on your journey , has sent me , so that you may be able to see , and be full of the Holy Spirit .
44009018	And straight away it seemed as if a veil was taken from his eyes , and he was able to see ; and he got up , and had baptism ;
44009019	And when he had taken food his strength came back . And for some days he kept with the disciples who were in Damascus .
44009020	And straight away , in the Synagogues , he was preaching Jesus as the Son of God .
44009021	And all those hearing him were full of wonder and said , Is not this the man who in Jerusalem was attacking all the worshippers of this name ? and he had come here so that he might take them as prisoners before the chief priests .
44009022	But Saul went on increasing in power , and the Jews in Damascus were not able to give answers to the arguments by which he made it clear that Jesus was the Christ .
44009023	Then , after some days , the Jews made an agreement together to put him to death :
44009024	But Saul got knowledge of their design . And they kept watch day and night on the roads out of the town , so that they might put him to death :
44009025	But his disciples took him by night and let him down from the wall in a basket .
44009026	And when he came to Jerusalem , he made an attempt to be joined to the disciples , but they were all in fear of him , not taking him for a disciple .
44009027	But Barnabas took him to the Apostles and gave them an account of how he had seen the Lord on the road , and had given hearing to his words , and how at Damascus he had been preaching in the name of Jesus without fear .
44009028	And he was with them , going in and out at Jerusalem ,
44009029	Preaching in the name of the Lord without fear ; and he had discussions with the Greek Jews ; but they were working for his death .
44009030	And when the brothers had knowledge of it , they took him to Caesarea and sent him to Tarsus .
44009031	And so the church through all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria had peace and was made strong ; and , living in the fear of the Lord and in the comfort of the Holy Spirit , was increased greatly .
44009032	And it came about that while Peter was going through all parts of the country he came to the saints who were living at Lydda .
44009033	And there was a certain man there , named Aeneas , who for eight years had been in bed , without power of moving .
44009034	And Peter said to him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ makes you well : get up and make your bed . And straight away he got up .
44009035	And all those living in Lydda and Sharon saw him , and were turned to the Lord .
44009036	Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , that is , Dorcas : this woman was given to good works and acts of mercy at all times .
44009037	And it came about , in those days , that she got ill and came to her death : and when she had been washed , they put her in a room which was high up .
44009038	And because Lydda was near Joppa , the disciples , having knowledge that Peter was there , sent two men to him , requesting him to come to them straight away .
44009039	And Peter went with them . And when he had come , they took him into the room : and all the widows were there , weeping and putting before him the coats and clothing which Dorcas had made while she was with them .
44009040	But Peter made them all go outside , and went down on his knees in prayer ; and turning to the body , he said , Tabitha , get up . And , opening her eyes , she saw Peter and got up .
44009041	And he took her hand , lifting her up ; and , sending for the saints and widows , he gave her to them , living .
44009042	And news of it went all through Joppa , and a number of people had faith in the Lord .
44009043	And he was living in Joppa for some time with Simon , a leather-worker .
44010001	Now there was a certain man in Caesarea , named Cornelius , the captain of the Italian band of the army ;
44010002	A serious-minded man , fearing God with all his family ; he gave much money to the poor , and made prayer to God at all times .
44010003	He saw in a vision , clearly , at about the ninth hour of the day , an angel of the Lord coming to him and saying to him , Cornelius !
44010004	And he , looking on him in fear , said , What is it , Lord ? And he said to him , Your prayers and your offerings have come up to God , and he has kept them in mind .
44010005	Now send men to Joppa , and get one Simon , named Peter ,
44010006	Who is living with Simon , a leather-worker , whose house is by the sea .
44010007	And when the angel who said these words to him had gone away , he sent for two of his house-servants , and a God-fearing man of the army , one of those who were waiting on him at all times ;
44010008	And having given them an account of everything , he sent them to Joppa .
44010009	Now the day after , when they were on their journey and were near the town , Peter went up to the top of the house for prayer , about the sixth hour :
44010010	And he was in need of food : but while they were getting it ready , a deep sleep came on him ;
44010011	And he saw the heavens opening , and a vessel coming down , like a great cloth let down on the earth ,
44010012	In which were all sorts of beasts and birds .
44010013	And a voice came to him , saying , Come , Peter ; take them for food .
44010014	But Peter said , No , Lord ; for I have never taken food which is common or unclean .
44010015	And the voice came to him a second time , What God has made clean , do not you make common .
44010016	And this was done three times : and then the vessel was taken back into heaven .
44010017	Now while Peter was in doubt as to the purpose of this vision , the men who were sent by Cornelius , having made search for Simon's house , came to the door ,
44010018	To see if Simon , named Peter , was living there .
44010019	And , while Peter was turning the vision over in his mind , the Spirit said to him , See , three men are looking for you .
44010020	Go down , then , and go with them , doubting nothing , for I have sent them .
44010021	And Peter went down to the men , and said , I am the man you are looking for : why have you come ?
44010022	And they said , Cornelius , a captain , an upright and God-fearing man , respected by all the nation of the Jews , had word from God by an angel to send for you to his house , and to give hearing to your words .
44010023	So he took them in for the night . And the day after , he went with them , taking some of the brothers from Joppa with him .
44010024	And the day after that , they came to Caesarea . And Cornelius was waiting for them , having got together his relations and his near friends .
44010025	And when Peter came in , Cornelius came to him and , falling down at his feet , gave him worship .
44010026	But Peter , lifting him up , said , Get up , for I am a man as you are .
44010027	And saying these words , he went in , and saw that a great number of people had come together ;
44010028	And he said to them , You yourselves have knowledge that it is against the law for a man who is a Jew to be in the company of one who is of another nation ; but God has made it clear to me that no man may be named common or unclean :
44010029	And so I came without question , when I was sent for . What then is your purpose in sending for me ?
44010030	And Cornelius said , Four days from now I was in my house in prayer at the ninth hour ; and I saw before me a man in shining clothing ,
44010031	Who said , Cornelius , your prayer has come to the ears of God , and your offerings are kept in his memory .
44010032	Send , then , to Joppa , and get Simon , named Peter , to come to you ; he is living in the house of Simon , a leather-worker , by the sea .
44010033	So , straight away , I sent for you ; and you have done well to come . And now , we are all present before God , ready to give attention to all the things which the Lord has given you to say .
44010034	Then Peter said , Truly , I see clearly that God is no respecter of persons :
44010035	But in every nation , the man who has fear of him and does righteousness is pleasing to him .
44010036	The word which he sent to the children of Israel , giving the good news of peace through Jesus Christ ( who is Lord of all ) - -
44010037	That word you yourselves have knowledge of , which was made public through all Judaea , starting from Galilee , after the baptism of which John was the preacher ,
44010038	About Jesus of Nazareth , how God gave the Holy Spirit to him , with power : and how he went about doing good and making well all who were troubled by evil spirits , for God was with him .
44010039	And we are witnesses of all the things which he did in the country of the Jews and in Jerusalem ; whom they put to death , hanging him on a tree .
44010040	On the third day God gave him back to life , and let him be seen ,
44010041	Not by all the people , but by witnesses marked out before by God , even by us , who took food and drink with him after he came back from the dead .
44010042	And he gave us orders to give news of this to the people , and to give public witness that this is he whom God has made judge of the living and the dead .
44010043	To him all the prophets give witness , that through his name everyone who has faith in him will have forgiveness of sins .
44010044	While Peter was saying these words , the Holy Spirit came on all those who were hearing the word .
44010045	And the Jews of the faith , who had come with Peter , were full of wonder , because the Holy Spirit was given to the Gentiles ,
44010046	And they were talking in tongues , and giving glory to God . Then Peter said ,
44010047	Will any man say that these may not have baptism who have been given the Holy Spirit as we have ?
44010048	And he gave orders for them to have baptism in the name of Jesus Christ . Then they kept him with them for some days .
44011001	Now the Apostles and the brothers who were in Judaea had news that the word of God had been given to the Gentiles .
44011002	And when Peter came to Jerusalem , those who kept the rule of circumcision had an argument with him ,
44011003	Saying , You went to men without circumcision , and took food with them .
44011004	But Peter gave them an account of it all in order , saying to them ,
44011005	I was in the town of Joppa , at prayer : and falling into a deep sleep , I saw in a vision a vessel like a great cloth let down from heaven , and it came down to me :
44011006	And looking on it with attention I saw in it all sorts of beasts and birds .
44011007	And a voice came to my ears saying , Come , Peter ; take them for food .
44011008	But I said , No , Lord ; for nothing common or unclean has ever come into my mouth .
44011009	But the voice , coming a second time from heaven , said , What God has made clean , do not you make common .
44011010	And this was done three times , and they were all taken up again into heaven .
44011011	And at that minute , three men , sent from Caesarea , came to the house where we were .
44011012	And the Spirit gave me orders to go with them , doubting nothing . And these six brothers came with me ; and we went into that man's house :
44011013	And he gave us an account of how he had seen the angel in his house , saying , Send to Joppa , and get Simon , named Peter , to come to you ;
44011014	Who will say words to you through which you and all your family may get salvation .
44011015	And , while I was talking to them , the Holy Spirit came on them , as on us at first .
44011016	And the words of the Lord came into my mind , how he said , The baptism of John was with water , but you will have baptism with the Holy Spirit .
44011017	If then God gave them , when they had faith in the Lord Jesus Christ , the same as he gave to us , who was I to go against God ?
44011018	And hearing these things they said nothing more , but gave glory to God , saying , Then to the Gentiles as to us has God given a change of heart , so that they may have life .
44011019	Then those who had gone away at the time of the trouble about Stephen , went as far as Phoenicia and Cyprus , preaching to the Jews only .
44011020	But some of them , men of Cyprus and Cyrene , when they came to Antioch , gave the good news about the Lord Jesus to the Greeks .
44011021	And the power of the Lord was with them , and a great number had faith and were turned to the Lord .
44011022	And news of them came to the ears of the church at Jerusalem : and they sent Barnabas as far as Antioch :
44011023	Who , when he came and saw the grace of God , was glad ; and he made clear to them the need of keeping near the Lord with all the strength of their hearts :
44011024	For he was a good man and full of the Holy Spirit and of faith : and a great number were joined to the Lord .
44011025	Then he went on to Tarsus , looking for Saul ;
44011026	And when he had come across him , he took him to Antioch . And they were with the church there for a year , teaching the people ; and the disciples were first given the name of Christians in Antioch .
44011027	Now in those days prophets came from Jerusalem to Antioch .
44011028	And one of them , named Agabus , said publicly through the Spirit that there would be serious need of food all over the earth : which came about in the time of Claudius .
44011029	And the disciples , everyone as he was able , made a decision to send help to the brothers living in Judaea :
44011030	Which they did , sending it to the rulers of the church by the hand of Barnabas and Saul .
44012001	Now , about that time , Herod the king made cruel attacks on the Christians .
44012002	And he put James , the brother of John , to death with the sword .
44012003	And when he saw that this was pleasing to the Jews he went on to take Peter in addition . This was at the time of the feast of unleavened bread .
44012004	And having taken him , he put him in prison , with four bands of armed men to keep watch over him ; his purpose being to take him out to the people after the Passover .
44012005	So Peter was kept in prison : but the church made strong prayer to God for him .
44012006	And when Herod was about to take him out , the same night Peter was sleeping in chains between two armed men , and the watchmen were keeping watch before the door of the prison .
44012007	And a great light was seen shining in the room , and an angel of the Lord came to Peter and , touching him on his side so that he came out of his sleep , said , Get up quickly . And his chains came off his hands .
44012008	Then the angel said , Put on your shoes and get ready to go . And he did so . And he said , Put your coat round you and come with me .
44012009	And he went out after him ; and he was not certain if what was done by the angel was a fact , for it seemed to him that he was seeing a vision .
44012010	And when they had gone past the first and second watchmen they came to the iron door into the town , which came open by itself : and they went out and down one street ; and then the angel went away .
44012011	And when Peter came to his senses he said , Now , truly , I am certain that the Lord has sent his angel and taken me out of the hands of Herod , against all the hopes of the Jews .
44012012	And when he became clear about this , he went to the house of Mary , the mother of John named Mark , where a number of them had come together for prayer .
44012013	And he gave a blow on the door , and a young girl came to it , named Rhoda .
44012014	And hearing the voice of Peter , in her joy she went running , without opening the door , to say that Peter was outside .
44012015	And they said to her , You are off your head . But still she said , with decision , that it was so . And they said , It is his angel .
44012016	But Peter went on giving blows on the door : and when it was open and they saw him , they were full of wonder .
44012017	But he made a sign to them with his hand to be quiet , and gave them an account of how the Lord had taken him out of prison . And he said , Give the news to James and the brothers . And then he went away .
44012018	Now when it was day , the armed men were greatly troubled about what had become of Peter .
44012019	And Herod , when he sent for him , and he was not there , after questioning the watchmen , gave orders that they were to be put to death . Then he went down from Judaea to Caesarea for a time .
44012020	Now he was very angry with the people of Tyre and Sidon : and they came to him , all together , and having made friends with Blastus , the controller of the king's house , they made a request for peace , because their country was dependent on the king's country for its food .
44012021	And on the day which had been fixed , Herod , dressed in his robes and seated in his place , made a public statement to them .
44012022	And the people , with loud cries , said , It is the voice of a god , not of a man .
44012023	And straight away the angel of the Lord sent a disease on him , because he did not give the glory to God : and his flesh was wasted away by worms , and so he came to his end .
44012024	But the word of the Lord went on increasing .
44012025	And Barnabas and Saul came back from Jerusalem , when their work was ended , taking with them John named Mark .
44013001	Now there were at Antioch , in the church there , prophets and teachers , Barnabas , and Symeon who was named Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , a relation of Herod the king , and Saul .
44013002	And while they were doing the Lord's work , and going without food , the Holy Spirit said , Let Barnabas and Saul be given to me for the special work for which they have been marked out by me .
44013003	Then , after prayer and going without food they put their hands on them , and sent them away .
44013004	So , being sent out by the Holy Spirit , they went down to Seleucia ; and from there they went by ship to Cyprus .
44013005	And at Salamis they were preaching the word of God in the Synagogues of the Jews : and John was with them , helping them .
44013006	And when they had gone through all the island to Paphos , they came across a certain wonder-worker and false prophet , a Jew whose name was Bar-Jesus ;
44013007	Who was with the ruler , Sergius Paulus , an able man . This man sent for Barnabas and Saul , desiring to have knowledge of the word of God .
44013008	But Elymas , the wonder-worker ( for that is the sense of his name ) , put himself against them , with the purpose of turning the ruler from the faith .
44013009	But Saul , whose other name is Paul , being full of the Holy Spirit , looking hard at him , said ,
44013010	O you , who are full of false tricks and evil ways , a son of the Evil One , hating all righteousness , will you for ever be turning people from the right ways of the Lord ?
44013011	And now , see , the hand of the Lord is on you , and you will be blind and not able to see the sun for a time . And straight away a dark mist came down on him ; and he went about looking for a guide .
44013012	Then the ruler , when he saw what was done , had faith , being full of wonder at the teaching of the Lord .
44013013	Then Paul and those who were with him went by ship from Paphos and came to Perga in Pamphylia : and there John went away from them and came back to Jerusalem .
44013014	But they , going through from Perga , came to Antioch in Pisidia ; and they went into the Synagogue on the Sabbath and were seated .
44013015	And after the reading of the law and the prophets , the rulers of the Synagogue sent to them , saying , Brothers , if you have a word of comfort for the people , say on .
44013016	And Paul , getting up and making a sign with his hand , said , Men of Israel , and you who have the fear of God , give ear .
44013017	The God of this people Israel made selection of our fathers , lifting the people up from their low condition when they were living in the land of Egypt , and with a strong arm took them out of it .
44013018	And for about forty years he put up with their ways in the waste land .
44013019	And having put to destruction seven nations in the land of Canaan , he gave them the land for their heritage for about four hundred and fifty years .
44013020	And after these things he gave them judges , till the time of Samuel the prophet .
44013021	Then at their request for a king , God gave them Saul , the son of Kish , a man of the family of Benjamin , who was their king for forty years .
44013022	And having put him on one side , he made David their king , to whom he gave witness , saying , I have taken David , the son of Jesse , a man dear to my heart , who will do all my pleasure .
44013023	From this man's seed has God given to Israel a Saviour , even Jesus , as he gave his word ;
44013024	For whose coming John made ready the way by preaching to all the people of Israel the baptism which goes with a change of heart .
44013025	And when John was completing his work , he said , What do I seem to you to be ? I am not he ; but one is coming after me , whose shoes I am not good enough to undo .
44013026	My brothers , children of the family of Abraham , and those among you who have the fear of God , to us the word of this salvation is sent .
44013027	For the men of Jerusalem and their rulers , having no knowledge of him , or of the sayings of the prophets which come to their ears every Sabbath day , gave effect to them by judging him .
44013028	And though no cause of death was seen in him , they made a request to Pilate that he might be put to death .
44013029	And when they had done all the things said in the Writings about him , they took him down from the tree , and put him in the place of the dead .
44013030	But God gave him back from the dead :
44013031	And for a number of days he was seen by those who came with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are now his witnesses before the people .
44013032	And we are giving you the good news of the undertaking made to the fathers ,
44013033	Which God has now put into effect for our children , by sending Jesus ; as it says in the second Psalm , You are my Son ; this day I have given you being .
44013034	And about his coming back from the dead , never again to go to destruction , he has said these words , I will give you the holy and certain mercies of David .
44013035	Because he says in another Psalm , You will not let your Holy One see destruction .
44013036	Now David , having done God's work for his generation , went to sleep , and was put with his fathers , and his body came to destruction :
44013037	But he , who was lifted up by God , did not see destruction .
44013038	And so , let it be clear to you , my brothers , that through this man forgiveness of sins is offered to you :
44013039	And through him everyone who has faith is made free from all those things , from which the law of Moses was not able to make you free .
44013040	So take care that these words of the prophets do not come true for you ;
44013041	See , you doubters , have wonder and come to your end ; for I will do a thing in your days to which you will not give belief , even if it is made clear to you .
44013042	And when they went out , they made a request that these words might be said to them again on the Sabbath after .
44013043	Now when the meeting was ended , a number of the Jews and of the God-fearing Gentiles who had become Jews , went after Paul and Barnabas : who put before them how important it was to keep on in the grace of God .
44013044	And on the Sabbath after , almost all the town came together to give hearing to the word of God .
44013045	But when the Jews saw such a great number of people , they were full of envy and said evil words against Paul's preaching .
44013046	Then Paul and Barnabas without fear said , It was necessary for the word of God to be given to you first ; but because you will have nothing to do with it , and have no desire for eternal life , it will now be offered to the Gentiles .
44013047	For so the Lord has given us orders , saying , I have given you for a light to the Gentiles so that you may be for salvation to the ends of the earth .
44013048	And the Gentiles , hearing this , were glad and gave glory to the word of God : and those marked out by God for eternal life had faith .
44013049	And the word of the Lord went through all the country .
44013050	But the Jews , working up the feelings of the God-fearing women of high position and of the chief men of the town , got an attack started against Paul and Barnabas , driving them out of those parts .
44013051	But they , shaking off the dust of that place from their feet , came to Iconium .
44013052	And the disciples were full of joy and of the Holy Spirit .
44014001	Now in Iconium they went together to the Synagogue of the Jews and gave such teaching that a great number of Jews and Greeks had faith .
44014002	But those Jews who had not the faith , made the minds of the Gentiles bitter against the brothers .
44014003	So they kept there for a long time , taking heart in the Lord , who gave witness to the word of his grace by causing signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
44014004	But there was a division among the people of the town ; some were on the side of the Jews and some on the side of the Apostles .
44014005	And when a violent attempt was made by the Gentiles and the Jews , with their rulers , to make an attack on them and have them stoned ,
44014006	Having got news of it , they went in flight to the towns of Lycaonia , Lystra , and Derbe , and the country round about :
44014007	And went on preaching the good news there .
44014008	And at Lystra there was a certain man , who from birth had been without the use of his feet , never having had the power of walking .
44014009	This man was giving ear to the preaching of Paul , who , looking at him , and seeing that he had faith to be made well ,
44014010	Said in a loud voice , Get up on your feet . And , jumping up , he went walking about .
44014011	And when the people saw what Paul had done , they said in a loud voice , in the language of Lycaonia , The gods have come down to us in the form of men .
44014012	And they gave the name of Jupiter to Barnabas , and to Paul that of Mercury , because he was the chief talker .
44014013	And the priest of the image of Jupiter , which was before the town , took oxen and flowers to the doors of the town , and was about to make an offering with the people .
44014014	But when this came to the ears of the Apostles , Paul and Barnabas , they went running out among the people , parting their clothing , and crying out ,
44014015	Good people , why are you doing these things ? We are men with the same feelings as you , and we give you the good news so that you may be turned away from these foolish things to the living God , who made the heaven and the earth and the sea and all things in them :
44014016	Who in the past let all nations go in the ways which seemed good to them .
44014017	But he was not without witness , because he did good , and gave you rain from heaven and times of fruit , making your hearts full of food and joy .
44014018	And even with these words , it was hard for them to keep the people from making an offering to them .
44014019	But some Jews came to that place from Antioch and Iconium , and got control over the people ; and after stoning Paul , they had him pulled out of the town , taking him for dead .
44014020	But when the disciples came round him , he got up and went into the town : and the day after he went away with Barnabas to Derbe .
44014021	And having made a number of disciples through the preaching of the good news in that town , they went back to Lystra and Iconium and Antioch ,
44014022	Making strong the souls of the disciples , saying to them that they were to keep the faith , and that we have to go through troubles of all sorts to come into the kingdom of God .
44014023	And when they had made selection of some to be rulers in every church , and had given themselves to prayer and kept themselves from food , they put them into the care of the Lord in whom they had faith .
44014024	And they went through Pisidia and came to Pamphylia .
44014025	And , after preaching the word in Perga , they went down to Attalia ;
44014026	And from there they went by ship to Antioch , where they had been handed over to the grace of God for the work which they had not done .
44014027	And when they came there , and had got the church together , they gave them an account of all the things which God had done through them , and how he had made open a door of faith to the Gentiles .
44014028	And they were with the disciples there for a long time .
44015001	Now certain men came down from Judaea , teaching the brothers and saying that without circumcision , after the rule of Moses , there is no salvation .
44015002	And after Paul and Barnabas had had no little argument and discussion with them , the brothers made a decision to send Paul and Barnabas and certain others of them to the Apostles and the rulers of the church at Jerusalem about this question .
44015003	So they , being sent on their way by the church , went through Phoenicia and Samaria , giving news of the salvation of the Gentiles , to the great joy of all the brothers .
44015004	And when they came to Jerusalem , they had a meeting with the church and the Apostles and the rulers , and they gave an account of all the things which God had done through them .
44015005	But some of the Pharisees , who were of the faith , got up and said , It is necessary for these to have circumcision and to keep the law of Moses .
44015006	And the Apostles and the rulers of the church came together and gave thought to the question .
44015007	And when there had been much discussion , Peter got up and said to them , My brothers , you have knowledge that some time back it was God's pleasure that by my mouth the good news might be given to the Gentiles so that they might have faith .
44015008	And God , the searcher of hearts , was a witness to them , giving them the Holy Spirit even as he did to us ;
44015009	Making no division between them and us , but making clean their hearts by faith .
44015010	Why then are you testing God , by putting on the neck of the disciples a yoke so hard that not even our fathers or we were strong enough for it ?
44015011	But we have faith that we will get salvation through the grace of the Lord Jesus in the same way as they .
44015012	And all the people were quiet while Barnabas and Paul gave an account of the signs and wonders which God had done among the Gentiles by them .
44015013	And when they had come to an end , James , answering , said , My brothers , give ear to me :
44015014	Symeon has given an account of how God was first pleased to take from among the Gentiles a people for himself .
44015015	And this is in agreement with the words of the prophets , as it is said ,
44015016	After these things I will come back , and will put up the tent of David which has been broken down , building up again its broken parts and making it complete :
44015017	So that the rest of men may make search for the Lord , and all the Gentiles on whom my name is named ,
44015018	Says the Lord , who has made these things clear from the earliest times .
44015019	For this reason my decision is , that we do not put trouble in the way of those who from among the Gentiles are turned to God ;
44015020	But that we give them orders to keep themselves from things offered to false gods , and from the evil desires of the body , and from the flesh of animals put to death in ways against the law , and from blood .
44015021	For Moses , from times long past , has his preachers in every town , reading his law in the Synagogues every Sabbath .
44015022	Then it seemed good to the Apostles and the rulers and all the church , to send men from among them to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas ; Judas , named Barsabbas , and Silas , chief men among the brothers :
44015023	And they sent a letter by them , saying , The Apostles and the older brothers , to the brothers who are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia , may joy be with you :
44015024	Because we have knowledge that some who went from us have been troubling you with their words , putting your souls in doubt ; to whom we gave no such order ;
44015025	It seemed good to us , having come to an agreement together , to send these men to you , with our well loved Barnabas and Paul ,
44015026	Men who have given up their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ .
44015027	And so we have sent Judas and Silas , who will say the same things to you themselves , by word of mouth .
44015028	For it seemed good to the Holy Spirit and to us , to put on you nothing more than these necessary things ;
44015029	To keep from things offered to false gods , and from blood , and from things put to death in ways which are against the law , and from the evil desires of the body ; if you keep yourselves from these , you will do well . May you be happy .
44015030	So they , being sent away , came down to Antioch , and having got the people together , they gave them the letter .
44015031	And after reading it , they were glad of its comfort .
44015032	And Judas and Silas , who themselves were prophets , gave teaching to the brothers and made them strong in the faith .
44015033	And when they had been there for some time , they were sent back in peace by the brothers to those who had sent them .
44015035	But Paul and Barnabas kept on in Antioch , teaching and preaching the word of God , with a number of others .
44015036	And after some days , Paul said to Barnabas , Let us go back and see the brothers in every town where we have given the word of God , and see how they are .
44015037	And Barnabas had a desire to take with them John , named Mark .
44015038	But Paul was of the opinion that it was not right to take with them one who had gone away from them in Pamphylia , and had not gone on with the work .
44015039	And there was a sharp argument between them , so that they were parted from one another , and Barnabas took Mark with him and went by ship to Cyprus ;
44015040	But Paul took Silas and went away with the blessing of the brothers .
44015041	And he went through Syria and Cilicia , making the churches stronger in the faith .
44016001	And he came to Derbe and Lystra : and there was a certain disciple there named Timothy , whose mother was one of the Jews of the faith , but his father was a Greek ;
44016002	Of whom the brothers at Lystra and Iconium had a high opinion .
44016003	Paul had a desire for him to go with him , and he gave him circumcision because of the Jews who were in those parts : for they all had knowledge that his father was a Greek .
44016004	And on their way through the towns , they gave them the rules which had been made by the Apostles and the rulers of the church at Jerusalem , so that they might keep them .
44016005	So the churches were made strong in the faith and were increased in number every day .
44016006	And after they had gone through the land of Phrygia and Galatia , the Holy Spirit did not let them take the word into Asia ;
44016007	And having come to Mysia , they made an attempt to go into Bithynia , but the Spirit of Jesus did not let them ;
44016008	And going past Mysia , they came down to Troas .
44016009	And Paul had a vision in the night ; a man of Macedonia came , requesting him , and saying , Come over into Macedonia and give us help .
44016010	And when he had seen the vision , straight away we made the decision to go into Macedonia , for it seemed certain to us that God had sent us to give the good news to them .
44016011	So , from Troas we went straight by ship to Samothrace and the day after to Neapolis ;
44016012	And from there to Philippi , which is the most important town of Macedonia and a Roman colony : and we were there for some days .
44016013	And on the Sabbath we went outside the town , by the river , where we had an idea that there would be a place of prayer ; and , being seated , we had talk with the women who had come together .
44016014	And a certain woman named Lydia , a trader in purple cloth of the town of Thyatira , and a God-fearing woman , gave ear to us : whose heart the Lord made open to give attention to the things which Paul was saying .
44016015	And when she and her family had had baptism , she made a request to us , saying , If it seems to you that I am true to the Lord , come into my house and be my guests . And she made us come .
44016016	And when we were going to the place of prayer , we came across a girl with a spirit which gave knowledge of the future , whose masters made great profit from her power .
44016017	She came after Paul and us , crying out and saying , These men are the servants of the Most High God , who are giving you news of the way of salvation .
44016018	And this she did on a number of days . But Paul was greatly troubled and , turning , said to the spirit , I give you orders in the name of Jesus Christ , to come out of her . And it came out that very hour .
44016019	But when her masters saw that their hope of profit was gone , they took Paul and Silas , pulling them into the market-place before the rulers ;
