60002005	You , as living stones , are being made into a house of the spirit , a holy order of priests , making those offerings of the spirit which are pleasing to God through Jesus Christ .
60002006	Because it is said in the Writings , See , I am placing a keystone in Zion , of great and special value ; and the man who has faith in him will not be put to shame .
60002007	And the value is for you who have faith ; but it is said for those without faith , The very stone which the builders put on one side , was made the chief stone of the building ;
60002008	And , A stone of falling , a rock of trouble ; the word is the cause of their fall , because they go against it , and this was the purpose of God .
60002009	But you are a special people , a holy nation , priests and kings , a people given up completely to God , so that you may make clear the virtues of him who took you out of the dark into the light of heaven .
60002010	In the past you were not a people , but now you are the people of God ; then there was no mercy for you , but now mercy has been given to you .
60002011	My loved ones , I make this request with all my heart , that , as those for whom this world is a strange country , you will keep yourselves from the desires of the flesh which make war against the soul ;
60002012	Being of good behaviour among the Gentiles ; so that though they say now that you are evil-doers , they may see your good works and give glory to God when he comes to be their judge .
60002013	Keep all the laws of men because of the Lord ; those of the king , who is over all ,
60002014	And those of the rulers who are sent by him for the punishment of evil-doers and for the praise of those who do well .
60002015	Because it is God's pleasure that foolish and narrow-minded men may be put to shame by your good behaviour :
60002016	As those who are free , not using your free position as a cover for wrongdoing , but living as the servants of God ;
60002017	Have respect for all , loving the brothers , fearing God , honouring the king .
60002018	Servants , take orders from your masters with all respect ; not only if they are good and gentle , but even if they are bad-humoured .
60002019	For it is a sign of grace if a man , desiring to do right in the eyes of God , undergoes pain as punishment for something which he has not done .
60002020	What credit is it if , when you have done evil , you take your punishment quietly ? but if you are given punishment for doing right , and take it quietly , this is pleasing to God .
60002021	This is God's purpose for you : because Jesus himself underwent punishment for you , giving you an example , so that you might go in his footsteps :
60002022	Who did no evil , and there was no deceit in his mouth :
60002023	To sharp words he gave no sharp answer ; when he was undergoing pain , no angry word came from his lips ; but he put himself into the hands of the judge of righteousness :
60002024	He took our sins on himself , giving his body to be nailed on the tree , so that we , being dead to sin , might have a new life in righteousness , and by his wounds we have been made well .
60002025	Because , like sheep , you had gone out of the way ; but now you have come back to him who keeps watch over your souls .
60003001	Wives , be ruled by your husbands ; so that even if some of them give no attention to the word , their hearts may be changed by the behaviour of their wives ,
60003002	When they see your holy behaviour in the fear of God .
60003003	Do not let your ornaments be those of the body such as dressing of the hair , or putting on of jewels of gold or fair clothing ;
60003004	But let them be those of the unseen man of the heart , the ever-shining ornament of a gentle and quiet spirit , which is of great price in the eyes of God .
60003005	And these were the ornaments of the holy women of the past , whose hope was in God , being ruled by their husbands :
60003006	As Sarah was ruled by Abraham , naming him lord ; whose children you are if you do well , and are not put in fear by any danger .
60003007	And you husbands , give thought to your way of life with your wives , giving honour to the woman who is the feebler vessel , but who has an equal part in the heritage of the grace of life ; so that you may not be kept from prayer .
60003008	Last of all , see that you are all in agreement ; feeling for one another , loving one another like brothers , full of pity , without pride :
60003009	Not giving back evil for evil , or curse for curse , but in place of cursing , blessing ; because this is the purpose of God for you that you may have a heritage of blessing .
60003010	For it is said , Let the man who has a love of life , desiring to see good days , keep his tongue from evil and his lips from words of deceit :
60003011	And let him be turned from evil and do good ; searching for peace and going after it with all his heart .
60003012	For the eyes of the Lord are on the upright , and his ears are open to their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against those who do evil .
60003013	Who will do you any damage if you keep your minds fixed on what is good ?
60003014	But you are happy if you undergo pain because of righteousness ; have no part in their fear and do not be troubled ;
60003015	But give honour to Christ in your hearts as your Lord ; and be ready at any time when you are questioned about the hope which is in you , to give an answer in the fear of the Lord and without pride ;
60003016	Being conscious that you have done no wrong ; so that those who say evil things about your good way of life as Christians may be put to shame .
60003017	Because if it is God's purpose for you to undergo pain , it is better to do so for well-doing than for evil-doing .
60003018	Because Christ once went through pain for sins , the upright one taking the place of sinners , so that through him we might come back to God ; being put to death in the flesh , but given life in the Spirit ;
60003019	By whom he went to the spirits in prison , preaching to those
60003020	Who , in the days of Noah , went against God's orders ; but God in his mercy kept back the punishment , while Noah got ready the ark , in which a small number , that is to say eight persons , got salvation through water :
60003021	And baptism , of which this is an image , now gives you salvation , not by washing clean the flesh , but by making you free from the sense of sin before God , through the coming again of Jesus Christ from the dead ;
60003022	Who has gone into heaven , and is at the right hand of God , angels and authorities and powers having been put under his rule .
60004001	So that as Jesus was put to death in the flesh , do you yourselves be of the same mind ; for the death of the flesh puts an end to sin ;
60004002	So that you may give the rest of your lives in the flesh , not to the desires of men , but to the purpose of God .
60004003	Because for long enough , in times past , we have been living after the way of the Gentiles , given up to the desires of the flesh , to drinking and feasting and loose behaviour and unclean worship of images ;
60004004	And they are wondering that you no longer go with them in this violent wasting of life , and are saying evil things of you :
60004005	But they will have to give an account of themselves to him who is ready to be the judge of the living and the dead .
60004006	For this was the reason why the good news of Jesus was given even to the dead , so that they might be judged as men in the flesh , but might be living before God in the spirit .
60004007	But the end of all things is near : so be serious in your behaviour and keep on the watch with prayer ;
60004008	And most of all be warm in your love for one another ; because in love there is forgiveness for sins without number :
60004009	Keep open house for all with a glad heart ;
60004010	Making distribution among one another of whatever has been given to you , like true servants of the unmeasured grace of God ;
60004011	If anyone has anything to say , let it be as the words of God ; if anyone has the desire to be the servant of others , let him do it in the strength which is given by God ; so that in all things God may have the glory through Jesus Christ , whose are the glory and the power for ever .
60004012	Dear brothers , do not be surprised , as if it was something strange , if your faith is tested as by fire :
60004013	But be glad that you are given a part in the pains of Christ ; so that at the revelation of his glory you may have great joy .
60004014	If men say evil things of you because of the name of Christ , happy are you ; for the Spirit of glory and of God is resting on you .
60004015	Let no one among you undergo punishment as a taker of life , or as a thief , or as an evil-doer , or as one who is over-interested in other men's business ;
60004016	But if he undergoes punishment as a Christian , that is no shame to him ; let him give glory to God in this name .
60004017	For the time has come for the judging , starting with the church of God ; but if it makes a start with us , what will be the end of those who are not under the rule of God ?
60004018	And if it is hard for even the good man to get salvation , what chance has the man without religion or the sinner ?
60004019	For this reason let those who by the purpose of God undergo punishment , keep on in well-doing and put their souls into the safe hands of their Maker .
60005001	I who am myself one of the rulers of the church , and a witness of the death of Christ , having my part in the coming glory , send this serious request to the chief men among you :
60005002	Keep watch over the flock of God which is in your care , using your authority , not as forced to do so , but gladly ; and not for unclean profit but with a ready mind ;
60005003	Not as lords over God's heritage , but making yourselves examples to the flock .
60005004	And at the coming of the chief Keeper of the sheep , you will be given the eternal crown of glory .
60005005	And in the same way , let the younger men be ruled by the older ones . Let all of you put away pride and make yourselves ready to be servants : for God is a hater of pride , but he gives grace to those who make themselves low .
60005006	For this cause make yourselves low under the strong hand of God , so that when the time comes you may be lifted up ;
60005007	Putting all your troubles on him , for he takes care of you .
60005008	Be serious and keep watch ; the Evil One , who is against you , goes about like a lion with open mouth in search of food ;
60005009	Do not give way to him but be strong in your faith , in the knowledge that your brothers who are in the world undergo the same troubles .
60005010	And after you have undergone pain for a little time , the God of all grace who has given you a part in his eternal glory through Christ Jesus , will himself give you strength and support , and make you complete in every good thing ;
60005011	His is the power for ever . So be it .
60005012	I have sent you this short letter by Silvanus , a true brother , in my opinion ; comforting you and witnessing that this is the true grace of God ; keep to it .
60005013	She who is in Babylon , who has a part with you in the purpose of God , sends you her love ; and so does my son Mark .
60005014	Give one another the kiss of love . Peace be to you all in Christ .
61001001	Simon Peter , a servant and Apostle of Jesus Christ , to those who with us have a part in the same holy faith in the righteousness of our God and Saviour Jesus Christ :
61001002	May grace and peace ever be increasing in you , in the knowledge of God and of Jesus our Lord ;
61001003	Because by his power he has given us everything necessary for life and righteousness , through the knowledge of him who has been our guide by his glory and virtue ;
61001004	And through this he has given us the hope of great rewards highly to be valued ; so that by them we might have our part in God's being , and be made free from the destruction which is in the world through the desires of the flesh .
61001005	So , for this very cause , take every care ; joining virtue to faith , and knowledge to virtue ,
61001006	And self-control to knowledge , and a quiet mind to self-control , and fear of God to a quiet mind ,
61001007	And love of the brothers to fear of God , and to love of the brothers , love itself .
61001008	For if you have these things in good measure , they will make you fertile and full of fruit in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
61001009	For the man who has not these things is blind , seeing only what is near , having no memory of how he was made clean from his old sins .
61001010	For this reason , my brothers , take all the more care to make your selection and approval certain ; for if you do these things you will never have a fall :
61001011	For so the way will be open to you into the eternal kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
61001012	For this reason I will be ready at all times to keep your memory of these things awake , though you have the knowledge of them now and are well based in your present faith .
61001013	And it seems right to me , as long as I am in this tent of flesh , to keep your minds awake by working on your memory ;
61001014	For I am conscious that in a short time I will have to put off this tent of flesh , as our Lord Jesus Christ has made clear to me .
61001015	And I will take every care so that you may have a clear memory of these things after my death .
61001016	For when we gave you news of the power and the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , our teaching was not based on stories put together by art , but we were eye-witnesses of his glory .
61001017	For God the Father gave him honour and glory , when such a voice came to him out of the great glory , saying , This is my dearly loved Son , with whom I am well pleased .
61001018	And this voice came from heaven even to our ears , when we were with him on the holy mountain .
61001019	And so the words of the prophets are made more certain ; and it is well for you to give attention to them as to a light shining in a dark place , till the dawn comes and the morning star is seen in your hearts ;
61001020	Being conscious in the first place that no man by himself may give a special sense to the words of the prophets .
61001021	For these words did not ever come through the impulse of men : but the prophets had them from God , being moved by the Holy Spirit .
61002001	But there were false prophets among the people , as there will be false teachers among you , who will secretly put forward wrong teachings for your destruction , even turning away from the Lord who gave himself for them ; whose destruction will come quickly , and they themselves will be the cause of it .
61002002	And a great number will go with them in their evil ways , through whom the true way will have a bad name .
61002003	And in their desire for profit they will come to you with words of deceit , like traders doing business in souls : whose punishment has been ready for a long time and their destruction is watching for them .
61002004	For if God did not have pity for the angels who did evil , but sent them down into hell , to be kept in chains of eternal night till they were judged ;
61002005	And did not have mercy on the world which then was , but only kept safe Noah , a preacher of righteousness , with seven others , when he let loose the waters over the world of the evil-doers ;
61002006	And sent destruction on Sodom and Gomorrah , burning them up with fire as an example to those whose way of life might in the future be unpleasing to him ;
61002007	And kept safe Lot , the upright man , who was deeply troubled by the unclean life of the evil-doers
61002008	( Because the soul of that upright man living among them was pained from day to day by seeing and hearing their crimes ) :
61002009	The Lord is able to keep the upright safe in the time of testing , and to keep evil-doers under punishment till the day of judging ;
61002010	But specially those who go after the unclean desires of the flesh , and make sport of authority . Ready to take chances , uncontrolled , they have no fear of saying evil of those in high places :
61002011	Though the angels , who are greater in strength and power , do not make use of violent language against them before the Lord .
61002012	But these men , like beasts without reason , whose natural use is to be taken and put to death , crying out against things of which they have no knowledge , will undergo that same destruction which they are designing for others ;
61002013	For the evil which overtakes them is the reward of their evil-doing : such men take their pleasure in the delights of the flesh even in the daytime ; they are like the marks of a disease , like poisoned wounds among you , feasting together with you in joy ;
61002014	Having eyes full of evil desire , never having enough of sin ; turning feeble souls out of the true way ; they are children of cursing , whose hearts are well used to bitter envy ;
61002015	Turning out of the true way , they have gone wandering in error , after the way of Balaam , the son of Beor , who was pleased to take payment for wrongdoing ;
61002016	But his wrongdoing was pointed out to him : an ass , talking with a man's voice , put a stop to the error of the prophet .
61002017	These are fountains without water , and mists before a driving storm ; for whom the eternal night is kept in store .
61002018	For with high-sounding false words , making use of the attraction of unclean desires of the flesh , they get into their power those newly made free from those who are living in error ;
61002019	Saying that they will be free , while they themselves are the servants of destruction ; because whatever gets the better of a man makes a servant of him .
61002020	For if , after they have got free from the unclean things of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again taken in the net and overcome , their last condition is worse than their first .
61002021	For it would have been better for them to have had no knowledge of the way of righteousness , than to go back again from the holy law which was given to them , after having knowledge of it .
61002022	They are an example of that true saying , The dog has gone back to the food it had put out , and the pig which had been washed to its rolling in the dirty earth .
61003001	My loved ones , this is now my second letter to you , and in this as in the first , I am attempting to keep your true minds awake ;
61003002	So that you may keep in mind the words of the holy prophets in the past , and the law of the Lord and Saviour which was given to you by his Apostles .
61003003	Having first of all the knowledge that in the last days there will be men who , ruled by their evil desires , will make sport of holy things ,
61003004	Saying , Where is the hope of his coming ? From the death of the fathers till now everything has gone on as it was from the making of the world .
61003005	But in taking this view they put out of their minds the memory that in the old days there was a heaven , and an earth lifted out of the water and circled by water , by the word of God ;
61003006	And that the world which then was came to an end through the overflowing of the waters .
61003007	But the present heaven and the present earth have been kept for destruction by fire , which is waiting for them on the day of the judging and destruction of evil men .
61003008	But , my loved ones , keep in mind this one thing , that with the Lord one day is the same as a thousand years , and a thousand years are no more than one day .
61003009	The Lord is not slow in keeping his word , as he seems to some , but he is waiting in mercy for you , not desiring the destruction of any , but that all may be turned from their evil ways .
61003010	But the day of the Lord will come like a thief ; and in that day the heavens will be rolled up with a great noise , and the substance of the earth will be changed by violent heat , and the world and everything in it will be burned up .
61003011	Seeing then that all these things are coming to such an end , what sort of persons is it right for you to be , in all holy behaviour and righteousness ,
61003012	Looking for and truly desiring the coming of the day of God , when the heavens will come to an end through fire , and the substance of the earth will be changed by the great heat ?
61003013	But having faith in his word , we are looking for a new heaven and a new earth , which will be the resting-place of righteousness .
61003014	For this reason , my loved ones , as you are looking for these things , take great care that when he comes you may be in peace before him , free from sin and every evil thing .
61003015	And be certain that the long waiting of the Lord is for salvation ; even as our brother Paul has said in his letters to you , from the wisdom which was given to him ;
61003016	And as he said in all his letters , which had to do with these things ; in which are some hard sayings , so that , like the rest of the holy Writings , they are twisted by those who are uncertain and without knowledge , to the destruction of their souls .
61003017	For this reason , my loved ones , having knowledge of these things before they take place , take care that you are not turned away by the error of the uncontrolled , so falling from your true faith .
61003018	But be increased in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . May he have glory now and for ever . So be it .
62001001	That which was from the first , which has come to our ears , and which we have seen with our eyes , looking on it and touching it with our hands , about the Word of life
62001002	( And the life was made clear to us , and we have seen it and are witnessing to it and giving you word of that eternal life which was with the Father and was seen by us ) ;
62001003	We give you word of all we have seen and everything which has come to our ears , so that you may be united with us ; and we are united with the Father and with his Son Jesus Christ :
62001004	And we are writing these things to you so that our joy may be made complete .
62001005	This is the word which came to us from him and which we give to you , that God is light and in him there is nothing dark .
62001006	If we say we are joined to him , and are walking still in the dark , our words are false and our acts are untrue :
62001007	But if we are walking in the light , as he is in the light , we are all united with one another , and the blood of Jesus his Son makes us clean from all sin .
62001008	If we say that we have no sin , we are false to ourselves and there is nothing true in us .
62001009	If we say openly that we have done wrong , he is upright and true to his word , giving us forgiveness of sins and making us clean from all evil .
62001010	If we say that we have no sin , we make him false and his word is not in us .
62002001	My little children , I am writing these things to you so that you may be without sin . And if any man is a sinner , we have a friend and helper with the Father , Jesus Christ , the upright one :
62002002	He is the offering for our sins ; and not for ours only , but for all the world .
62002003	And by this we may be certain that we have knowledge of him , if we keep his laws .
62002004	The man who says , I have knowledge of him , and does not keep his laws , is false , and there is nothing true in him :
62002005	But in every man who keeps his word , the love of God is made complete . By this we may be certain that we are in him :
62002006	He who says that he is living in him , will do as he did .
62002007	My loved ones , I do not give you a new law , but an old law which you had from the first ; this old law is the word which came to your ears .
62002008	Again , I give you a new law , which is true in him and in you ; for the night is near its end and the true light is even now shining out .
62002009	He who says that he is in the light , and has hate in his heart for his brother , is still in the dark .
62002010	He who has love for his brother is in the light , and there is no cause of error in him .
62002011	But he who has hate for his brother is in the dark , walking in the dark with no knowledge of where he is going , unable to see because of the dark .
62002012	I am writing to you , my children , because you have forgiveness of sins through his name .
62002013	I am writing to you , fathers , because you have knowledge of him who was from the first . I am writing to you , young men , because you have overcome the Evil One . I have sent a letter to you , children , because you have knowledge of the Father .
62002014	I have sent a letter to you , fathers , because you have knowledge of him who was from the first . I have sent a letter to you , young men , because you are strong , and the word of God is in you , and because you have overcome the Evil One .
62002015	Have no love for the world or for the things which are in the world . If any man has love for the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
62002016	Because everything in the world , the desire of the flesh , the desire of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father but of the world .
62002017	And the world and its desires is coming to an end : but he who does God's pleasure is living for ever .
62002018	Little children , it is the last hour ; and as you were given word that the Antichrist would come , so now a number of Antichrists have come to you ; and by this we are certain that it is the last hour .
62002019	They went out from us but they were not of us ; if they had been of us they would still be with us : but they went out from us so that it might be made clear that they were not of us .
62002020	And you have the Spirit from the Holy One and you all have knowledge .
62002021	I have not sent you this letter because you have no knowledge of what is true , but because you have knowledge , and because that which is false has nothing in common with that which is true .
62002022	Who is false but he who says that Jesus is not the Christ ? He is the Antichrist who has no belief in the Father or the Son .
62002023	He who has no belief in the Son has not the Father : he who makes clear his belief in the Son has the Father .
62002024	But as for you , keep in your hearts the things which were made clear to you from the first . If you keep these things in your hearts you will be kept in the Father and the Son .
62002025	And this is the hope which he gave you , even eternal life .
62002026	I am writing these things to you about those whose purpose is that you may be turned out of the true way .
62002027	As for you , the Spirit which he gave you is still in you , and you have no need of any teacher ; but as his Spirit gives you teaching about all things , and is true and not false , so keep your hearts in him , through the teaching which he has given you .
62002028	And now , my children , keep your hearts in him ; so that at his revelation , we may have no fear or shame before him at his coming .
62002029	If you have knowledge that he is upright , it is clear to you that everyone who does righteousness is his offspring .
62003001	See what great love the Father has given us in naming us the children of God ; and such we are . For this reason the world does not see who we are , because it did not see who he was .
62003002	My loved ones , now we are children of God , and at present it is not clear what we are to be . We are certain that at his revelation we will be like him ; for we will see him as he is .
62003003	And everyone who has this hope in him makes himself holy , even as he is holy .
62003004	Everyone who is a sinner goes against the law , for sin is going against the law .
62003005	And you have knowledge that he came to take away sin : and in him there is no sin .
62003006	Anyone who is in him does no sin ; anyone who is a sinner has not seen him and has no knowledge of him .
62003007	My little children , let no man take you out of the true way : he who does righteousness is upright , even as he is upright ;
62003008	The sinner is a child of the Evil One ; for the Evil One has been a sinner from the first . And the Son of God was seen on earth so that he might put an end to the works of the Evil One .
62003009	Anyone who is a child of God does no sin , because he still has God's seed in him ; he is not able to be a sinner , because God is his Father .
62003010	In this way it is clear who are the children of God and who are the children of the Evil One ; anyone who does not do righteousness or who has no love for his brother , is not a child of God .
62003011	Because this is the word which was given to you from the first , that we are to have love for one another ;
62003012	Not being of the Evil One like Cain , who put his brother to death . And why did he put him to death ? Because his works were evil and his brother's works were good .
62003013	Do not be surprised , my brothers , if the world has no love for you .
62003014	We are conscious that we have come out of death into life because of our love for the brothers . He who has no love is still in death .
62003015	Anyone who has hate for his brother is a taker of life , and you may be certain that no taker of life has eternal life in him .
62003016	In this we see what love is , because he gave his life for us ; and it is right for us to give our lives for the brothers .
62003017	But if a man has this world's goods , and sees that his brother is in need , and keeps his heart shut against his brother , how is it possible for the love of God to be in him ?
62003018	My little children , do not let our love be in word and in tongue , but let it be in act and in good faith .
62003019	In this way we may be certain that we are true , and may give our heart comfort before him ,
62003020	When our heart says that we have done wrong ; because God is greater than our heart , and has knowledge of all things .
62003021	My loved ones , if our heart does not say that we have done wrong , we have no fear before him ;
62003022	And he gives us all our requests , because we keep his laws and do the things which are pleasing in his eyes .
62003023	And this is his law , that we have faith in the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love for one another , even as he said to us .
62003024	He who keeps his laws is in God and God is in him . And the Spirit which he gave us is our witness that he is in us .
62004001	My loved ones , do not put your faith in every spirit , but put them to the test , to see if they are from God : because a great number of false prophets have gone out into the world .
62004002	By this you may have knowledge of the Spirit of God : every spirit which says that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God :
62004003	And every spirit which does not say this is not from God : this is the spirit of Antichrist , of which you have had word ; and it is in the world even now .
62004004	You are of God , my little children , and you have overcome them because he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world .
62004005	They are of the world , so their talk is the world's talk , and the world gives ear to them .
62004006	We are of God : he who has the knowledge of God gives ear to us ; he who is not of God does not give ear to us . By this we may see which is the true spirit , and which is the spirit of error .
62004007	My loved ones , let us have love for one another : because love is of God , and everyone who has love is a child of God and has knowledge of God .
62004008	He who has no love has no knowledge of God , because God is love .
62004009	And the love of God was made clear to us when he sent his only Son into the world so that we might have life through him .
62004010	And this is love , not that we had love for God , but that he had love for us , and sent his Son to be an offering for our sins .
62004011	My loved ones , if God had such love for us , it is right for us to have love for one another .
62004012	No man has ever seen God : if we have love for one another , God is in us and his love is made complete in us :
62004013	And his Spirit which he has given us is the witness that we are in him and he is in us .
62004014	And we have seen and give witness that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
62004015	Everyone who says openly that Jesus is the Son of God , has God in him and is in God .
62004016	And we have seen and had faith in the love which God has for us . God is love , and everyone who has love is in God , and God is in him .
62004017	In this way love is made complete in us , so that we may be without fear on the day of judging , because as he is , so are we in this world .
62004018	There is no fear in love : true love has no room for fear , because where fear is , there is pain ; and he who is not free from fear is not complete in love .
62004019	We have the power of loving , because he first had love for us .
62004020	If a man says , I have love for God , and has hate for his brother , his words are false : for how is the man who has no love for his brother whom he has seen , able to have love for God whom he has not seen ?
62004021	And this is the word which we have from him , that he who has love for God is to have the same love for his brother .
62005001	Everyone who has faith that Jesus is the Christ is a child of God : and everyone who has love for the Father has love for his child .
62005002	In this way , we are certain that we have love for the children of God , when we have love for God and keep his laws .
62005003	For loving God is keeping his laws : and his laws are not hard .
62005004	Anything which comes from God is able to overcome the world : and the power by which we have overcome the world is our faith .
62005005	Who is able to overcome the world but the man who has faith that Jesus is the Son of God ?
62005006	This is he who came by water and by blood , Jesus Christ ; not by water only but by water and by blood .
62005007	And the Spirit is the witness , because the Spirit is true .
62005008	There are three witnesses , the Spirit , the water , and the blood : and all three are in agreement .
62005009	If we take the witness of men to be true , the witness of God is greater : because this is the witness which God has given about his Son .
62005010	He who has faith in the Son of God has the witness in himself : he who has not faith in God makes him false , because he has not faith in the witness which God has given about his Son .
62005011	And his witness is this , that God has given us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
62005012	He who has the Son has the life ; he who has not the Son of God has not the life .
62005013	I have put these things in writing for you who have faith in the name of the Son of God , so that you may be certain that you have eternal life .
62005014	And we are certain that if we make any request to him which is right in his eyes , he will give ear to us :
62005015	And if we are certain that he gives ear to all our requests , we are equally certain that we will get our requests .
62005016	If a man sees his brother doing a sin which is not bad enough for death , let him make a prayer to God , and God will give life to him whose sin was not bad enough for death . There is a sin whose punishment is death : I do not say that he may make such a request then .
62005017	All evil-doing is sin : but death is not the punishment for every sort of sin .
62005018	We are certain that one who is a child of God will do no sin , but the Son of God keeps him so that he is not touched by the Evil One .
62005019	We are certain that we are of God , but all the world is in the power of the Evil One .
62005020	And we are certain that the Son of God has come , and has given us a clear vision , so that we may see him who is true , and we are in him who is true , in his Son Jesus Christ . He is the true God and eternal life .
62005021	My little children , keep yourselves from false gods .
63001001	I , a ruler in the church , send word to the noble sister who is of God's selection , and to her children , for whom I have true love ; and not only I , but all who have knowledge of what is true ;
63001002	Because of this true knowledge which is in us , and will be with us for ever :
63001003	May grace , mercy , and peace be with us from God the Father , and from Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in all true love .
63001004	It gave me great joy to see some of your children walking in the true way , even as we were ordered to do by the Father .
63001005	And now , my sister , I make a request to you , not sending you a new law , but the law which we had from the first , that we have love for one another .
63001006	And love is the keeping of his laws . This is the law which was given to you from the first , so that you might keep it .
63001007	Because a number of false teachers have gone out into the world , who do not give witness that Jesus Christ came in the flesh . Such a one is a false teacher and Antichrist .
63001008	Keep watch over yourselves , so that you do not make our work of no effect , but may get your full reward .
63001009	Anyone who goes on and does not keep to the teaching of Christ , has not God : he who keeps to the teaching has the Father and the Son .
63001010	If anyone comes to you not having this teaching , do not take him into your house or give him words of love :
63001011	For he who gives him words of love has a part in his evil works .
63001012	Having much to say to you , it is not my purpose to put it all down with paper and ink : but I am hoping to come to you , and to have talk with you face to face , so that your joy may be full .
63001013	The children of your noble sister , who is of God's selection , send you their love .
64001001	I , a ruler in the church , send word to the well loved Gaius , for whom I have true love .
64001002	My loved one , it is my prayer that you may do well in all things , and be healthy in body , even as your soul does well .
64001003	For it gave me great joy when some of the brothers came and gave witness that you had the true faith and were walking in the true way .
64001004	I have no greater joy than to have news that my children are walking in the true way .
64001005	My loved one , you are doing a good work in being kind to those brothers who come from other places ;
64001006	Who have given witness to the church of your love for them : and you will do well to send them on their way well cared for , as is right for servants of God :
64001007	For they went out for love of the Name , taking nothing from the Gentiles .
64001008	So it is right for us to take in such men as guests , so that we may take our part in the work of the true faith .
64001009	I sent a letter to the church , but Diotrephes , whose desire is ever to have the first place among them , will not have us there .
64001010	So if I come , I will keep in mind the things he does , talking against us with evil words : and as if this was not enough , he does not take the brothers into his house , and those who are ready to take them in , he keeps from doing so , putting them out of the church if they do .
64001011	My loved one , do not be copying what is evil , but what is good . He who does good is of God : he who does evil has not seen God .
64001012	Demetrius has the approval of all men and of what is true : and we give the same witness , and you are certain that our witness is true .
64001013	I had much to say to you , but it is not my purpose to put it all down with ink and pen :
64001014	But I am hoping to see you in a short time , and to have talk with you face to face .

65001001	Jude , a servant of Jesus Christ and the brother of James , to those of God's selection who have been made holy by God the Father and are kept safe for Jesus Christ :
65001002	May mercy and peace and love be increased in you .
65001003	My loved ones , while my thoughts were full of a letter which I was going to send you about our common salvation , it was necessary for me to send you one requesting you with all my heart to go on fighting strongly for the faith which has been given to the saints once and for ever .
65001004	For certain men have come among you secretly , marked out before in the holy Writings for this evil fate , men without the fear of God , turning his grace into an unclean thing , and false to our only Master and Lord , Jesus Christ .
65001005	Now it is my purpose to put you in mind , though you once had knowledge of all these things , of how the Lord , having taken a people safely out of Egypt , later sent destruction on those who had no faith ;
65001006	And the angels who did not keep to their kingdom but went out from the place which was theirs , he has put in eternal chains and in dark night till the great day of the judging .
65001007	Even as Sodom and Gomorrah , and the towns near them , having like these , given themselves up to unclean desires and gone after strange flesh , have been made an example , undergoing the punishment of eternal fire .
65001008	In the same way these dreamers make the flesh unclean , having no respect for authorities , and say evil of rulers .
65001009	Now when Michael , one of the chief angels , was fighting against the Evil One for the body of Moses , fearing to make use of violent words against him , he only said , May the Lord be your judge .
65001010	But these men say evil about such things as they have no knowledge of ; and the things of which they have natural knowledge , like beasts without reason , are the cause of their destruction .
65001011	A curse on them ! They have gone in the way of Cain , running uncontrolled into the error of Balaam for reward , and have come to destruction by saying evil against the Lord , like Korah .
65001012	These men are unseen rocks at your love-feasts , when they take part in them with you , keepers of sheep who without fear take the food of the sheep ; clouds without water rushing before the wind , wasted trees without fruit , twice dead , pulled up by the roots ,
65001013	Violent waves of the sea , streaming with their shame , wandering stars for whom the darkest night is kept in store for ever .
65001014	The prophet Enoch , who was the seventh after Adam , said of these men , The Lord came with tens of thousands of his saints ,
65001015	To be the judge of all , and to give a decision against all those whose lives are unpleasing to him , because of the evil acts which they have done , and because of all the hard things which sinners without fear of God have said against him .
65001016	These are the men who make trouble , ever desiring change , going after evil pleasures , using high-sounding words , respecting men's position in the hope of reward .
65001017	But you , my loved ones , keep in memory the words which were said before by the Apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
65001018	How they said to you , In the last days there will be men who , guided by their evil desires , will make sport of holy things .
65001019	These are the men who make divisions , natural men , not having the Spirit .
65001020	But you , my loved ones , building yourselves up on your most holy faith , and making prayers in the Holy Spirit ,
65001021	Keep yourselves in the love of God , looking for life eternal through the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ .
65001022	And have pity on those who are in doubt ;
65001023	And to some give salvation , pulling them out of the fire ; and on some have mercy with fear , hating even the clothing which is made unclean by the flesh .
65001024	Now to him who is able to keep you from falling , and to give you a place in his glory , free from all evil , with great joy ,
65001025	To the only God our Saviour , through Jesus Christ our Lord , let us give glory and honour and authority and power , before all time and now and for ever . So be it .
66001001	The Revelation of Jesus Christ which God gave him so that his servants might have knowledge of the things which will quickly take place : and he sent and made it clear by his angel to his servant John ;
66001002	Who gave witness of the word of God , and of the witness of Jesus Christ , even of all the things which he saw .
66001003	A blessing be on the reader , and on those who give ear to the prophet's words , and keep the things which he has put in the book : for the time is near .
66001004	John to the seven churches which are in Asia : Grace to you and peace , from him who is and was and is to come ; and from the seven Spirits which are before his high seat ;
66001005	And from Jesus Christ , the true witness , the first to come back from the dead , and the ruler of the kings of the earth . To him who had love for us and has made us clean from our sins by his blood ;
66001006	And has made us to be a kingdom and priests to his God and Father ; to him let glory and power be given for ever and ever . So be it .
66001007	See , he comes with the clouds , and every eye will see him , and those by whom he was wounded ; and all the tribes of the earth will be sorrowing because of him . Yes , so be it .
66001008	I am the First and the Last , says the Lord God who is and was and is to come , the Ruler of all .
66001009	I , John , your brother , who have a part with you in the trouble and the kingdom and the quiet strength of Jesus , was in the island which is named Patmos , for the word of God and the witness of Jesus .
66001010	I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day , and a great voice at my back , as of a horn , came to my ears ,
66001011	Saying , What you see , put in a book , and send it to the seven churches ; to Ephesus and to Smyrna and to Pergamos and to Thyatira and to Sardis and to Philadelphia and to Laodicea .
66001012	And turning to see the voice which said these words to me , I saw seven gold vessels with lights burning in them ;
66001013	And in the middle of them one like a son of man , clothed with a robe down to his feet , and with a band of gold round his breasts .
66001014	And his head and his hair were white like wool , as white as snow ; and his eyes were as a flame of fire ;
66001015	And his feet like polished brass , as if it had been burned in a fire ; and his voice was as the sound of great waters .
66001016	And he had in his right hand seven stars : and out of his mouth came a sharp two-edged sword : and his face was like the sun shining in its strength .
66001017	And when I saw him , I went down on my face at his feet as one dead . And he put his right hand on me , saying , Have no fear ; I am the first and the last and the Living one ;
66001018	And I was dead , and see , I am living for ever , and I have the keys of death and of Hell .
66001019	Put in writing , then , the things which you have seen , and the things which are , and the things which will be after these ;
66001020	The secret of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand , and of the seven gold vessels with burning lights . The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches : and the seven lights are the seven churches .
66002001	To the angel of the church in Ephesus say : These things says he who has the seven stars in his right hand , who is walking in the middle of the seven gold lights :
66002002	I have knowledge of your doings , and of your hard work and long waiting , and that you will not put up with evil men , and have put to the test those who say they are Apostles and are not , and have seen that they are false ;
66002003	And you have the power of waiting , and have undergone trouble because of my name , without weariness .
66002004	But I have this against you , that you are turned away from your first love .
66002005	So keep in mind where you were at first , and be changed in heart and do the first works ; or I will come to you , and will take away your light from its place , if your hearts are not changed .
66002006	But at least you have the credit of hating the works of the Nicolaitans , as I do .
66002007	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches . To him who overcomes I will give of the fruit of the tree of life , which is in the Paradise of God .
66002008	And to the angel of the church in Smyrna say : These things says the first and the last , who was dead and is living :
66002009	I have knowledge of your troubles and how poor you are ( but you have true wealth ) , and the evil words of those who say they are Jews , and are not , but are a Synagogue of Satan .
66002010	Have no fear of the things which you will have to undergo : see , the Evil One will send some of you into prison , so that you may be put to the test ; and you will have great trouble for ten days . Be true till death , and I will give you the crown of life .
66002011	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches . He who overcomes will not come under the power of the second death .
66002012	And to the angel of the church in Pergamos say : These things says he who has the sharp two-edged sword :
66002013	I have knowledge that your living-place is where Satan has his seat : and you are true to my name , and were not turned away from your faith in me , even in the days of Antipas , my true witness , who was put to death among you , where Satan has his place .
66002014	But I have some things against you , because you have with you those who keep the teaching of Balaam , by whose suggestion Balak made the children of Israel go out of the right way , taking food which was offered to false gods , and going after the desires of the flesh .
66002015	And you have those who keep the teaching of the Nicolaitans .
66002016	See , then , that you have a change of heart ; or I will come to you quickly , and will make war against them with the sword of my mouth .
66002017	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches . To him who overcomes I will give of the secret manna , and I will give him a white stone , and on the stone a new name , of which no one has knowledge but he to whom it is given .
66002018	And to the angel of the church in Thyatira say : These things says the Son of God , whose eyes are like a flame of fire , and his feet like polished brass :
66002019	I have knowledge of your works , and your love and faith and help and strength in trouble , and that your last works are more than the first .
66002020	But I have this against you , that you let the woman Jezebel say she is a prophet and give false teaching , making my servants go after the desires of the flesh and take food offered to false gods .
66002021	And I gave her time for a change of heart , but she has no mind to give up her unclean ways .
66002022	See , I will put her into a bed , and those who make themselves unclean with her , into great trouble , if they go on with her works .
66002023	And I will put her children to death ; and all the churches will see that I am he who makes search into the secret thoughts and hearts of men : and I will give to every one of you the reward of your works .
66002024	But to you I say , to the rest in Thyatira , even to those who have not this teaching , and have no knowledge of the secrets of Satan , as they say ; I put on you no other weight .
66002025	But what you have , keep safe till I come .
66002026	He who overcomes , and keeps my works to the end , to him I will give rule over the nations ,
66002027	And he will be ruling them with a rod of iron ; as the vessels of the potter they will be broken , even as I have power from my Father :
66002028	And I will give him the morning star .
66002029	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches .
66003001	And to the angel of the church in Sardis say : These things says he who has the seven Spirits of God and the seven stars : I have knowledge of your works , that you seem to be living but are dead .
66003002	Be on the watch , and make strong the rest of the things which are near to death ; because as judged by me your works have not come up to God's measure .
66003003	Keep in mind , then , the teaching which was given to you , and be ruled by it and have a change of heart . If then you do not keep watch , I will come like a thief , and you will have no knowledge of the hour when I will come on you .
66003004	But you have some names in Sardis who have kept clean their robes ; and as a reward they will go in white with me .
66003005	He who overcomes will be dressed in white , and I will not take his name from the book of life , and I will give witness to his name before my Father , and before his angels .
66003006	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches .
66003007	And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia say : These things says he who is holy , he who is true , he who has the key of David , opening the door so that it may be shut by no one , and shutting it so that it may be open to no one .
66003008	I have knowledge of your works ( see , I have put before you an open door which may be shut by no one ) , and that you have a little strength , and have kept my word , and have been true to my name .
66003009	See , I will make those of the Synagogue of Satan who say they are Jews , and are not , but say what is false ; I will make them come and give worship before your feet , and see my love for you .
66003010	Because you have kept my word in quiet strength , I will keep you from the hour of testing which is coming on all the world , to put to the test those who are on earth .
66003011	I come quickly : keep that which you have , so that no one may take your crown .
66003012	Him who overcomes I will make a pillar in the house of my God , and he will go out no more : and I will put on him the name of my God , and the name of the town of my God , the new Jerusalem , which comes down out of heaven from my God , and my new name .
66003013	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches .
66003014	And to the angel of the church in Laodicea say : These things says the true and certain witness , the head of God's new order :
66003015	I have knowledge of your works , that you are not cold or warm : it would be better if you were cold or warm .
66003016	So because you are not one thing or the other , I will have no more to do with you .
66003017	For you say , I have wealth , and have got together goods and land , and have need of nothing ; and you are not conscious of your sad and unhappy condition , that you are poor and blind and without clothing .
66003018	If you are wise you will get from me gold tested by fire , so that you may have true wealth ; and white robes to put on , so that your shame may not be seen ; and oil for your eyes , so that you may see .
66003019	To all those who are dear to me , I give sharp words and punishment : then with all your heart have sorrow for your evil ways .
66003020	See , I am waiting at the door and giving the sign ; if my voice comes to any man's ears and he makes the door open , I will come in to him , and will take food with him and he with me .
66003021	To him who overcomes I will give a place with me on my high seat , even as I overcame , and am seated with my Father on his high seat .
66003022	He who has ears , let him give ear to what the Spirit says to the churches .
66004001	After these things I saw a door open in heaven , and the first voice came to my ears , like the sound of a horn , saying , Come up here , and I will make clear to you the things which are to come .
66004002	Straight away I was in the Spirit : and I saw a high seat in heaven , and one was seated on it ;
66004003	And to my eyes he was like a jasper and a sardius stone : and there was an arch of light round the high seat , like an emerald .
66004004	And round about the high seat were four and twenty seats : and on them I saw four and twenty rulers seated , clothed in white robes ; and on their heads crowns of gold .
66004005	And out of the high seat came flames and voices and thunders . And seven lights of fire were burning before the high seat , which are the seven Spirits of God ;
66004006	And before the high seat there was , as it seemed , a clear sea of glass ; and in the middle of the high seat , and round about it , four beasts full of eyes round about .
66004007	And the first beast was like a lion , and the second like an ox , and the third had a face like a man , and the fourth was like an eagle in flight .
66004008	And the four beasts , having every one of them six wings , are full of eyes round about and inside : and without resting day and night , they say , Holy , holy , holy , Lord God , Ruler of all , who was and is and is to come .
66004009	And when the beasts give glory and honour to him who is seated on the high seat , to him who is living for ever and ever ,
66004010	The four and twenty rulers go down on their faces before him who is seated on the high seat , and give worship to him who is living for ever and ever , and take off their crowns before the high seat , saying ,
66004011	It is right , our Lord and our God , for you to have glory and honour and power : because by you were all things made , and by your desire they came into being .
66005001	And I saw in the right hand of him who was seated on the high seat , a book with writing inside it and on the back , shut with seven stamps of wax .
66005002	And I saw a strong angel saying in a loud voice , Who is able to make the book open , and to undo its stamps ?
66005003	And no one in heaven , or on the earth , or under the earth , was able to get the book open , or to see what was in it .
66005004	And I was very sad , because there was no one able to get the book open or to see what was in it .
66005005	And one of the rulers said to me , Do not be sad : see , the Lion of the tribe of Judah , the Root of David , has overcome , and has power to undo the book and its seven stamps .
66005006	And I saw in the middle of the high seat and of the four beasts , and in the middle of the rulers , a Lamb in his place , which seemed as if it had been put to death , having seven horns and seven eyes , which are the seven Spirits of God , sent out into all the earth .
66005007	And he came and took it out of the right hand of him who was seated on the high seat .
66005008	And when he had taken the book , the four beasts and the four and twenty rulers went down on their faces before the Lamb , having every one an instrument of music , and gold vessels full of perfumes , which are the prayers of the saints .
66005009	And their voices are sounding in a new song , saying , It is right for you to take the book and to make it open : for you were put to death and have made an offering to God of your blood for men of every tribe , and language , and people , and nation ,
66005010	And have made them a kingdom and priests to our God , and they are ruling on the earth .
66005011	And I saw , and there came to my ears the sound of a great number of angels round about the high seat and the beasts and the rulers ; and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand , and thousands of thousands ;
66005012	Saying with a great voice , It is right to give to the Lamb who was put to death , power and wealth and wisdom and strength and honour and glory and blessing .
66005013	And to my ears came the voice of everything in heaven and on earth and under the earth and in the sea , and of all things which are in them , saying , To him who is seated on the high seat , and to the Lamb , may blessing and honour and glory and power be given for ever and ever .
66005014	And the four beasts said , So be it . And the rulers went down on their faces and gave worship .
66006001	And I saw when the Lamb undid one of the stamps , and the voice of one of the four beasts came to my ears , saying as with a voice of thunder , Come and see .
66006002	And I saw a white horse , and he who was seated on it had a bow ; and there was given to him a crown : and he went out with power to overcome .
66006003	And when the second stamp was undone , the voice of the second beast came to my ears , saying , Come and see .
66006004	And another horse came out , a red horse ; and it was given to him who was seated on it to take peace from the earth , so that people might put one another to death : and there was given to him a great sword .
66006005	And when the third stamp was undone , the voice of the third beast came to my ears , saying , Come and see . And I saw a black horse ; and he who was seated on it had scales in his hand .
66006006	And a voice came to my ears , from the middle of the four beasts , saying , A measure of grain for a penny , and three measures of barley for a penny : and see that you do no damage to the oil and the wine .
66006007	And when the fourth stamp was undone , the voice of the fourth beast came to my ears , saying , Come and see .
66006008	And I saw a grey horse , and the name of him who was seated on it was Death ; and Hell came after him . And there was given to them authority over the fourth part of the earth , to put to destruction by the sword , and by taking away their food , and by death , and by the beasts of the earth .
66006009	And when the fifth stamp was undone , I saw under the altar the souls of those who had been put to death for the word of God , and for the witness which they kept .
66006010	And they gave a great cry , saying , How long will it be , O Ruler , holy and true , before you take your place as judge and give punishment for our blood to those on the earth ?
66006011	And there was given to every one a white robe , and they were ordered to take their rest for a little time , till the number was complete of the other servants , their brothers , who would be put to death , even as they had been .
66006012	And I saw when the sixth stamp was undone , and there was a great earth-shock ; and the sun became black as haircloth , and all the moon became as blood ;
66006013	And the stars of heaven were falling to the earth , like green fruit from a tree before the force of a great wind .
66006014	And the heaven was taken away like the roll of a book when it is rolled up ; and all the mountains and islands were moved out of their places .
66006015	And the kings of the earth , and the rulers , and the chief captains , and the men of wealth , and the strong , and every servant and free man , took cover in the holes and the rocks of the mountains ;
66006016	And they say to the mountains and to the rocks , Come down on us , covering us from the face of him who is seated on the high seat , and from the wrath of the Lamb :
66006017	For the great day of their wrath is come , and who may keep his place ?
66007001	After this I saw four angels in their places at the four points of the earth , keeping back the four winds in their hands , so that there might be no moving of the wind on the earth , or on the sea , or on any tree .
66007002	And I saw another angel coming up from the east , having the mark of the living God : and he said with a great voice to the four angels , to whom it was given to do damage to the earth and the sea ,
66007003	Do no damage to the earth , or the sea , or the trees , till we have put a mark on the servants of our God .
66007004	And there came to my ears the number of those who had the mark on their brows , a hundred and forty-four thousand , who were marked out of every tribe of the people of Israel .
66007005	Of the tribe of Judah were marked twelve thousand : of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand : of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand :
66007006	Of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand : of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand : of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand :
66007007	Of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand : of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand : of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand :
66007008	Of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand : of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand : of the tribe of Benjamin were marked twelve thousand .
66007009	After these things I saw a great army of people more than might be numbered , out of every nation and of all tribes and peoples and languages , taking their places before the high seat and before the Lamb , dressed in white robes , and with branches in their hands ,
66007010	Saying with a loud voice , Salvation to our God who is seated on the high seat , and to the Lamb .
66007011	And all the angels were round about the high seat , and about the rulers and the four beasts ; and they went down on their faces before the high seat , and gave worship to God , saying ,
66007012	So be it . Let blessing and glory and wisdom and praise and honour and power and strength be given to our God for ever and ever . So be it .
66007013	And one of the rulers made answer , saying to me , These who have on white robes , who are they , and where did they come from ?
66007014	And I said to him , My lord , you have knowledge . And he said to me , These are they who came through the great testing , and their robes have been washed and made white in the blood of the Lamb .
66007015	This is why they are before the high seat of God ; and they are his servants day and night in his house : and he who is seated on the high seat will be a tent over them .
66007016	They will never be in need of food or drink : and they will never again be troubled by the burning heat of the sun :
66007017	For the Lamb who is on the high seat will be their keeper and their guide to fountains of living water : and God will make glad their eyes for ever .
66008001	And when the seventh stamp was undone there was quiet in heaven for about half an hour .
66008002	And I saw the seven angels who had their place before God ; and seven horns were given to them .
66008003	And another angel came and took his place at the altar , having a gold vessel for burning perfume ; and there was given to him much perfume , so that he might put it with the prayers of all the saints on the gold altar which was before the high seat .
66008004	And the smoke of the perfume , with the prayers of the saints , went up before God out of the angel's hand .
66008005	And the angel took the vessel ; and he made it full of the fire of the altar , and sent it down on the earth : and there came thunders and voices and flames and a shaking of the earth .
66008006	And the seven angels who had the seven horns made ready for sounding them .
66008007	And at the sounding of the first , a rain of ice and fire , mixed with blood , was sent on the earth : and a third part of the earth , and of the trees , and all green grass was burned up .
66008008	And at the sounding of the second angel , it was as if a great mountain burning with fire was sent into the sea : and a third part of the sea became blood ,
66008009	And destruction came on a third part of the living things which were in the sea , and on a third part of the ships .
66008010	And at the sounding of the third angel , there went down from heaven a great star , burning like a flame , and it came on a third part of the rivers , and on the fountains of water .
66008011	And the name of the star is Wormwood : and a third part of the waters became bitter ; and a number of men came to their end because of the waters , for they were made bitter .
66008012	And at the sounding of the fourth angel , a third part of the sun , and of the moon , and of the stars was made dark , so that there was no light for a third part of the day and of the night .
66008013	And there came to my ears the cry of an eagle in flight in the middle of heaven , saying with a great voice , Trouble , trouble , trouble , to all on the earth , because of the other voices of the horns of the three angels , whose sounding is still to come .
66009001	And at the sounding of the fifth angel I saw a star falling from heaven to the earth : and there was given to him the key of the great deep .
66009002	And he made the great deep open and a smoke went up from it , like the smoke of a great oven ; and the sun and the air were made dark because of the smoke .
66009003	And from the smoke locusts came out on the earth ; and power was given them , like the power of scorpions .
66009004	And they were ordered to do no damage to the grass of the earth , or any green thing , or any tree , but only to such men as have not the mark of God on their brows .
66009005	And orders were given them not to put them to death , but to give them great pain for five months : and their pain was as the pain from the wound of a scorpion .
66009006	And in those days men will be hoping for death , and it will not come to them ; and they will have a great desire for death , and death will go in flight from them .
66009007	And the forms of the locusts were like horses made ready for war ; and on their heads they had crowns like gold , and their faces were as the faces of men .
66009008	And they had hair like the hair of women , and their teeth were as the teeth of lions .
66009009	And they had breastplates like iron , and the sound of their wings was as the sound of carriages , like an army of horses rushing to the fight .
66009010	And they have pointed tails like scorpions ; and in their tails is their power to give men wounds for five months .
66009011	They have over them as king the angel of the great deep : his name in Hebrew is Abaddon , and in the Greek language Apollyon .
66009012	The first Trouble is past : see , there are still two Troubles to come .
66009013	And at the sounding of the sixth angel a voice came to my ears from the horns of the gold altar which is before God ,
66009014	Saying to the sixth angel who had the horn , Make free the four angels who are chained at the great river Euphrates .
66009015	And the four angels were made free , who were ready for the hour and day and month and year , that they might put to death a third part of men .
66009016	And the number of the armies of the horsemen was twice ten thousand times ten thousand : the number of them came to my ears .
66009017	And so I saw the horses in the vision , and those who were seated on them , having breastplates of fire and glass and of burning stone : and the heads of the horses were as the heads of lions ; and out of their mouths came fire and smoke and a smell of burning .
66009018	By these evils a third part of men was put to death , by the fire , and the smoke , and the burning smell which came out of their mouths .
66009019	For the power of the horses is in their mouths and in their tails : because their tails are like snakes , and have heads , and with them they give wounds .
66009020	And the rest of the people , who were not put to death by these evils , were not turned from the works of their hands , but went on giving worship to evil spirits , and images of gold and silver and brass and stone and wood which have no power of seeing or hearing or walking :
66009021	And they had no regret for putting men to death , or for their use of secret arts , or for the evil desires of the flesh , or for taking the property of others .
66010001	And I saw another strong angel coming down out of heaven , clothed with a cloud ; and an arch of coloured light was round his head , and his face was like the sun , and his feet like pillars of fire ;
66010002	And he had in his hand a little open book : and he put his right foot on the sea , and his left on the earth ;
66010003	And he gave a loud cry , like the angry voice of a lion : and at his cry the voices of the seven thunders were sounding .
66010004	And when the seven thunders had given out their voices , I was about to put their words down : and a voice from heaven came to my ears , saying , Keep secret the things which the seven thunders said , and do not put them in writing .
66010005	And the angel which I saw taking his position on the sea and on the earth , put up his right hand to heaven ,
66010006	And took his oath by him who is living for ever and ever , who made the heaven and the things in it , and the earth and the things in it , and the sea and the things in it , that there would be no more waiting :
66010007	But in the days of the voice of the seventh angel , when the sound of his horn is about to come , then will the secret of God be complete , of which he gave the good news to his servants the prophets .
